na ɔtenee ne mu butuu abɔfra no so mprɛnsa na ɔteaa mu frɛɛ awurade sɛ awurade me nyankopɔn ma abɔfra yi kra nsane mmra ne mu
na awurade tiee elia nne na abɔfra no kra sane baa ne mu na ɔnyaa nkwa
na elia faa abɔfra no de no siane firii abansoro pia mu baa ɛdan no mu na ɔde no brɛɛ ne na na elia se hwɛ wo ba anya nkwa
na ɔbaa no ka kyerɛɛ elia sɛ afei na mahunu sɛ nyankopɔn nipa ne wo na awurade asɛm a ɛwɔ w anomu yɛ nokorɛ
na nna pii akyiri no afe a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa mu no awurade asɛm baa elia nkyɛn sɛ fa wo ho kɔkyerɛ ahab na mɛma osuo atɔ asase so
na elia sii mu kɔɔ sɛ ɔde ne ho rekɔkyerɛ ahab nso na ɛkɔm a emu yɛ den aba samaria
na ahab frɛɛ obadia a ɔdi ne fie soɔ nso obadia deɛ na ɔsuro awurade sɛ
na ɛbaa sɛ isebel retwitwa awurade adiyifoɔ aguo no obadia faa awurade adiyifoɔ ɔha na ɔde wɔn aduonum aduonum kɔsiesiee ɔbodan mu na ɔde aduane ne nsuo hwɛɛ wɔn
na ahab ka kyerɛɛ obadia sɛ kɔkyini asase no so nsuo aniwa nyinaa ne nsubɔnhwa nyinaa ho ebia yɛbɛnya wira de agye apɔnkɔ ne mfunumupɔnkɔ no bi nkwa na yɛanhwere mmoa no
na wɔkyɛɛ asase no mu fae sɛ wɔrekyini so ahab nko faa ɔkwan baako so na obadia nko nso faa ɔkwan baako soɔ
na obadia wɔ ɔkwan no soɔ no hwɛ elia ne no bɛhyiae na ɔhunuu no na ɔde n anim butuu fam kaa sɛ me wura elia nie
na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ menie kɔka kyerɛ wo wura sɛ mahunu elia
na ɔkaa sɛ bɔne bɛn na mayɛ na wo deɛ woreyi w akoa ahyɛ ahab nsa na waku me yi
sɛ awurade wo nyankopɔn te aseɛ yi ɔman ne ahennie biara nni hɔ a me wura nsoma mmaa wɔnkɔɔ hɔ nkɔhwehwɛɛ woɔ na sɛ wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔnni hɔ a ɔma ahennie no ne ɔman no ka ntam sɛ wɔnhunuu woɔ
na afei wo ara wose kɔka kyerɛ wo wura sɛ elia wɔ ha
na sɛ me deɛ mefiri wo nkyɛn mekɔ a awurade honhom bɛma wo so akɔ baabi a mennim na sɛ meka mekyerɛ ahab na wanhu wo a ɔbɛkum me na me w akoa deɛ mefiri me mmɔfraase mesuro awurade
wɔnkaa deɛ isebel kumm awurade adiyifoɔ no meyɛeɛ no nkyerɛɛ me wura sɛ mefaa awurade adiyifoɔ mu mmarima ɔha na mede wɔn aduonum aduonum mesiee ɔbodan mu na me de aduane ne nsuo mehwɛɛ wɔn no
na afei wo deɛ wose kɔka kyerɛ wo wura sɛ elia wɔ ha na ɔnku me
na elia kaa sɛ sɛ asafo awurade a megyina n anim te aseɛ yi ɛyɛ dɛn ara a nnɛ mede me ho bɛkyerɛ no
ɛnna obadia kɔ kɔhyiaa ahab na ɔka kyerɛɛ no na ahab kɔ kɔhyiaa elia
na ahab hunuu elia no ahab bisaa no sɛ wo a woha israel no wo nie
na ɔse menhaa israel na mmom wo ne w agya fie sɛ moagya awurade mmara nsɛm na moakɔdi baalim akyire
na afei soma ma wɔnkɔboaboa israel nyinaa ano mmrɛ me karmel bepɔ so ne baal adiyifoɔ ahanan aduonum no ne asera adiyifoɔ ahanan a wɔdidi isebel pono soɔ no
na ahab soma maa wɔkɔɔ israelfoɔ nyinaa mu kɔboaboaa adiyifoɔ no ano kɔɔ karmel bepɔ so
ɛnna elia twe pinii ɔman no nyinaa nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ ɛnkɔsi da bɛn na mo adwene bɛyɛ mo ntanta sɛ awurade ne onyankopɔn a monni n akyi sɛ baal nso a monni n akyi na ɔman no ammua no asɛm biara
na elia ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ me deɛ me nko ara mene awurade diyifoɔ a waka na baal adiyifoɔ deɛ wɔyɛ mmarima ahanan aduonum
na momma wɔmma yɛn anantwinini mmienu na ma wɔnyi nantwinini no baako mfa na wɔntwitwa no asinasini na wɔmfa ngu nnyina so na ogya deɛ wɔmmfa nngu aseɛ na me nso mɛsiesie nantwinini baako no na mede magu nnyina so na meremfa ogya mengu aseɛ
na mommɔ mo nyame din na me nso memmɔ awurade din na onyame a ɔde ogya bɛgye soɔ no ɔno ne onyankopɔn na ɔman no nyinaa gyee so sɛ ɔsɛmpa
ɛnna elia ka kyerɛɛ baal adiyifoɔ no sɛ monyi nantwinini baako mfa na monsiesie no kane na mo deɛ modɔɔso na mommɔ mo nyame din na ogya na mommfa nngu aseɛ
na wɔfaa nantwinini a wɔde maa wɔn no na wɔsiesiee na wɔbɔɔ baal din firii anɔpa kɔsii awigyina sɛ baal gye yɛn so nso wɔante nne biara na obiara nso annye so na wɔhurihuri twaa afɔrebukyia a wɔyɛeɛ no ho hyiae
na ɛduruu awigyina no elia sii wɔn atwetweɛ goroo wɔn ho na ɔkaa sɛ momfa nne kɛseɛ mfrɛ na onyame ne no sɛsɛɛ ɔredwene anaasɛ wafiri adi rekɔgya ne nan anaasɛ ɔnam kwan so ebia wada na wanyane
na wɔde nne kɛseɛ teateaa mu na wɔde nkrantɛ ne mpea bobɔɔ wɔn ho akam sɛdeɛ wɔn amanneɛ teɛ no kɔsii sɛ mogya guu wɔn soɔ
na awigyina twaa mu no wɔkɔmee kɔsii sɛ ɛrekɔ aduane afɔrebɔ berɛ soɔ nso wɔante nne biara na obiara nso annye so na obiara nso antie wɔn
ɛnna elia ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no nyinaa sɛ montwe mpini me na ɔman no nyinaa twe pinii no na ɔsiesiee awurade afɔrebukyia a abubuo no
na elia tasee aboɔ dummienu sɛ yakob a awurade asɛm baa ne nkyɛn sɛ israel ne wo din no mma mmusuakuo no ano sie
na ɔde aboɔ no sii afɔrebukyia awurade din mu na ɔtwaa ɛka a ɛbɛdi aba a wɔguo susuo adeɛ mmienu afɔrebukyia no ho hyiae
na ɔhyehyɛɛ nnyina no na ɔtwitwaa nantwinini no asinasini de guu nnyina no so kaa sɛ momfa nsuo nhyehyɛ nhina nnan amaama na mommɛhwie ngu ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne nnyina no so
na ɔkaa sɛ monyɛ bio na wɔyɛɛ bio na ɔkaa sɛ momma no nyɛ mprɛnsa na wɔmaa no yɛɛ mprɛnsa
na nsuo no fefaa afɔrebukyia no ho hyiae na ɛka no nso ɔhyɛɛ no nsuo ma
na afɔrebɔberɛ mu no odiyifoɔ elia twe pinii na ɔkaa sɛ awurade abraham ne isak ne israel nyankopɔn nnɛ ma wɔnhunu sɛ wo na wone onyankopɔn israel mu na mene w akoa na w asɛm so na mayɛ adeɛ yi nyinaa
gye me so awurade gye me so na ɔman yi nhunu sɛ wo awurade ne onyankopɔn na wo nso woama wɔn akoma asane akyire aba
ɛnna awurade gya duru bɛhyee ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ no ne nnyina no ne aboɔ ne dɔteɛ no na ɛwee nsuo a ɛwɔ ɛka no mu no
na ɔman no nyinaa hunuiɛ no wɔde wɔn anim butubutuu fam kaa sɛ awurade ɔno ne onyankopɔn awurade ɔno ne onyankopɔn
na elia kaa sɛ monkyere baal adiyifoɔ no mommma wɔn mu biara mmfiri mu mfi na wɔkyeree wɔn na elia de wɔn siane kɔɔ kison asuo ho na ɔkumm wɔn wɔ hɔ
na elia ka kyerɛɛ ahab sɛ foro kɔ kɔdidi na nom na mete osu kɛseɛ nka
na ahab foro kɔɔ sɛ ɔrekɔdidi na wanom na elia deɛ ɔforo kɔɔ karmel atifi na ɔkotoo fam na ɔde n anim hyɛɛ ne nkotodwe ntam
na ɔka kyerɛɛ n abɔfra sɛ foro kɔ kɔhwɛ po fam na ɔforo kɔhwɛe na ɔbɛkaa sɛ hwee nni hɔ na ɔse sane kɔ mprɛnson
na ɛbaa sɛ deɛ ɛtɔ so nson no ɔkaa sɛ hwɛ mununkum ketewa bi te sɛ onipa nsa resɔre firi po mu na ɔse foro kɔka kyerɛ ahab sɛ siesie wo nteaseɛnam na siane kɔ na osuo ansi wo kwan
na ɛbaa sɛ ɛyɛɛ kakra na mununkum ne mframa abiri soro tumm na osu kɛseɛ bi tɔe na ahab nam teaseɛnam mu kɔɔ yesreel
na awurade nsa baa elia so na ɔbɔɔ n abɔsoɔ tuu mmirika dii ahab anim de kɔduruu sɛ wɔrehyɛne yesreel
na ahab bɛka kyerɛɛ isebel deɛ elia yɛeɛ no nyinaa ne sɛdeɛ ɔkumm adiyifoɔ no nyinaa nkrantɛ ano no
na isebel somaa ɔbɔfoɔ maa no kɔɔ elia nkyɛn sɛ sei na anyame no nyɛ me na sei nso na wɔmfa nka ho sɛ ɔkyena sɛsɛɛ na mama wo kra ayɛ sɛ wɔn mu baako deɛ
na ɔhunuu saa no ne nkwa nti ɔsuroe na ɔsɔre kɔe na ɔkɔduruu beer seba a ɛyɛ yuda deɛ no na ɔgyaa n abɔfra no wɔ hɔ
na ɔno deɛ ɔnantee ɛserɛ so da koro kwan na ɔkɔtenaa sesea bi ase na ɔsrɛ maa ne ho sɛ anka ɔnwu na ɔkaa sɛ ayɛ yie afei awurade fa me kra na menyɛ nsene m agyanom
na ɔde ne ho too hɔ sesea bi ase na hwɛ ɔbɔfoɔ bɛkaa no na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ sɔre didi
na ɔhwɛe na hwɛ na ɔfam a wɔato no nnyansramma soɔ ne nsuo kuruwa si n atifi na ɔdidii na ɔnomee na ɔtɔɔ hɔ dae
na awurade bɔfoɔ sane bɛkaa no ne mprenu soɔ sɛ sɔre didi na ɔkwan no ware papa ma wo
na ɔsɔre didii na ɔnomee na ɔnantee aduane no ahoɔden mu adaduanan awia ne anadwo de kɔduruu nyankopɔn bepɔ horeb ho
na ɔduruu ɔbodan no ho hɔ na ɔsoɛɛ hɔ na hwɛ awurade asɛm baa ne nkyɛn sɛ elia ɛdeɛn na wowɔ yɛ wɔ ha
na ɔse ninkunu na matwe mama awurade asafo nyankopɔn sɛ israelfoɔ agya w apam w afɔrebukyia no wɔadwiridwiri na w adiyifoɔ nso wɔde nkrantɛ akum wɔn na me nko na maka na wɔrehwehwɛ me aku me
na ɔkaa sɛ firi adi kɔgyina bepɔ no so awurade anim na hwɛ awurade twaa mu na mframa kɛseɛ a ɛyɛ den paepaee mmepɔ na ɛbubuu abotan dii awurade anim nanso na ɛnyɛ mframa no mu na awurade wɔ na mframa no akyiri no asasewosoɔ na ɛnyɛ asasewosoɔ no mu na awurade wɔ
na asasewosoɔ no akyiri no ogya na ɛnyɛ ogya no mu na awurade wɔ na ogya no akyi no ɛnne bɔkɔɔ bi a
na ɛbaa sɛ elia teeɛ no ɔde ne ngusoɔ kataa n anim na ɔfiri kɔgyinaa ɔbodan no ano na hwɛ ɛnne bi baa ne nkyɛn sɛ elia ɛdeɛn na wowɔ yɛ wɔ ha
na ɔse ninkunu na matwe mama awurade asafo nyankopɔn sɛ israelfoɔ agya w apam w afɔrebukyia no wɔadwiridwiri na w adiyifoɔ nso wɔde nkrantɛ akum wɔn na me nko na maka na wɔrehwehwɛ me aku me
na awurade ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ kɔ sane si wo kwan so kɔ damasko serɛ so na sɛ woduru a sra hasael ngo si no siria so hene
na nimsi ba yehu nso sra no ngo si israel so hene na safat ba elisa a ɔfiri abel mehola no deɛ sra no si w ananmu sɛ odiyifoɔ
na deɛ ɔbɛfiri hasael nkrantɛ ano no yehu bɛku no na deɛ ɔbɛfiri yehu nkrantɛ ano no elisa bɛku no
nanso mɛgya israel mu nnipa mpemnson nkotodwe a ɛnnya nkutoo baal ne ano a ɛnnya mfee n ano
ɛnna ɔfirii hɔ kɔeɛ na ɔkɔhunuu safat ba elisa sɛ ɔrefuntum anantwie mpamho dummienu na ɛdi n anim na ɔno ne deɛ ɛtɔ so dummienu no na ɛrefuntum na elia sene baa ne nkyɛn na ɔtoo ne ngusoɔ guu ne so
na ɔgyaa anantwie no hɔ na ɔtuu mmirika dii elia akyi kaa sɛ ma menkɔ kra m agya ne me na na memmɛdi w akyi na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ kɔ na bra na ɛdeɛn na mayɛ woɔ yi
na ɔsane firii n akyi kɔfaa anantwie mpamho no kumm wɔn na ɔde anantwie no adwumayɛ nnua no noaa nam no na ɔde maa nkurɔfoɔ no na wɔdii na ɔsɔre kɔdii elia akyi na ɔsom no
na siriahene ben hadad boaboaa ne dɔm nyinaa ano na ahemfo aduasa mmienu kaa ne ho ne apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam na ɔforo ba bɛtuaa samaria ne no koeɛ
na ɔsomaa abɔfoɔ maa wɔbaa israelhene ahab nkyɛn kuro no mu bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ sɛ ben hadad seɛ nie
wo dwetɛ ne wo sika yɛ me dea na wo yerenom ne wo mma a wɔn ho yɛ fɛ no nso wɔyɛ me dea
na israel hene buaa sɛ w asɛm no wom me wura ɔhene wo na me ne deɛ mewɔ nyinaa wɔ woɔ
na ɔbɔfoɔ no sane baa bio bɛkaa sɛ sɛ ben hadad seɛ nie sɛ mesoma maa wɔbaa wo nkyɛn sɛ wo dwetɛ ne wo sika ne wo yerenom ne wo mma fa ma me no
sɛ ɔkyena sɛsɛberɛ nso mesoma me nkoa ma wɔaba wo nkyɛn abɛkyini wo fie ne wo nkoa afie mu na adeɛ biara a ɛyɛ wɔn ani so fɛ no wɔbɛfa akura wɔn nsam de akɔ
ɛnna israel hene frɛɛ asase no so mpanimfoɔ nyinaa sɛ monhwɛ nhunu sɛ bɔne na oyi rehwehwɛ na wasoma ama wɔaba me nkyɛn me yerenom ne me mma ne me dwetɛ ne me sika ho na mankame no
na mpanimfoɔ no nyinaa ne ɔman no nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ntie na mpene nso
na ɔka kyerɛɛ ben hadad abɔfoɔ no sɛ monkɔka nkyerɛ me wura ɔhene sɛ deɛ wobisaa w akoa kane no nyinaa deɛ mɛyɛ na asɛm yi deɛ merentumi menyɛ na abɔfoɔ no kɔ kɔka kyerɛɛ no
na ben hadad soma kɔsee no sɛ mede mmarima bebree bɛba abɛsɛe wo kuro no na wɔasoa hɔ mfuturo wɔn nsamu akɔ anyame no nkum me sɛ manyɛ a
na israel hene buaa sɛ monkɔka sɛ mma deɛ ɔhyɛ akodeɛ nnhoahoa ne ho sɛ deɛ ɔyie
na ɛbaa sɛ ɔtee asɛm yi no na ɔne ahemfo no renom nsa asese mu ɔka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ montoa kuro no na wɔto hyɛɛ kuro no so
na hwɛ odiyifoɔ bi twe pinii israelhene ahab sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie wohunu asafokuo kɛseɛ yi nyinaa hwɛ mede wɔn merehyɛ wo nsa nnɛ na woahunu sɛ mene awurade
na ahab kaa sɛ ɛnam hwan so na ɔse sɛ awurade seɛ nie ɛnam amansini no mmapɔmma mmeranteɛ no so ɛnna ɔkaa sɛ hwan na ɔmfa nkɔbɔ ani na ɔse wo
ɛnna ɔkan amansini mmapɔmma no mmeranteɛ no na wɔyɛ ahanu aduasa mmienu na wɔn akyiri no ɔkan ɔman no nyinaa israel mma nyinaa mpemnson
na wɔfirii adi awigyina na ben hadad anom nsa abo wɔ asese no mu ɔno ne ahemfo aduasa mmienu a wɔboa no no
na amansini mmapɔmma no mmeranteɛ no firii adi kane na ben hadad somaa adɔntenfoɔ na wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ mmarima afiri adi afiri samaria reba
na ɔse sɛ ɔmannwoeɛ so na wɔfirii adie a monkye wɔn animono na sɛ ɔko so nso na wɔfirii adie a monkye wɔn animono
na wɔn deɛ wɔfiri kuro no mu firii adi amansini mmapɔmma no mmeranteɛ no ne dɔm a wɔdii wɔn akyire no
na wɔkumm wɔn mmaako mmaako na siriafoɔ dwanedwanee na israel tii wɔn na siriahene ben hadad tenaa ɔpɔnkɔ so ne apɔnkɔsotefoɔ firi dwanee
na israel hene firii adi kɔ kyekyeree apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam na ɔde okunkɛseɛ kumm siriafoɔ
na odiyifoɔ no twe pinii israel hene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ kɔ na kɔhyɛ wo ho den na hwɛ na hunu deɛ wobɛyɛ na afeda sɛsɛɛ no siriafoɔ bɛforo aba wo so
na siriahene nkoa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ wɔn nyame yɛ mmepɔ nyame enti na wɔn ho yɛɛ den sene yɛn no na sɛ yɛne wɔn koo asaseta so deɛ a anka yɛn ho renyɛ den nsene wɔn anaa
na yei na yɛ tutu ahemfo no firi wɔn dibea na fa amradofoɔ sisi wɔn ananmu
na wo deɛ boaboa ɛdɔm bi ano sɛ ɛdɔm a woahwereɛ no apɔnkɔ sɛ apɔnkɔ no ne nteaseɛnam sɛ nteaseɛnam no na yɛne wɔn nkɔko asaseta so sɛ yɛn ho renyɛ den nsene wɔn anaa na ɔtiee wɔn na ɔyɛɛ saa
na afeda ɔpɛ berɛ mfitiaseɛ no mu ben hadad boaboaa siriafoɔ dɔm ano na ɔforo baa afek sɛ ɔne israel rebɛko
na wɔboaboaa israelfoɔ nso ano na wɔsiesiee wɔn ho na wɔkɔ kɔhyiaa wɔn na israelfoɔ kyeree nsraban wɔn ntentensoɔ sɛ mmirekyie akuo nketewa mmienu na siriafoɔ deɛ wɔyɛɛ asase no ma
na nyankopɔn nipa no twe pinii bɛka kyerɛɛ israel hene sɛ sɛdeɛ awurade seɛ nie ɛsiane sɛ siriafoɔ aka sɛ mmepɔ nyame ne awurade na ɔnyɛ mmonhwa mu nyame nti mede wɔn asafokuo kɛseɛ yi nyinaa bɛhyɛ wo nsa na moahunu sɛ mene awurade
na wɔkyeree nsraban yeinom wɔ yeinom ntentensoɔ nnanson na da a ɛtɔ so nson no wɔde dɔm koo no kɔbɔɔ anim na israelfoɔ no kumm siriafoɔ anammɔnmufoɔ mpemha da koro
na nkaeɛ no dwanedwane kɔɔ afek kuro no mu na ɔfasuo no bu guu nnipa a wɔkaeɛ no mu mpem aduonu nson so na ben hadad deɛ ɔdwane kɔɔ kuro no mu firi pia mu kɔɔ pia mu
na ne nkoa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ hwɛ yɛate sɛ israel fie ahemfo yɛ ahemfo a wɔyɛ adɔeɛ ma yɛmfa ayitoma nkyekyere yɛn asene na yɛmfa ntampehoma mmobɔ yɛn ti na yɛmfiri nkɔ israel hene nkyɛn ebia ɔbɛgye wo kra nkwa
na wɔde ayitoma kyekyeree wɔn asene na wɔde ntampehoma bobɔɔ wɔn ti na wɔbaa israel hene nkyɛn sɛ w akoa ben hadad se ma me kra nnya nkwa ɛ na ɔbisaa sɛ ɔda so te ase ɔyɛ me nua
afei na mmarima no rehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ anim kwan na wɔyɛɛ ntɛm gyee asɛm no na wɔkaa sɛ wo nua ne ben hadad na ɔse monkɔfa no mmra na ben hadad firi baa ne nkyɛn na ɔmaa no foro baa teaseɛnam no mu
na ben hadad ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ nkuro a m agya gyee no w agya nsam no mɛdane mama na te mmorɔno nso damasko fa sɛdeɛ m agya tee no samaria no na ahab kaa sɛ me nso mede apam bɛgya wo kwan ɛnna ɔne no pameeɛ na ɔgyaa no kwan
ɛnna ɔbarima bi a ɔfiri adiyifoɔ mma mu de awurade asɛm ka kyerɛɛ ne yɔnko sɛ bɔ me ɛ na ɔbarima no ampene sɛ ɔbɔ no
na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɛsiane sɛ woantie awurade nti hwɛ wofiri me nkyɛn ha rekɔ ara pɛ a gyata bɛku wo na ɔfiri ne kyɛn kɔeɛ no gyata hunuu no na ɔkum no
na ɔhunuu ɔbarima foforɔ na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ bɔ me ɛ na ɔbarima no bɔɔ no ɔbɔɔ no piraa no
ɛnna odiyifoɔ no kɔ kɔgyinaa ɔkwan no ho twɛn ɔhene na ɔde abotire akyekyere n ani akyiri asakyera ne ho
na ɔhene retwam no ɔbɔnee ɔhene no sɛ w akoa firi kɔɔ ɛko no mu na hwɛ ɔbarima bi manee de ɔbarima bi brɛɛ me sɛ hwɛ ɔbarima yi so na sɛ ɔyera a ɛnneɛ wode wo kra bɛsi ne kra ananmu anaasɛ wobɛtua dwetɛ talente baako
na w akoa reyɛ adeɛ foforɔ no hwɛ ɔdwanneeɛ hɔ ɛnna israel hene kaa sɛ sɛ w atemmuo teɛ ne no wo ara woabu
ɛnna ɔyɛɛ ntɛm yii abotire no firii n ani akyire na israel hene no hunuu no sɛ ɔfiri adiyifoɔ no mu
na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie ɛsiane sɛ woama onipa a mahyira no soɔ afiri wo nsa korɔ nti wo kra bɛsi ne kra ananmu na wo man asi ne man ananmu
ɛnna israel hene no sii mu kɔɔ ne fie a wakum n anim na ne bo afuo na ɔbaa samaria
na yesreelni nabot wɔ bobe turo bi yesreel wɔ samariahene ahab ahemfie ho
na ahab ka kyerɛɛ nabot sɛ fa wo bobe turo no ma me na memfa menyɛ fan turo ɛfiri sɛ ɛbɛn me fie ho na mɛma wo bobe turo a ɛyɛ sene no ahyɛ ananmu anaasɛ wopɛ a mɛma wo ɛho sika
na nabot ka kyerɛɛ ahab sɛ awurade mma yei mpare me sɛ mede m agyanom awunnyadeɛ bɛma woɔ
ɛnna ahab kɔɔ ne fie a wakum n anim na waboto yesreelni nabot asɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ no no nti sɛ waka akyerɛ no sɛ meremfa m agyanom awunnyadeɛ memma wo na ɔdaa ne mpa so danee n ani na wannidi
na ne yere isebel baa ne nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ adɛn na wo honhom aboto sɛɛ na wonnidie yi
na ɔbuaa no sɛ ɛfiri sɛ me ne yesreelni nabot kasae na mesee no sɛ fa wo bobeturo no ma me gye sika anaasɛ nso sɛ wopɛ a mɛma wo bobeturo ahyɛ ananmu na ɔse meremfa me bobeturo no memma wo
ɛnna ne yere isebel ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɛnyɛ wo na wodi israel soɔ sɔre didi na ma wo bo ntɔ wo yam na mede yesreelni nabot bobeturo no bɛma wo
ɛnna ɔde ahab din twerɛtwerɛɛ nwoma na ɔde ne nsɔanodeɛ sosɔɔ ano na ɔsomasoma maa wɔde nwoma no kɔmaa mpanimfoɔ ne adehyeɛ a wɔwɔ ne kurom a wɔne nabot te mu no
na ɔtwerɛɛ nwoma no mu sɛ mompae mma wɔnni mmuada na momfa nabot ntena nkurɔfoɔ no ti
na momfa mmarima baanu a wɔyɛ mmahuhufoɔ nnyina n anim na wɔnni adanseɛ ntia no sɛ woadome onyankopɔn ne ɔhene na momfa no mfiri nkɔsi no aboɔ mma no nwu
ɛnna ne kuro no mufoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne adehyeɛ a wɔte ne kurom no yɛɛ sɛdeɛ isebel kraa wɔn no sɛdeɛ ɔtwerɛɛ nwoma a wɔde kɔmaa wɔn no mu no
wɔpaee sɛ wɔnni mmuada na wɔde nabot tenaa nkurɔfoɔ no ti
na mmarima mmahuhufoɔ baanu ba bɛtenaa n anim na mmarima ahuhufoɔ no dii adanseɛ tiaa nabot ɔman no anim sɛ nabot adome onyankopɔn ne ɔhene na wɔyii no firi kɔɔ kuro no akyi kɔsii no aboɔ maa no wui
ɛnna wɔsoma maa wɔkɔɔ isebel nkyɛn sɛ wɔasi nabot aboɔ na wawu
na isebel tee sɛ wɔasi nabot aboɔ na wawuo no isebel ka kyerɛɛ ahab sɛ sɔre kɔfa yesreelni nabot bobeturo a ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔde ma wo gye sika no di so ɛfiri sɛ nabot nte ase bio na wawu
na ɛbaa sɛ ahab tee sɛ nabot awuo no ahab sɔree sɛ ɔresiane akɔ yesreelni nabot bobeturo no mu akɔfa adi so
ɛnna awurade asɛm baa tisbini elia nkyɛn sɛ
sɔre siane kɔhyia israelhene ahab a ɔwɔ samaria no hwɛ ɔwɔ nabot bobeturo a wasiane kɔ hɔ sɛ ɔrekɔfa adi soɔ no mu
na ka kyerɛ no sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie woadi awu na woafa obi adeɛ adi so na ka kyerɛ no sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie faako a akraman taferee nabot mogya no ɛhɔ na akraman bɛtafere wo nso wo mogya
na ahab ka kyerɛɛ elia sɛ woahu me me tamfo na ɔse mahu wo ɛfiri sɛ woatɔn wo ho ayɛ deɛ ɛyɛ awurade ani so bɔne
hwɛ mede bɔne bɛba wo so mɛpra wo akɔ na matwa ahab babarima biara wɔ israel mu akoa anaa ɔdehyeɛ atwene
na mɛyɛ wo fie sɛ nebat ba yeroboam fie ne ahia ba baasa fie huru a woahuru me bo na woama israel ayɛ bɔne nti
na isebel nso awurade kaa ne ho asɛm sɛ akraman bɛwe isebel nam yesreel fasuo ho
ahab fie mu nipa a ɔbɛwu kuro mu no akraman na ɛbɛwe ne nam na deɛ ɔbɛwu wiram no ewiem nnomaa na ɛbɛdi ne nam
ampa obiara nni hɔ a ɔte sɛ ahab a ɔtɔn ne ho sɛ ɔbɛyɛ awurade ani so bɔne ɛfiri sɛ ne yere isebel hwanyan no
na ɔyɛɛ akyiwadeɛ sɛ sɛ ɔdii ahoni huhuo no akyire sɛdeɛ amorifoɔ a awurade tuu wɔn israelfoɔ anim yɛeɛ no ara
na ahab tee nsɛm yi no ɔsunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu na ɔde ayitoma firaeɛ na ɔdii abuada na ɔdaa ayitoma no mu na n anim yɛɛ siamoo
na awurade asɛm baa tisbini elia nkyɛn sɛ woahunu sɛ ahab abrɛ ne ho ase m anim
ɛsiane sɛ wabrɛ ne ho ase m anim nti meremfa bɔne no memma ne berɛ so ne ba berɛ so na mede bɔne no bɛba ne fie soɔ
na siria ne israel tenaa hɔ mfeɛ mmiɛnsa a ɔko bi nni wɔn ntam
na afe a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa mu no yudahene yehosafat siane baa israel hene nkyɛn
na israel hene ka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ monnim sɛ ramot gilead wɔ yɛn na yɛn deɛ yɛte hɔ komm na yɛnnye mfiri siriahene nsam
na ɔbisaa yehosafat sɛ wo ne me bɛkɔ ramot gilead sa anaa na yehosafat buaa israel hene no sɛ mete sɛ wo me man te sɛ wo man m apɔnkɔ te sɛ w apɔnkɔ
na yehosafat ka kyerɛɛ israel hene sɛ bisa awurade asɛm nnɛ ɛ
ɛnna israel hene boaboaa adiyifoɔ no ano wɔbɛyɛ mmarima ahanan na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ menkɔ ramot gilead menkɔko anaasɛ mennyae na wɔkaa sɛ foro kɔ na awurade de bɛhyɛ ɔhene nsa
ɛnna yehosafat bisaa sɛ awurade diyifoɔ biara nni ha bio a yɛbɛbisa ne hɔ adeɛ anaa
na israel hene ka kyerɛɛ yehosafat sɛ ɔbarima baako bi da so wɔ hɔ a anka yɛbɛtumi abisa awurade afiri ne nkyɛn nanso metane no ɛfiri sɛ ɔnhyɛ me ho nkɔm pa sɛ bɔne nko ɛyɛ imla ba mikaia na yehosafat se mma ɔhene nnka saa
ɛnna israel hene frɛɛ gyaaseni bi na ɔkaa sɛ ma imla ba mikaia nnuru ha ntɛm
na israel hene ne yudahene yehosafat tete wɔn nhennwa so hyehyɛ wɔn ntadeɛ samaria pono ano mpraeɛ so na adiyifoɔ no nyinaa hyehyɛɛ nkɔm wɔn anim
na kenaana ba sedekia ayɛ dadeɛ mmɛn na ɔkaa sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie yeinom na wode bɛsum siriafoɔ de kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛwie wɔn sɛeɛ
na adiyifoɔ no nyinaa hyehyɛɛ nkɔm saa sɛ kɔ ramot gilead na kɔdi siadeɛ na awurade de ahyɛ ɔhene nsa
na ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔkɔfrɛɛ mikaia no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ hwɛ adiyifoɔ no nyinaa de ano korɔ ka asɛmpa kyerɛ ɔhene ma wo nsɛm nyɛ sɛ wɔn mu baako deɛ na ka deɛ ɛyɛ
na mikaia kaa sɛ sɛ awurade te aseɛ yi deɛ awurade bɛka akyerɛ me no ɛno na mɛka
ɛnna ɔbaa ɔhene nkyɛn na ɔhene no bisaa no sɛ mikaia yɛnkɔ ramot gilead nkɔko anaasɛ yɛnnyae na ɔbuaa no sɛ kɔ na kɔdi nim na awurade de ahyɛ ɔhene nsa
na ɔhene no bisaa no sɛ mprɛ ahe ara na menka wo ntam sɛ nka me asɛm bi sɛ nokorɛ nko awurade din mu
na ɔse mahunu israel nyinaa sɛ wɔahwete mmepɔ soɔ sɛ nnwan a wɔnni hwɛfoɔ na awurade se yeinom nni wura ma wɔnsane nkɔ wɔn afie asomdwoeɛ mu
na israel hene ka kyerɛɛ yehosafat sɛ manka mankyerɛ wo sɛ ɔrenhyɛ me ho nkɔm pa biara na mmom bɔne
ɛnna ɔkaa sɛ enti tie awurade asɛm mahunu awurade sɛ ɔte n adwa soɔ na ɔsoro asafo nyinaa gyinagyina ne ho ne nifa ne ne benkum
na awurade kaa sɛ hwan na ɔbɛdaadaa ahab na waforo akɔtɔ wɔ ramot gilead na oyi kaa sɛɛ na oyi kaa sɛɛ
na honhom bi firi bɛgyinaa awurade anim kaa sɛ me na mɛdaadaa no
na awurade bisaa no sɛ wode deɛn na ɔse mɛfiri makɔyɛ atorɔ honhom n adiyifoɔ nyinaa anomu na ɔkaa sɛ wobɛdaadaa no na wobɛtumi nso firi kɔ na kɔyɛ saa
na afei hwɛ awurade de honhom torofoɔ ahyɛ w adiyifoɔ yi nyinaa anomu na awurade aka wo ho bɔne
ɛnna kenaana ba sedekia twe pini bɛbɔɔ mikaia sotorɔ kaa sɛ ɛhe na awurade honhom nam firii me nkyɛn kɔ kasa kyerɛɛ woɔ yi
na mikaia se hwɛ da a wobɛfiri pia mu akɔ pia mu akɔhunta no na wobɛhunu
ɛnna israel hene kaa sɛ kyere mikaia na fa no kɔ kuro no so hwɛfoɔ amon ne ɔhene ba yoas nkyɛn
na kɔka sɛ sɛ ɔhene seɛ nie momfa oyi nto nneduadan mu na momma no ahohiahia aduane nni ne ahohiahia nsuo nnom kɔsi sɛ mɛba no dwoodwoo
na mikaia kaa sɛ sɛ wosane ba dwoodwoo a ɛnneɛ na ɛnyɛ awurade na ɔnam me so kasaeɛ na ɔse mo aman nyinaa montie
na israel hene ne yudahene yehosafat foro kɔɔ ramot gilead
na israel hene ka kyerɛɛ yehosafat sɛ mɛsakyera me ho na makɔ ɔko no ano na wo deɛ hyɛ wo ntadeɛ na israel hene no sakyeraa ne ho na ɔkɔɔ ko no ano
nso na siriahene no ahyɛ ne nteaseɛnam a ɔwɔ no so asafohene aduasa mmienu no sɛ ma monne akumaa anaa ɔkɛseɛ nnko gye israel hene no nko
na nteaseɛnam so asafohene no hunuu yehosafat no wɔkaa sɛ ampa israel hene no nie na wɔmane ne no kɔkoe na yehosafat teaa mu
na nteaseɛnam so asafohene no hunuu sɛ ɛnyɛ israel hene ne no no wɔsane firii n akyi
na ɔbarima bi twee ne tadua mu anibiannasoɔ so na ɔde saa israel hene no mmɔtoam ne nkataboɔ no ntam na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne teaseɛnamkafoɔ no sɛ dane wo ho fa me firi ɛdɔm yi mu na mapira
na ɔko no mu yɛɛ den da no na wɔkura ɔhene no mu maa no gyinaa teaseɛnam no mu siriafoɔ no anim ara na ɔwuu anwummerɛ na apirakuro no mu mogya sene guu teaseɛnam no mu
na wɔpae faa nsraban no mu owiatɔ berɛ sɛ obiara nkɔ ne kurom ne n asase so
na ɔhene no wui na wɔde no baa samaria na wɔsiee ɔhene no samaria
na wɔkɔhohoroo teaseɛnam no mu wɔ samaria tareɛ mu na akraman bɛtaferee ne mogya na mmaa nnwamamfoɔ nso dwaree mu sɛ awurade asɛm a ɔkaeɛ no teɛ no
na ahab ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ne asonse dan a ɔsiiɛ ne nkuro a ɔkyekyereeɛ nyinaa wɔantwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu anaa
na ahab toaa n agyanom wɔ asamando na ne ba ahasia bɛdii n adeɛ
na israelhene ahab afe a ɛtɔ so nnan mu na asa ba yehosafat bɛdii yuda so hene
yehosafat bɛdii hene no na wadi mfirinhyia aduasa nnum na ɔdii hene mfirinhyia aduonu nnum wɔ yerusalem na ne na din de asuba a ɔyɛ silhi ba
na ɔfaa n agya asa kwan nyinaa so wammane amfiri ho na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛtene awurade ani so gye sorɔnsorɔmmea no na wɔanyiyie ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔdeɛ na wɔhyee aduhwam sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ
na asomdwoeɛ bɛdaa yehosafat ne israel hene ntam
na yehosafat ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne ne mmaninneɛ a ɔyɛeɛ ne sɛdeɛ ɔdii ako no wɔantwerɛ no yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu anaa
na mmarima nnwamamfoɔ nkaeɛ a wɔgyaa wɔn n agya asa nna mu no ɔhyee wɔn ase firii asase no so
na ɔhene bi nni edom na ɔhene abadiakyire na na ɔhwɛ akyire sɛ ɔhene
yehosafat yɛɛ tarsis ahyɛn sɛ ɛnkɔ ofir na ɛnkɔpɛ sika kɔkɔɔ nanso ankɔ ɛfiri sɛ ahyɛn no bobɔe wɔ esion geber
ɛno mu na ahab ba ahasia ka kyerɛɛ yehosafat sɛ ma me nkoa ne wo nkoa nkɔ ahyɛn no mu na yehosafat ampene
na yehosafat toaa n agyanom wɔ asamando na wɔsiee no kaa n agyanom ho n agya dawid kuro mu na ne ba yehoram bɛdii n adeɛ
ahab ba ahasia bɛdii israel so hene samaria yudahene yehosafat afe a ɛtɔ so dunson mu na ɔdii israel so mfeɛ mmienu
na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛyɛ awurade ani so bɔne na ɔfaa n agya kwan so ne ne na kwan so ne nebat ba yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no kwan so
na ɔsomm baal na ɔsɔree no na ɔhuruu awurade israel nyankopɔn bo sɛdeɛ n agya yɛeɛ no ara
﻿ na ahab wuo akyiri no moab tee israel so atua
na ahasia firii n abansoro dan a ɛwɔ samaria no mpomma mu te hwee fam na ɔyaree na ɔsomaa abɔfoɔ na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ monkɔ nkɔbisa ekron nyame baalsebub sɛ mɛnya yadeɛ yi mu nkwa anaa
na awurade bɔfoɔ ka kyerɛɛ tisbini elia sɛ sɔre foro kɔhyia samariahene abɔfoɔ no na bisa wɔn sɛ onyankopɔn bi nni israel nti na morekɔ akɔbisa ekron nyame baalsebub hɔ adeɛ yi anaa
enti awurade se mpa a woaforɔ no woremfiri so nsiane na wuo na wobɛwuo na elia kɔeɛ
ɛnna abɔfoɔ no sane baa ne nkyɛn na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ adɛn na moasane aba yi
na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɔbarima bi foro bɛhyiaa yɛn na ɔka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ monsane nkɔ ɔhene a ɔsomaa mo no nkyɛn nkɔka nkyerɛ no sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie enti onyame bi nni israel nti na woasoma rekɔ ekron nyame baalsebub hɔ adebisa yi yei nti mpa a woaforɔ no woremfiri so nsiane na wuo na wobɛwuo
na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ ɔbarima a ɔforo ba bɛhyiaa mo na ɔkaa mo nsɛm yi no te sɛn
na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ atadeɛ a ɔhyɛ no yɛ aboa nwi na nwoma abɔsoɔ bɔ n asene na ɔse ɛyɛ tisbini elia
na ɔsomaa aduonum so safohene ne n aduonum no kɔɔ ne nkyɛn na ɔforo kɔɔ elia nkyɛn na hwɛ na ɔte bepɔ no atifi na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ nyankopɔn nipa ɔhene se siane bra
na elia bua see aduonum so safohene no sɛ sɛ nyankopɔn nipa ne me a ogya mfiri soro nsiane mmɛhye wo ne w aduonum no na ogya firi soro ba bɛhyee ɔno ne n aduonum no
na ɔsane somaa aduonum so safohene foforɔ ne n aduonum no kɔɔ ne nkyɛn na ɔsee no sɛ nyankopɔn nipa ɔhene ahyɛ sɛ yɛ ntɛm siane bra
na elia bua see wɔn sɛ sɛ nyankopɔn nipa ne me a ogya mfiri soro nsiane mmɛhye wo ne w aduonum na nyankopɔn gya firi soro ba bɛhyee ɔno ne n aduonum no
na ɔhene somaa aduonum so safohene a ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa ne n aduonum na aduonum so safohene a ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no foro kɔe na ɔkɔkotoo ne nankoroma anim elia anim na ɔpaa no kyɛw sɛ nyankopɔn nipa ma me kra ne wo nkoa aduonum yi kra boɔ nyɛ den w ani so
hwɛ ogya afiri ɔsoro aduru abɛhye akane aduonum so asafohene baanu no ne wɔn aduonum aduonum no na afei ma me kra boɔ nyɛ den w ani so
ɛnna awurade bɔfoɔ ka kyerɛɛ elia sɛ ɛne no nsiane nkɔ nsuro n anim na ɔsɔree ne no siane kɔɔ ɔhene no nkyɛn
na elia ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene no sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie ɛsiane sɛ woasoma abɔfoɔ sɛ wɔnkɔbisa ekron nyame baalsebub hɔ adeɛ sɛdeɛ onyame bi nni israel a wɔkɔbisa no asɛm nti mpa a woaforɔ no woremfiri so nsiane na wuo na wobɛwuo
na ɔwui sɛ awurade asɛm a elia kaeɛ no teɛ na yehoram sii n ananmu dii hene yudahene yehosafat ba yehoram afe a ɛtɔ so mmienu so ɛfiri sɛ na ɔnni ɔbabarima
na ahasia ho nsɛm nkaeɛ deɛ ɔyɛeɛ no wɔntwerɛɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu anaa
na ɛbaa sɛ awurade rebɛfa elia ahum mu akɔ ɔsoro no na elia ne elisa firi gilgal rekɔ
na elia ka kyerɛɛ elisa sɛ mesrɛ wo tena ha ɛ na awurade asoma me betel na elisa kaa sɛ sɛ awurade te aseɛ na wo kra te aseɛ yi merennya wo hɔ na wɔsii mu kɔɔ betel
na adiyifoɔ mma a wɔwɔ betel no firii adi baa elisa nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ wonim sɛ ɛnnɛ awurade rebɛfa wo wura afiri wo nkyɛn akɔ na ɔse aane me nso menim monyɛ komm
na elia ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ elisa tena ha ɛ na awurade asoma me yeriko na ɔse sɛ awurade te aseɛ na wo kra te aseɛ yi merennya wo hɔ na wɔkɔɔ yeriko
na adiyifoɔ mma a wɔwɔ yeriko no twe baa elisa nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ wonim sɛ ɛnnɛ awurade bɛfa wo wura afiri wo nkyɛn na ɔse aane me nso menim monyɛ komm
na elia ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ tena ha ɛ awurade asoma me yordan ano na ɔse sɛ awurade te aseɛ na wo kra te aseɛ yi merennya wo hɔ na wɔn baanu no kɔe
na adiyifoɔ mma no mu aduonum kɔ kɔgyinagyinaa wɔn ntentensoɔ akyirikyiri na wɔn baanu no gyinaa yordan ano
na elia faa ne ngusoɔ bobɔ de bɔɔ nsuo no mu na ɛpae kɔɔ ha ne ha na wɔn baanu no nam asase pɛsɛɛ so twae
na ɛbaa sɛ wɔtwaeɛ no elia ka kyerɛɛ elisa sɛ bisa deɛ menyɛ mma woɔ ansa na wɔafa me afiri wo nkyɛn akɔ na elisa kaa sɛ ma wo honhom abupɛn mmienu mmra me so
na ɔkaa sɛ woabisa adeɛ a ɛyɛ den sɛ wohu me sɛ wɔrefa me afiri wo nkyɛn a ɛbɛyɛ saa ama wo na sɛ anyɛ saa a ɛrenyɛ
na ɛbaa sɛ wɔnam rekorɔ na wɔrekasa no hwɛ ogya teaseɛnam ne ogya apɔnkɔ ba bɛpaee wɔn baanu no ntam na elia faa ahum mu foro kɔɔ ɔsoro
na elisa hwɛe na ɔteaa mu sɛ m agya m agya israel teaseɛnam ne n apɔnkɔsotefoɔ na ɔrekorɔ no na wanhu no bio na ɔsɔɔ n atadeɛ mu suanee mu mmienu
na ɔmaa elia ngusoɔ a ɛfiri ne ho guiɛ no so na ɔsane bɛgyinaa yordan ano
na ɔde elia ngusoɔ a ɛfiri ne ho guiɛ no bɔɔ nsuo no mu kaa sɛ ɛhe na awurade elia nyankopɔn no ara wɔ na ɔbɔɔ nsuo no mu na ɛpae kɔɔ ha ne ha na elisa twae
na adiyifoɔ mma a wɔwɔ yeriko a wɔwɔ ntentensoɔ no hunuu no na wɔkaa sɛ elia honhom abɛsi elisa so na wɔba bɛhyiaa no na wɔkotoo no butuu fam
na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ hwɛ mmarima aduonum a wɔn ho yɛ den wɔ wo nkoa mu ma wɔnkɔ nkɔhwehwɛ wo wura na ebia sɛsɛɛ awurade honhom ama ne so kɔ de no akɔto mmepɔ no bi so anaa mmonhwa no bi mu na ɔse monnsoma
na wɔhyɛɛ no ara maa no yɛɛ no ahometeɛ no ɔkaa sɛ monsoma na wɔsomaa mmarima aduonum na wɔkɔhwehwɛ no nnansa nanso wɔanhu no
na wɔsane baa ne nkyɛn berɛ a ɔretwɛn wɔ yeriko na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ manka mankyerɛ mo sɛ monnkɔ anaa
na kuro no mufoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ elisa sɛ hwɛ kuro yi dabea yɛ fɛ sɛdeɛ me wura hunu yi nanso nsuo no nyɛ na asase no nso awu
na ɔse mommrɛ me ayowa foforɔ na momfa nkyene ngu mu na wɔde brɛɛ no
na ɔfirii adi kɔɔ nsuo aniwa no ho na ɔkɔhwiee nkyene no guu mu hɔ na ɔkaa sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie masa nsuo yi yadeɛ owuo anaa apɔn biara remfiri mu hɔ mma bio
na nsuo no yɛɛ yie de bɛsi nnɛ da yi sɛdeɛ elisa kaeɛ no
na ɔfirii hɔ foro kɔɔ betel na ɔreforo akɔ ɔkwan no soɔ no mmɔfra nketewa bi firii kuro no mu ba bɛgoroo ne ho ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ atipa foro bra ɛ atipa foro bra ɛ
ɛnna ɔdanee ne ho na ɔhunuu wɔn no ɔde awurade din domee wɔn na asisirebereɛ mmienu firi kwaeɛ no mu ba bɛtetee wɔn mu mmɔfra aduanan mmienu
na ɔfiri hɔ kɔɔ bepɔ karmel ho na ɔfirii hɔ nso sane baa samaria
na ahab ba yehoram bɛdii israel so hene samaria yudahene yehosafat afe a ɛtɔ so dunwɔtwe so na ɔdii hene mfeɛ dummienu
na ɔyɛɛ awurade ani so bɔne deɛ nanso na ɛnte sɛ n agya ne ne na deɛ no na ɔyii baal honi a n agya yɛeɛ no hɔ
nanso ɔbataa nebat ba yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne ho na wansane amfiri ho
na moabhene mesa yɛ nnwanyɛnfoɔ na ɔmaa israel hene nnwanten mma mpemha ne adwennini mpemha ho nwi
na ahab wuiɛ no moabhene tee israel hene anim atua
na ɔhene yehoram firii samaria da no ara na ɔkɔkanee israel nyinaa
na ɔkɔe na ɔsoma ma wɔkɔɔ yudahene yehosafat nkyɛn sɛ moabhene ate m anim atua na wo ne me bɛkɔ ne moab akɔko anaa na ɔse mɛkɔ mete sɛ wo me man te sɛ wo man m apɔnkɔ te sɛ w apɔnkɔ
na ɔkaa sɛ ɔkwan bɛn so na yɛbɛfa akorɔ na ɔse edom serɛ so kwan no
ɛnna israel hene yuda hene ne edomhene sii mu kɔeɛ na wɔtwaa nnanson kwan na nsuo nni hɔ mma dɔm no ne mmoa a wɔdi wɔn akyire
na israel hene kaa sɛ ao awurade afrɛ ahemfo baasa yi ahyia sɛ wɔde wɔn rekɔhyɛ moab nsa
na yehosafat se awurade diyifoɔ bi nni ha a yɛbɛkɔ ne nkyɛn akɔbisa awurade na israel hene nkoa mu baako buaa sɛ ɛha na safat ba elisa a ɔhwiee nsuo guu elia nsa soɔ no wɔ
na yehosafat kaa sɛ ampa ɔyɛ awurade diyifoɔ kɛseɛ ɛnna israel hene ne yehosafat ne edomhene siane kɔɔ ne nkyɛn
na elisa ka kyerɛɛ israel hene no sɛ ɛdeɛn na me ne wo wɔ yɛ kɔ w agya adiyifoɔ ne wo na adiyifoɔ no nkyɛn na israel hene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ dabi na awurade afrɛ ahemfo baasa yi ahyia sɛ ɔde wɔn rekɔhyɛ moab nsa
na elisa kaa sɛ sɛ asafo awurade a megyina n anim te aseɛ yi sɛ ɛnyɛ yudahene yehosafat anim na mehwɛ a anka merenhwɛ wo na mahu wo
na afei momfa sankubɔni mmrɛ me na sankubɔni no rebɔ no awurade nsa baa ne so
na ɔkaa sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie mɛma nsuo ahyɛ amena a emu aweɛ yi ma
na sɛ awurade seɛ nie morenhunu mframa na morenhunu osuo nanso nsuo bɛyɛ bonhwa yi ma na moanom mo ne mo nantwikuo ne mo mmoa
na yei nso yɛ mmrɛ wɔ awurade ani so na ɔbɛyi moab nso ahyɛ mo nsa
na mobɛbubu wɔn nkuro akɛseɛ ho afasuo na moafa nkuro a ɛyɛ fɛ nyinaa na moabubu wɔn nkuro akɛseɛ nyinaa na moasisi nsuo aniwa nyinaa na mode aboɔ asɛe mfu pa nyinaa
na anɔpa a wɔrebɔ aduane afɔdeɛ no hwɛ nsuo firii edom kwan so bae na nsuo no yɛɛ asase no ma
na moabfoɔ nyinaa tee sɛ ahemfo no reforo aba ne wɔn abɛko no wɔfrɛfrɛɛ wɔn a wɔbɛtumi amia amiadeɛ nyinaa ɛfiri mmɔfra so de kɔsi mpanimfoɔ so na wɔbɛgyinaa ɛhyeɛ so
na wɔsɔree anɔpatutu a owia repue nsuo no soɔ no moabfoɔ hunuu nsuo no agya nohoa sɛ ɛbere sɛ mogya
na wɔkaa sɛ mogya nie ahemfo no ne wɔn ho adi nnɔmmata akunkum wɔn ho na afei moabfoɔ monkɔfa asadeɛ
na wɔbaa israel nsraban mu no israel sɔre kunkumm moabfoɔ na wɔdwanee wɔn anim na wɔtaa wɔn kɔkunkumm moabfoɔ
na nkuro no wɔdwirii na mfu pa nyinaa wɔtotoo aboɔ guguu so mmaako mmaako kɔsii sɛ ɛso kataeɛ na wɔsisii nsuo aniwa nyinaa na wɔbubuu nnua pa nyinaa gye kir haraset na wɔgyaa n aboɔ na ntɔmmoɔtofoɔ kɔtwaa ho hyiae bɔɔ no
na moabhene hunuu sɛ ɛdɔm no ano ayɛ den papa ama no no ɔfaa mmarima ahanson a wɔtwe nkrantɛ kaa ne ho sɛ ɔrete mu akɔ edomhene ho nanso wɔantumi
ɛnna ɔfaa n abakan a anka ɔbɛsi n ananmu adi hene no na ɔde no bɔɔ ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ ɔfasuo no so na abufuo kɛseɛ baa israel mu na wɔfirii ne ho sane baa wɔn asase so
na adiyifoɔ mma no mu baako yere teaa mu ka kyerɛɛ elisa sɛ w akoa me kunu awu na wo ara wonim sɛ na w akoa suro awurade na ɔkafoɔ aba rebɛfa me mma baanu akɔyɛ ne nkoa
na elisa bisaa no sɛ ɛdeɛn na menyɛ memma woɔ kyerɛ me ɛ ɛdeɛn na wowɔ wɔ efie na ɔbuaa sɛ w afenaa nni hwee fie gye ngo ahina baako pɛ
na elisa kaa sɛ firi adi kɔfemfɛm nhina wɔ wɔn a wɔtete bɛn woɔ nyinaa nkyɛn nhina hunu ma no nnɔɔso
na sɛ woba mu a to wo ne wo mma no pono mu na hwiehwie gu nhina no nyinaa mu na fa deɛ ayɛ ma no sisi nkyɛn
na ɔfirii ne nkyɛn kɔe na ɔkɔtoo ne ho ne ne mma pono mu wɔn deɛ wɔde nhina no brɛɛ no na ɔno nso hwiehwie guguu mu
na ɛbaa sɛ nhina no yeyɛɛ amaama no ɔka kyerɛɛ ne ba sɛ fa ahina bi brɛ me bio na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ahina biara nni hɔ bio na ngo no twae
ɛnna ɔba bɛka kyerɛɛ nyankopɔn nipa no na ɔkaa sɛ kɔ na kɔtɔn ngo no na fa tua wo ka na wo ne wo mma nni deɛ aka no ntena ase
na da bi elisa sene kɔɔ sunem na ɔbaa ɔdefoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a ɔhyɛɛ no ma ɔdidiiɛ na daa ɔretwam a ɔmane hɔ kɔdidi
na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne kunu sɛ hwɛ mahunu sɛ nyankopɔn nipa kronkron ne oyi a ɔbɛsene yɛn nkyɛn daa yi
ma yɛnyɛ abansoro fasuo mu pia ketewa bi na yɛmfa mpadua ɛpono adwa ne kaneadua nsisi hɔ mma no na sɛ ɔba yɛn nkyɛn a wamane akɔ hɔ
na da bi ɔbaa hɔ na ɔmane kɔɔ abansoro pia no mu kɔdaa hɔ
na ɔka kyerɛɛ n abɔfra gehasi sɛ kɔfrɛ sunemni no bra na ɔkɔfrɛɛ no bae na ɔbɛgyinaa n anim
na elisa ka kyerɛɛ gehasi sɛ bisa no sɛ hwɛ wode ɔhaw yi nyinaa aha wo ho ama yɛn ɛdeɛn na yɛnyɛ mma woɔ wowɔ asɛm bi a wɔnkɔka nkyerɛ ɔhene anaa ɔsafohene na ɔse me deɛ mete me nkurɔfoɔ mu
na ɔbisaa sɛ gehasi ɛdeɛn na wɔnyɛ mma no na gehasi kaa sɛ ampa ɔnni ba na ne kunu nso anyini
na elisa kaa sɛ frɛ no na ɔfrɛɛ no na ɔbɛgyinaa ɛpono ano
na ɔkaa sɛ afeda sɛsɛberɛ yi mu no wobɛwo ɔba na ɔse nyɛ saa me wura nyankopɔn nipa nni atorɔ nkyerɛ w afenaa
nanso ɔbaa no nyinsɛnee na ɔwoo ɔbabarima afeda no mu berɛ a elisa ka kyerɛɛ no no mu
na abɔfra no nyinii na da bi ɔfirii adi kɔɔ n agya nkyɛn wɔ ayutwafoɔ nkyɛn
na ɔka kyerɛɛ n agya sɛ me ti me ti na agya no ka kyerɛɛ aberanteɛ bi sɛ ma no so kɔma ne na
na ɔmaa no so de no brɛɛ ne na na ɔde no tenaa ne srɛ so kɔsii awigyina na ɔwui
na ɔforo de no kɔtoo nyankopɔn nipa no mpa no so na ɔtoo ɛpono no mu na ɔfirii adi
na ɔkɔfrɛɛ ne kunu sɛ mesrɛ wo soma mmeranteɛ no mu baako ne mfunumu abereɛ no mu baako brɛ me na mentutu mmirika menkɔ nyankopɔn nipa no nkyɛn na memmra
na ɔbisaa no sɛ adɛn nti na wopɛ sɛ wokɔ ne nkyɛn nnɛ yi ɛnyɛ ɔsrane foforɔ na ɛnyɛ homeda na ɔbaa no kaa sɛ ɛnyɛ hwee
na ɔhyehyɛɛ afunumubereɛ no na ɔka kyerɛɛ n abɔfra no sɛ ka no kɔ ara ngo ammirikatuo no mu gye sɛ meka mekyerɛ wo ansa
na ɔsii mu na ɔbɛduruu nyankopɔn nipa no nkyɛn karmel bepɔ so na ɛbaa sɛ nyankopɔn nipa no hunuu no akyirikyiri no ɔka kyerɛɛ n abɔfra gehasi sɛ hwɛ sunemni no nie
afei tu mmirika kɔhyia no na bisa no sɛ wo ho yɛ anaa wo kunu ho yɛ anaa abɔfra no nso ho yɛ anaa na ɔbuaa sɛ ɛyɛ
na ɔduruu nyankopɔn nipa no nkyɛn bepɔ no soɔ no ɔbɛsosɔɔ ne nan na gehasi twe pinii sɛ ɔrebɛsum no na nyankopɔn nipa no kaa sɛ gyaa no na ne kra werɛ aho wɔ ne mu nanso awurade de ahunta me na wanka ankyerɛ me
na ɔbaa no kaa sɛ mebɛsrɛɛ me wura hɔ ɔba manka sɛ nnaadaa me anaa
ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ gehasi sɛ bɔ abɔsoɔ na fa me poma kura na kɔ woto obi a nkyea no nso obiara kyea wo a nnye no so na fa me poma yi kɔto abɔfra no anim
na abɔfra no na kaa sɛ sɛ awurade te aseɛ na wo kra te aseɛ yi merennya wo hɔ ɛnna ɔsɔre dii n akyi
na gehasi dii wɔn anim kɔe na ɔde poma no kɔtoo abɔfra no anim nanso wante nne biara na wanhunu nkwa ho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ biara na ɔsane kɔhyiaa no na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ abɔfra no nnyaneeɛ
na elisa duruu fie hɔ no ɔhunuu sɛ abɔfra no awu da ne mpa so
ɛnna ɔkɔɔ mu na ɔtoo wɔn baanu pono mu na ɔbɔɔ awurade mpaeɛ
na ɔforo kɔbutuu abɔfra no so na ɔde n ano butuu n ano na ɔde n ani butuu n ani so na ɔde ne nsam totoo ne nsam na ɔponoo ne mu abɔfra no so na abɔfra no honam yɛɛ hye
ɛnna ɔsane ba bɛnantee ɛdan no mu dii hɔ akɔneaba na ɔforo kɔɔ bio kɔponoo ne mu wɔ ne so ɛnna abɔfra no nwansii mprɛnson na abɔfra no buee n ani
na ɔfrɛɛ gehasi sɛ frɛ sunemni no na ɔfrɛɛ no na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn na ɔkaa sɛ fa wo ba no
ɛnna ɔba bɛhwee ne nan ase kotoo no butuu fam na ɔfaa ne ba no firii adi
na elisa sane baa gilgal na ɛkɔm aba asase no so na adiyifoɔ mma no tete n anim na ɔka kyerɛɛ n abɔfra sɛ fa ɛsɛnkɛseɛ si so na noa aduane ma adiyifoɔ mma no
na ɔbaako firi kɔɔ wiram sɛ ɔrekɔtete fan na ɔkɔhunuu wiram homa bi na ɔtetee so wiram ɛferɛ ne ntoma ma na ɔba bɛtwitwaa mu guu ɛsɛn a aduane wɔ mu no mu nso na ɔnnim n adeban
ɛnna wɔhwie maa nnipa no sɛ wɔnni na wɔredi aduane no bie no wɔteaa mu sɛ awuduro wɔ ɛsɛne no mu onyame nipa na wɔantumi anni
na ɔkaa sɛ ɛnneɛ momfa esiam mmra na ɔde guu ɛsɛn no mu na ɔkaa sɛ hwie ma nkurɔfoɔ no na wɔnni na biribi bɔne bi nni ɛsɛn no mu bio
na ɔbarima bi nso firi baal salisa bae na ɔbrɛɛ nyankopɔn nipa no aba a ɛdi kan paanoo atokoɔ paanoo aduonu ne ayuo foforɔ a wɔnhwaneeɛ na ɔkaa sɛ fa ma nkurɔfoɔ no na wɔnni
na ne somfoɔ no bisaa sɛ ɛdeɛn memfa yei mensi nnipa ɔha anim anaa na ɔkaa bio sɛ fa ma nkurɔfoɔ no na wɔnni na sɛ awurade seɛ nie wɔbɛdi na wɔagya bi
ɛnna ɔde sii wɔn anim na wɔdii na wɔgyaa bi sɛdeɛ awurade asɛm no teɛ no
na siriahene sahene naaman yɛ onipa titire wɔ ne wura anim na ɔwɔ animuonyam ɛfiri sɛ ɔno so na awurade nam gyee siria na onipa no yɛ dɔmmarima a ɔtumi ne ho nso na ɔyare kwata
na siria asafo no mu bi akɔto ahyɛ israelfoɔ so afa abaayewa kumaa bi dommum aba na ɔsom naaman yere
na ɔka kyerɛɛ n awuraa sɛ aa sɛ anka me wura wɔ odiyifoɔ a ɔwɔ samaria no anim a ɛnneɛ anka ɔbɛsa ne kwata yi ama no
ɛnna ɔkɔ kɔka kyerɛɛ ne wura sɛ sɛɛ ne sɛɛ na abaayewa a ɔfiri israel asase soɔ no ka
na siriahene no kaa sɛ kɔ na bra na mɛtwerɛ israel hene no nwoma na ɔsii mu kɔe na ɔfaa dwetɛ dwetikɛseɛ du ne sika nnwetɛbena mpemnsia ne ntadeɛ nsakyeraho du kurae
na ɔde nwoma no brɛɛ israel hene sɛ sɛ nwoma yi ka wo nsa a hwɛ masoma m akoa naaman aba wo nkyɛn sɛ sa ne kwata no ma no
na ɛbaa sɛ israel hene kenkan nwoma no ɔsunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu kaa sɛ onyankopɔn ne me na makum na mama nkwa sɛ oyi resoma ama wɔaba me nkyɛn sɛ mensa obi kwata yi ampa monhwɛ nhunu sɛ asɛm na ɔrepɛ me
na nyankopɔn nipa elisa tee sɛ israel hene asunsuane ne ntadeɛ mu no ɔsoma maa wɔkɔɔ ɔhene no nkyɛn sɛ adɛn nti na woasunsuane wo ntadeɛ mu ma no mmra me nkyɛn ɛ na ɔnhunu sɛ odiyifoɔ bi wɔ israel
ɛnna naaman ne n apɔnkɔ ne ne nteaseɛnam ba bɛgyinaa elisa fie pono akyi
na elisa somaa ɔbɔfoɔ maa no kɔɔ ne nkyɛn sɛ kɔ na kɔdware yordan mu mprɛnson na wo honam bɛsane aba wo ho na wo ho afi
ɛnna naaman bo fuiɛ na ɔsii mu kɔe kaa sɛ hwɛ mesusuu sɛ fire na ɔbɛfiri aba abɛgyina hɔ abɔ awurade ne nyankopɔn din na ɔde ne nsa asra hɔ na wasa kwata no
damasko nsubɔntene abana ne parpar nyɛ nsene israel nsuo nyinaa anka merennware mu na me ho mfi anaa na ɔdanee ne ho de abufuo sii mu
na ne nkoa twe pinii bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ m agya sɛ ade kɛseɛ bi na odiyifoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ wo a anka worenyɛ anaa na nkantom sɛ waka akyerɛ wo sɛ kɔdware na wo ho mfi
ɛnna ɔsiane de ne ho kɔbɔɔ yordan mu mprɛnson sɛdeɛ nyankopɔn nipa asɛm no teɛ no na ne honam sane baa mu sɛ abɔfra ketewa honam na ne ho firiiɛ
na ɔsane baa nyankopɔn nipa no nkyɛn ɔno ne n asafo nyinaa na ɔba bɛgyinaa n anim kaa sɛ hwɛ mahunu sɛ onyankopɔn bi nni asase biara so sɛ israel nko na afei gye akyɛdeɛ yi w akoa nsam
na ɔse sɛ awurade a megyina n anim te aseɛ yi merennye hwee na ɔhyɛɛ no sɛ ɔnnye nanso wampene
na naaman kaa sɛ sɛ ɛnte saa a ma wɔmfa dɔteɛ a mfunumupɔnkɔ mmienu bɛtumi asoa mma w akoa na w akoa remmɔ ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ anaa afɔdeɛ biara mma onyame biara bio sɛ awurade nko
asɛm yi mu nko na awurade mfa nkyɛ w akoa sɛ me wura rekɔ rimon fie akɔsɔre hɔ na ɔtwere me nsa soɔ na mekoto rimon fie sɛ mekoto rimon fie a awurade mfa nkyɛ w akoa asɛm yi mu
na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ kɔ asomdwoeɛ mu na naaman firii ne nkyɛn kɔɔ kwantiaa bi
na nyankopɔn nipa elisa abɔfra gehasi kaa sɛ hwɛ me wura agyaa siriani naaman yi sɛ wannye deɛ ɔde baeɛ no ne nsam sɛ awurade te aseɛ yi mɛtu mmirika mati no makɔgye ne hɔ biribi
na gehasi tii naaman na naaman hunuu sɛ obi de mmirika di n akyire no ɔfiri teaseɛnam no mu sii fam bɛhyiaa no kaa sɛ asomdwoeɛ mu anaa
na ɔse asomdwoeɛ mu me wura asoma me sɛ hwɛ seesei mmeranteɛ baanu a wɔfiri adiyifoɔ mma no mu firi efraim bepɔ so aba me nkyɛn mesrɛ wo ma wɔn dwetɛ talente baako ne ntadeɛ nsakyeraho mmienu
na naaman kaa sɛ pene na gye talente mmienu na ɔhyɛɛ no na ɔkyekyeree dwetɛ talente mmienu no mmoa mmienu ne ntadeɛ nsakyeraho mmienu no na ɔde soaa ne mmeranteɛ mu baanu na wɔsoa dii n anim
na ɔduruu kokoɔ no ho no ɔgyee wɔn nsam na ɔde kɔguu fie na ɔgyaa mmarima no kwan maa wɔkɔe
na ɔno deɛ ɔba bɛgyinaa ne wura anim na elisa bisaa no sɛ gehasi ɛhe na wofiri reba na ɔse w akoa nkɔɔ baabiara
na ɔbisaa no sɛ m akoma ne wo ankɔ berɛ a ɔbarima no danee ne ho firii ne teaseɛnam mu bɛhyiaa woɔ no anaa berɛ a wɔgye dwetɛ na wɔgye ntadeɛ ne ngo nnua ne bobe nturo ne nnwan ne anantwie ne nkoa ne mfenaa nie
na naaman kwata no bɛfam wo ne w asefoɔ ho daa na ɔfirii n anim firii adie na kwata ayɛ no fitaa sɛ sukyerɛmma
na adiyifoɔ mma no ka kyerɛɛ elisa sɛ hwɛ w anim ha a yɛteɛ yi yɛ hiahiaa papa ma yɛn
ma yɛnkɔ yordan ano na yɛnkɔfa mpuna mmaako mmaako mfiri hɔ na yɛnsiesie baabi wɔ hɔ ntena hɔ na ɔse monkɔ ɛ
na ɔbaako kaa sɛ pene na ɛne wo nkoa nkɔ na ɔbuaa sɛ me nso mɛkɔ
na ɔne wɔn sii mu kɔe na wɔduruu yordan ano no wɔbubuu nnua no
na ɔbaako rebu dua no n akuma no ti firi tɔɔ nsuo mu na ɔteaa mu sɛ ao me wura wɔkɔfɛmee oo
na nyankopɔn nipa no bisaa sɛ ɛhe na ɛtɔeɛ na ɔkyerɛɛ no hɔ na ɔtwaa dua bi too hɔ na dadeɛ no bɛtɛɛ ani
na ɔkaa sɛ ma so fa na ɔtenee ne nsa fae
na siriahene ne israel bɛdii ako na ɔne ne nkoa tuu agyina sɛ ɛha ne ha na mɛbɔ me nsraban
na nyankopɔn nipa no soma maa wɔkɔɔ israel hene nkyɛn sɛ hwɛ yie na wɔamfa saa bea yi so ɛfiri sɛ ɛhɔ na siriafoɔ nam reba
na israel hene soma maa wɔkɔɔ faako a nyankopɔn nipa no ka kyerɛɛ no na ɔtuu no ɛho foɔ no hɔ na ɔsraa hɔ ɛnyɛ prɛko na ɛnyɛ mprenu nso
ɛnna siriahene akoma peree no asɛm yi ho na ɔfrɛɛ ne nkoa ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ morenkyerɛ me yɛn mu deɛ ɔwɔ israel hene afa
na ne nkoa no mu baako kaa sɛ me wura ɔhene ɛnte saa na mmom odiyifoɔ elisa a ɔwɔ israel no na ɔka nsɛm a woka no wo dabekyire no kyerɛ israel hene
na ɔse monkɔ nkɔsra baabi a ɔwɔ na mensoma mma wɔnkɔfa no mmra na wɔkyerɛɛ no sɛ hwɛ ɔwɔ dotan
ɛnna ɔsomaa apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam ne dɔm kɛseɛ kɔɔ hɔ na wɔduruu anadwo na wɔbɛtwaa kuro no ho hyiae
na nyankopɔn nipa no somfoɔ tuaa nhema sɛ ɔresɔre afiri adie no na hwɛ ɛdɔm ne apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam atwa kuro no ho ahyia na n abɔfra no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ao me wura yɛbɛyɛ dɛn
na ɔse nsuro na wɔn a wɔka yɛn ho dɔɔso sene wɔn a wɔka wɔn ho no
na elisa bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ awurade bue n ani na ɔnhunu na awurade buee aberanteɛ no ani no ɔhunui na hwɛ ogya apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam ayɛ bepɔ no so ma atwa elisa ho ahyia
ɛnna siriafoɔ siane baa ne so na elisa bɔɔ awurade mpaeɛ sɛ mesrɛ wo fa anifira bɔ dɔm yi na ɔde anifira bɔɔ wɔn sɛdeɛ elisa asɛm no teɛ no
na elisa ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ ɛnyɛ ɔkwan nie na ɛnyɛ kuro no nie monni m akyi na memfa mo nkɔ ɔbarima a morehwehwɛ no no nkyɛn na ɔde wɔn kɔɔ samaria
na ɛbaa sɛ wɔduruu samaria no elisa bɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ awurade bue wɔn ani na wɔnhunu na awurade buee wɔn ani na wɔhunui na hwɛ na wɔwɔ samaria mfimfini
na israel hene hunuu wɔn no ɔbisaa elisa sɛ m agya memmobɔ wɔn anaa
na ɔbuaa sɛ dabi mmobɔ wɔn deɛ wode wo nkrantɛ ne wo tadua afa no dommum no na wobɔ no fa aduane ne nsuo sisi wɔn anim na wɔnni na wɔnnom na wɔnkɔ wɔn wura nkyɛn
na ɔtoo ɛpono kɛseɛ maa wɔn na wɔdidiiɛ na wɔnomeeɛ no ɔgyaa wɔn kwan na wɔsii mu kɔɔ wɔn wura nkyɛn na siria fomfafoɔ asafo no antoa so amma israel asase so bio
na ɛno akyiri no siriahene ben hadad boaa ne dɔm nyinaa ano hyiae na ɔforo ba bɛtuaa samaria
na ɛkɔm kɛseɛ baa samaria na hwɛ wɔkaa wɔn hyɛɛ mu ara de kɔsii sɛ wɔtɔn afunumu ti gyee nnwetɛbena aduɔwɔtwe na mmuruburo bini kab abupɛn nnan mu baako gyee nnwetɛbena nnum
na israel hene retwam ɔfasuo no soɔ no ɔbaa bi bɔn no sɛ owura ɔhene boa me
na ɔse sɛ awurade ammoa wo a mɛfiri he na maboa woɔ ɛmfiri ayuporebea anaa nsa kyi amena mu
na ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɛdeɛn na ayɛ woɔ na ɔse ɔbaa yi ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ fa wo ba ma yɛnni ne nam nnɛ na yɛadi me ba nam ɔkyena
na yɛnoaa me ba no weeɛ na adeɛ kyeeɛ no mesee no sɛ fa wo ba bra ma yɛnwe na ɔde ne ba no ahunta
na ɔhene tee ɔbaa no nsɛm no ɔsunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu na ɔretwam ɔfasuo no soɔ no nkurɔfoɔ no hwɛe na ɔfira ayitoma wɔ aseɛ de akata ne honam ani
ɛnna ɔkaa sɛ sɛ wɔankum safat ba elisa nnɛ da yi a onyankopɔn nyɛ me sei na ɔnto so sei
nanso na elisa te ne fie na mpanimfoɔ no tete ne nkyɛn na ɔhene somaa onipa dii n anim na ɔbɔfoɔ no nnya nnuruu ne nkyɛn no ɔno ara ka kyerɛɛ mpanimfoɔ no sɛ sɛ moahunu sɛ owudini ba yi asoma sɛ wɔmmɛtwa me tire monhwɛ sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ no ba a monto pono mu na mompia no nkɔ pono ano ɛnyɛ ne wura nan ase pim pim na ɛdi n akyire yi
na ɔda so ne wɔn rekasa no hwɛ na ɔbɔfoɔ no resiane aba ne nkyɛn na ɔkaa sɛ hwɛ bɔne yi firi awurade nkyɛn ɛdeɛn na mentwɛn awurade mennye bio
ɛnna elisa kaa sɛ montie awurade asɛm sɛ awurade seɛ nie ɔkyena sɛsɛɛ ayuosiam susuo adeɛ baako bɛdi dwetɛbena na atokoɔ susuo adeɛ mmienu bɛdi dwetɛbena samaria kuro pono ano
ɛnna okunini a ɔhene twere ne nsa soɔ no buaa nyankopɔn nipa no sɛ hwɛ sɛ awurade reyɛ mpomma ɔsoro mpo a saa asɛm yi bɛbam anaa na ɔse wo ara wode w ani bɛhunu na worenni bi
na mmarima akwatafoɔ baanan wɔ kuro no pono ano na wɔsesee wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛ adɛn na yɛtete ha kɔsi sɛ yɛbɛwuwuo
sɛ yɛse yɛbɛhyɛne kuro no mu a ɛnneɛ ɛkɔm wɔ kuro no mu na yɛbɛwuwu hɔ na sɛ yɛtete ha yi nso a yɛbɛwuwu na afei mommra mma yɛnkɔhwɛ siriafoɔ nsraban no mu sɛ wɔgye yɛn nkwa a yɛbɛtena ase sɛ wɔku yɛn nso a yɛawu
na wɔsɔree anwummerɛ fɔmm sɛ wɔrekɔ siriafoɔ nsraban mu na wɔduruu siriafoɔ nsraban no ano na hwɛ onipa biara nni hɔ
na awurade ama siriafoɔ dɔm ate nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ ne dɔm kɛseɛ nka na wɔsesee wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛ hwɛ israel hene akɔgye hetifoɔ ahemfo ne misraim ahemfo adɔm atia yɛn sɛ wɔmmra yɛn so
enti anwummerɛ no wɔasɔre adwane na wɔagyigya wɔn ntomadan ne wɔn apɔnkɔ ne wɔn mfunumu ne nsraban no sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ no na wɔn nkwa nti wɔadwane
na akwatafoɔ no duruu nsraban no ano no wɔkɔɔ ntomadan baako mu kɔdidii nomee na wɔfaa dwetɛ ne sika ne ntoma firii hɔ kɔe de kɔhuntae na wɔsane ba bɛhyɛnee ntomadan foforɔ mu na wɔfaa hɔ adeɛ nso na wɔde kɔ kɔhuntae
ɛnna wɔsesee wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛ deɛ yɛreyɛ yi nyɛ ɛnnɛ da yi yɛ asɛmpa da na yɛn deɛ yɛayɛ komm yi na sɛ yɛtwɛn kɔsi adekyeeɛ a asotwe bi bɛda yɛn so na afei momma yɛnkɔ ahemfie nkɔka
na wɔba bɛfrɛɛ kuro no apono ano ahwɛfoɔ na wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ yɛkɔɔ siriafoɔ nsraban mu na hwɛ onipa biara ne onipa nne biara nni hɔ gye apɔnkɔ a wɔasesa wɔn ne mfunumu a wɔasesa wɔn ne ntomadan no sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ
na ɛpono ano ahwɛfoɔ no frɛe maa wɔkɔkaa no ahemfie
ɛnna ɔhene sɔree anadwo no na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ mɛkyerɛ mo deɛ siriafoɔ ayɛ yɛn yi wɔnim sɛ ɛkɔm de yɛn enti na wɔafiri nsram hɔ korɔ sɛ wɔrekɔhunta wiram na sɛ wɔfiri kuro no mu ba a yɛakye wɔn animono na yɛakɔhyɛne kuro no mu
na ne nkoa no mu baako buaa sɛ ɛnneɛ ma wɔmfa apɔnkɔ nkaeɛ a wɔaka kurom ha no mu nnum hwɛ wɔte sɛ israel dodoɔ a wɔaka mu no hwɛ wɔte sɛ israel dodoɔ a wɔahyeɛ no na ma yɛnsoma wɔn na yɛnhwɛ
na wɔfaa apɔnkɔ nteaseɛnam mmienu na ɔhene somaa wɔn maa wɔdii siriafoɔ dɔm no akyiri sɛ monkɔ nkɔhwɛ
na wɔdii wɔn akyi de kɔduruu yordan ano na hwɛ ntadeɛ ne nnoɔma nnoɔma a siriafoɔ atoto agu wɔn ntɛmpɛ no mu ayɛ ɔkwan no nyinaa so ma na abɔfoɔ no sane ba bɛka kyerɛɛ ɔhene
ɛnna nkurɔfoɔ no firii adie kɔfom siriafoɔ nsraban no na esiam susuo adeɛ baako tiriboɔ bɛyɛɛ dwetɛbena na ɛmo susuo adeɛ mmienu nso yɛɛ dwetɛbena sɛdeɛ awurade asɛm no teɛ no
na ɔhene yii okunini a ɔtwere ne nsa soɔ no sɛ ɔnhwɛ ɛpono ano na nkurɔfoɔ no tiatiaa ne so ɛpono no mu na ɔwui sɛdeɛ nyankopɔn nipa no kasa a ɔhene siane baa ne nkyɛn no ɔkaeɛ no
na ɛbaa mu sɛdeɛ nyankopɔn nipa no ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene no sɛ atokoɔ susuo adeɛ bɛyɛ dwetɛbena na ayuosiam susuo adeɛ baako nso ayɛ dwetɛbena ɔkyena sɛsɛɛ samaria kuro pono ano
na ɔsafohene no buaa nyankopɔn nipa no sɛ na hwɛ sɛ awurade reyɛ mpomma ɔsoro mpo a ɛbɛyɛ sɛ saa asɛm yi anaa na ɔse hwɛ wo deɛ wode w ani bɛhunu na worenni bi
na ɛyɛɛ no saa ara na nkurɔfoɔ no tiatiaa no kuro pono no mu na ɔwui
na elisa aka akyerɛ ɔbaa a ɔnyanee ne ba no sɛ sɔre kɔ wo ne wo fie na kɔyɛ ɔhɔhoɔ baabiara a wobɛtumi na awurade rema ɛkɔm aba na ɛbɛba asase yi so mfeɛ nson
na ɔbaa no sɔree yɛɛ sɛdeɛ nyankopɔn nipa no asɛm no teɛ no na ɔne ne fiefoɔ sii mu kɔ kɔyɛɛ ahɔhoɔ filistifoɔ asase so mfeɛ nson
na ɛbaa sɛ mfeɛ nson no awieeɛ no ɔbaa no sane firii filistifoɔ asase so bae na ɔfiri adi kɔsrɛɛ ɔhene sɛ ɔregye ne fie ne n asase
nso na ɔhene ne nyankopɔn nipa no abɔfra gehasi rekasa sɛ ka me nnoɔma akɛseɛ a elisa ayɛ no ɛ
na ɔgu so reka kyerɛ ɔhene sɛdeɛ elisa nyanee owufoɔ no hwɛ ɔbaa a ɔnyanee ne ba maa no no bɛsrɛɛ ɔhene sɛ ɔregye ne fie ne n asase na gehasi kaa sɛ me wura ɔhene ɔbaa no nie na ne ba a elisa maa no nyaa nkwa no nie
na ɔhene bisaa ɔbaa no no ɔka kyerɛɛ no ɛnna ɔhene yii opiani bi maa no sɛ hwehwɛ deɛ ɛyɛ ne deɛ nyinaa ne n afuo no aba nyinaa ɛfiri da a ɔgyaa asase yi hɔ de bɛsi nnɛ ma no
na elisa kɔɔ damasko nso na siriahene ben hadad yare na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ nyankopɔn nipa no aba ha
na ɔhene no ka kyerɛɛ hasael sɛ fa ayɛyɛdeɛ kura wo nsam na kɔ kɔhyia nyankopɔn nipa no na kɔbisa awurade adeɛ ne hɔ sɛ mɛnya yadeɛ yi mu nkwa anaa
na hasael ba bɛhyiaa no na ɔfaa ayɛyɛdeɛ kurae ɛyɛ damasko nnoɔma pa nyinaa mu bi yoma aduanan na ɛsoso wɔn na ɔba bɛgyinaa n anim sɛ wo ba ben hadad siriahene na ɔsomaa me wo nkyɛn sɛ mɛnya yadeɛ yi mu nkwa anaa
na elisa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ kɔ kɔka kyerɛ no sɛ nkwa deɛ wobɛnya na awurade akyerɛ me sɛ wobɛwu ara
na ɔgyenee n ani hwɛɛ no dinn kɔsii sɛ n ani wuiɛ na nyankopɔn nipa no sui
na hasael bisaa sɛ adɛn nti na me wura resu na ɔse ɛfiri sɛ menim bɔne a wobɛyɛ israelfoɔ wɔn nkuro a ɛyɛ den no wobɛtoto mu gya na wode nkrantɛ bɛkunkum wɔn mmeranteɛ na woatete wɔn nkɔkoaa ahwehwe fam na woapaepae wɔn anyinsɛnfoɔ mu
na hasael kaa sɛ na w akoa ne deɛn ɔkraman yi a sɛ ɔbɛyɛ adeɛ kɛseɛ yi na elisa se awurade ama mahu wo sɛ siriahene
na ɔfirii elisa nkyɛn kɔ kɔduruu ne wura nkyɛn na ɔbisaa no sɛ ɛdeɛn na elisa ka kyerɛɛ woɔ na ɔse ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ nkwa deɛ wobɛnya
na adeɛ kyeeɛ no ɔfaa mmuatoma no bɔɔ nsuo mu de kataa n anim na ɔwui na hasael sii n ananmu dii hene
na israelhene ahab ba yoram afe a ɛtɔ so nnum mu berɛ a yehosafat dii yuda hene no na yudahene yehosafat ba yehoram bɛdii hene
ɔbɛdii hene no na wadi mfirinhyia aduasa mmienu na ɔdii hene mfeɛ nwɔtwe wɔ yerusalem
na ɔfaa israel ahemfo kwan so sɛdeɛ ahab fie yɛeɛ ɛfiri sɛ na ne yere yɛ ahab ba na ɔyɛɛ awurade ani so bɔne
nanso n akoa dawid nti awurade ampɛ sɛ ɔsɛe yuda sɛdeɛ ɔhyɛɛ bɔ sɛ ɔbɛma no ne ne mma nna nyinaa
ne berɛ so na edom tee atua firii yuda nsa aseɛ na wɔkɔsii wɔn so hene
na yoram twaa mu kɔɔ sair ne nteaseɛnam nyinaa ka ne ho na ɔsɔree anadwo kɔkunkumm edomfoɔ a wɔatwa ne ho ahyia ne nteaseɛnam so asafohene no na nkurɔfoɔ no dwane kɔɔ wɔn ntomadan mu
na edom tee atua firii yuda nsa ase de bɛsi nnɛ ɛnna libna nso tee atua berɛ no ara mu
na yoram ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa wɔantwerɛ no yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
na yoram tii n agyanom wɔ asamando na wɔsiee no kaa n agyanom ho dawid kuro mu na ne ba ahasia sii n ananmu dii hene
na israelhene ahab ba yoram afe a ɛtɔ so dummienu mu na yudahene yehoram ba ahasia bɛdii hene
ahasia dii mfeɛ aduonu mmienu na ɔbɛdii hene no na ɔdii hene afe baako yerusalem na ne na din de atalia a ɔyɛ israelhene omri ba
na ɔfaa ahab fiefoɔ kwan so na ɔyɛɛ awurade ani so bɔne sɛ ahab fie ɛfiri sɛ na ahab ase ne no
na ɔne ahab ba yoram ne siriahene hasael kɔkoeɛ wɔ ramot gilead na siriafoɔ piraa yoram
na ɔhene yoram sane baa sɛ ɔrebɛsa pira a siriafoɔ piraa no rama berɛ a ɔne siriahene hasael reko no wɔ yesreel na yudahene yehoram ba ahasia siane kɔɔ sɛ ɔrekɔhwɛ ahab ba yoram wɔ yesreel ɛfiri sɛ na ɔyare
na odiyifoɔ elisa frɛɛ adiyifoɔ mma no mu baako ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ bɔ abɔsoɔ na fa ngo toa yi kura wo nsam na kɔ ramot gilead
na sɛ woduru hɔ a hwehwɛ nimsi ba yehosafat ba yehu hɔ na kɔ mu na ma no nsɔre mfiri ne nuanom mu na fa no kɔ mpiakyire pia mu
na fa ngo toa no hwie gu n atifi na ka sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie masra wo ngo asi israel so hene na hini ɛpono no na dwane na nnyina
ɛnna aberanteɛ a ɔyɛ odiyifoɔ aberanteɛ no sii mu kɔɔ ramot gilead
na ɔduruiɛ no na hwɛ ɛdɔm so asafohene tete hɔ na ɔkaa sɛ mewɔ asɛm bi mese wo ɔsafohene na yehu bisaa sɛ wone yɛn nyinaa mu hwan na ɔse mene wo ɔsafohene
ɛnna ɔsɔre kɔɔ ɛdan no mu na ɔhwiee ngo no guu n atifi na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ sɛ awurade israel nyankopɔn seɛ nie masra wo masi wo awurade man israel so hene
na wobɛbɔ wo wura ahab fie na matɔ me nkoa adiyifoɔ no mogya ne awurade nkoa nyinaa mogya so were isebel nsam
na ahab fie nyinaa asɛe na matwa ahabni barima biara atwene akoa oo ɔdehyeɛ oo israel mu
na mɛyɛ ahab fie sɛ nebat ba yeroboam fie ne ahia ba baasa fie
na akraman bɛwe isebel nam yesreel asase so na obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛsie no na ɔhinii ɛpono no dwanee
na yehu firii adi baa ne wura nkoa nkyɛn na obi bisaa no sɛ ɛyɛ anaa adɛn nti na ɔbɔdamfoɔ yi baa wo nkyɛn yi na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ mo ara monim ɔbarima no ne ne nsɛnkeka
na wɔse atorɔ ka kyerɛ yɛn ɛ na ɔse sɛɛ ne sɛɛ na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ sɛ awurade seɛ nie masra wo ngo masi wo israel so hene
ɛnna wɔyɛɛ ntɛm yiyii wɔn ntadeɛ de hyehyɛɛ n ase wɔn nan ase wɔ ntwedeɛ no ara soɔ na wɔhyɛnee totorobɛnto sɛ yehu adi hene
na nimsi ba yehosafat ba yehu pam yoram tiri so nso na yoram ne israel nyinaa rewɛn wɔ ramot gilead siriahene hasael nti
na ɔhene yehoram deɛ na wasane aba yesreel sɛ ɔrebɛsa pira a ɔne siriahene hasael reko no siriafoɔ piraa no no na yehu kaa sɛ sɛ sei ne w adwene a ɛnneɛ mommma obiara mmfiri adi nnnwane mmfiri kuro yi mu nnkɔka no wɔ yesreel
na yehu tenaa teaseɛnam mu kɔɔ yesreel na ɛhɔ na na yoram da na yudahene ahasia asiane aba sɛ ɔrebɛhwɛ yoram
na ɔwɛmfoɔ gyina yesreel abantenten so na ɔhunuu yehu asafokuo no sɛ wɔreba na ɔkaa sɛ mehunu asafokuo bi na yehoram se fa ɔpɔnkɔsoteni soma no ma no nkɔhyia wɔn na ɔmmisa sɛ asomdwoeɛ anaa
na ɔpɔnkɔsoteni bi kɔ kɔhyiaa no na ɔkaa sɛ sɛ ɔhene seɛ nie asomdwoeɛ anaa na yehu se wo ne asomdwoeɛ wɔ deɛn na ɛyɛ bra bɛdi m akyi na ɔwɛmfoɔ no de nkra kɔmaa ɔhene sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ no aduru wɔn nkyɛn nso ɔnsane mma
ɛnna ɔsomaa ɔpɔnkɔsoteni a ɔtɔ so mmienu na ɔkɔduruu wɔn nkyɛn no ɔkaa sɛ sɛ ɔhene seɛ nie ɛyɛ asomdwoeɛ anaa na yehu se asomdwoeɛ fa wo ho bɛn bra bɛdi m akyi
na ɔwɛmfoɔ no kaa sɛ waduru wɔn nkyɛn nso ɔnsane mma na ɔka pɔnkɔ no sɛdeɛ nimsi ba yehu ka no na ɔka no denden pa ara
ɛnna yehoram kaa sɛ monsiesie na wɔsiesiee ne teaseɛnam no na israelhene yehoram ne yudahene ahasia firii adi wɔn nteaseɛnam mu na wɔfiri kɔhyiaa yehu na wɔkɔtoo no yesreelni nabot asase no so
na yehoram hunuu yehu no ɔbisaa sɛ yehu asomdwoeɛ anaa na ɔse asomdwoeɛ bɛyɛ dɛn aba berɛ a wo na isebel adwamammɔ ne n abayigorɔ bebree no rekɔ soɔ yi
ɛnna yehoram danee ne ho dwaneeɛ na ɔka kyerɛɛ ahasia sɛ atirisopamsɛm nie ahasia
na yehu de n ahoɔden nyinaa twee n agyan mu to bɔɔ yehoram abasa ntam na agyan no hwiree n akoma mu na ɔhwee ne teaseɛnam mu
ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ ne kunini bidkar sɛ ma no so to no twene yesreelni nabot asase no so na kae sɛ me ne wo te apɔnkɔ so bɔɔ anan dii n agya ahab akyiri no awurade de atemmusɛm yi too ne so sɛ
ampa ara mehunuu nabot mogya ne ne mma mogya nnora awurade na ɔseɛ na mɛtua wo ɛso ka asase yi so awurade na ɔseɛ na afei ma no so to no twene asase yi so sɛdeɛ awurade asɛm no teɛ no
na yudahene ahasia hunuiɛ no ɔfaa turom dan kwan so dwanee na yehu tii no na ɔkaa sɛ mommɔ ɔno nso teaseɛnam no mu wɔyɛɛ saa gur aforoeɛ a ɛwɔ yibleam ho no na ɔdwane kɔɔ megido na ɔkɔwuu wɔ hɔ
na ne nkoa de no nam teaseɛnam mu kɔɔ yerusalem na wɔsiee no n asieeɛ kaa n agyanom ho dawid kuro mu
na ahab ba yoram afe a ɛtɔ so dubaako mu na ahasia bɛdii yuda so hene
ɛnna yehu baa yesreel na isebel teeɛ no ɔkekaa n ani ho adubire na ɔhyehyɛɛ ne ti na ɔhwɛɛ mpomma mu
na yehu duruu ɛpono no ano no ɔbisaa sɛ ɛyɛ asomdwoeɛ anaa wo simri a wokumm wo wura
na ɔmaa n ani so hwɛɛ mpomma no na ɔbisaa sɛ hwan na ɔwɔ m afa hwan ɛnna pia mufoɔ baanu anaa baasa firi bɔɔ wɔn ani kyerɛɛ no
na ɔkaa sɛ monto no nhwe fam ɛnna wɔtoo no hwee fam na ne mogya bi petee ɔfasuo ho ne apɔnkɔ no ho na ɔde teaseɛnam faa ne so
na ɔhyɛnee mu na ɔdidiiɛ na ɔnomeeɛ no ɔkaa sɛ monkɔ nkɔhwɛ ɔbaa a wɔadome no no na monsie no ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ ɔhene babaa
na wɔkɔɔ sɛ wɔrekɔsie no na wɔanhunu ne ho biribiara gye ne tikwankoraa ne ne nan ne ne nsayam
na wɔsane bɛka kyerɛɛ no na ɔkaa sɛ awurade asɛm a ɔnam n akoa elia tisbini no so kaeɛ no nie sɛ yesreel asase so na akraman bɛwe isebel nam
na isebel funu bɛhwete ayɛ sɛ sɛbeɛ wɔ wiram yesreel asase no so na obiara anhunu anka sɛ isebel nie
na ahab wɔ mmammarima aduɔson wɔ samaria na yehu twerɛtwerɛɛ nwoma na ɔsoma maa wɔde kɔɔ samaria kɔmaa yesreel asafohene mpanimfoɔ ne ahab mmagyegyefoɔ no sɛ
sɛ nwoma yi ka mo nsa a sɛ mo wura mma wɔ mo nkyɛn na nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ ne nkuro a wɔato ho afasuo ne akodeɛ nso wɔ mo nkyɛn yi
monhwehwɛ mo wura mma no mu deɛ ɔyɛ ne deɛ ɔtene na momfa no ntena n agya adwa so na monko mma mo wura fie
na wɔsuroo pa ara kaa sɛ hwɛ ahemfo baanu no annyina n anim na yɛn deɛ yɛbɛgyina sɛn
na deɛ ɔhwɛ ahemfie no soɔ ne deɛ ɔdi kuro no soɔ no mpanimfoɔ ne mmagyegyefoɔ no soma maa wɔkɔɔ yehu nkyɛn sɛ wo nkoa ne yɛn na deɛ wobɛka akyerɛ yɛn nyinaa yɛbɛyɛ yɛrensi ɔhene biara yɛ deɛ wopɛ
ɛnna ɔtwerɛɛ wɔn nwoma a ɛtɔ so mmienu sɛ sɛ mowɔ m afa na mobɛtie me a momfa nnipa no mo wura mma no tiri mmra me nkyɛn ɔkyena sɛsɛɛ wɔ yesreel nso na ɔhene mma no yɛ mmarima aduɔson kuro no mu nnipa akɛseɛ no nkyɛn na wɔyɛnee wɔn
na ɛbaa sɛ nwoma no kaa wɔn nsa no wɔfaa ɔhene mma no kunkumm nnipa aduɔson no na wɔde wɔn tiri guu nkɛntɛn mu na wɔsoma maa wɔde kɔmaa no wɔ yesreel
na ɔbɔfoɔ no ba bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ wɔde ɔhene mma no tiri no aba na ɔse monhɔre no akuo mmienu ɛpono no ano nkɔsi anɔpa
na anɔpa no ɔfirii adi kɔgyinaa hɔ na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔman no nyinaa sɛ modi bem hwɛ me na mepamm me wura tiri soɔ na mekumm no na hwan na ɔkunkumm yeinom nyinaa
monhunu afei sɛ awurade asɛm a ɔkaa no ahab fie ho no mu biara bɛba mu na awurade ayɛ deɛ ɔnam n akoa elia so kaeɛ no
na yehu kumm ahab fie nnipa a wɔkaa wɔ yesreel no nyinaa ne ne nnipa akɛseɛ ne n amannifoɔ ne n asɔfoɔ nyinaa kɔsii sɛ wannya no obiara amma wamfiri mu amfire
na ɔsɔre sii mu kɔɔ samaria na ɔduruu bet eked nnwanhwɛfoɔ nsraban mu ɔkwan mu no
yehu hyiaa yudahene ahasia nuanom na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ hwannom ne mo na wɔse ahasia nuanom ne yɛn na yɛresiane akɔ akɔhwɛ ɔhene mma ne ɔhemmaa mma no sɛ wɔte sɛn
na ɔkaa sɛ monkye wɔn anikan so na wɔkyeree wɔn anikan na wɔkunkumm wɔn wɔ bet eked amena ho nnipa aduanan mmienu na wɔannyae wɔn mu biara
na ɔfiri hɔ rekorɔ no ɔhunuu rekab ba yehonadab sɛ ɔreba abɛhyia no na ɔkyeaa no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ wodɔ me sɛdeɛ medɔ woɔ no na yehonadab se medɔ wo na sɛ ɛte saa a sɔ me nsa mu ɛ na ɔsɔɔ mu na ɔmaa no foro kɔɔ ne nkyɛn teaseɛnam no mu
na ɔkaa sɛ ɛne me nkɔ na kɔhwɛ me ninkunu a metwe mema awurade na ɔmaa no tenaa ne teaseɛnam no mu
na ɔduruu samaria no ɔkumm nnipa a wɔka maa ahab samaria no nyinaa kɔsii sɛ ɔtɔree wɔn ase sɛdeɛ awurade ka kyerɛɛ elia no
na yehu boaboaa ɔman no nyinaa ano hyiae na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ ahab somm baal kakraa bi na yehu deɛ ɔbɛsom no bebree
na afei baal adiyifoɔ nyinaa ne n asomfoɔ nyinaa ne n asɔfoɔ nyinaa momfrɛ wɔn mmra me nkyɛn mommma obiara nnka na mewɔ afɔdeɛ kɛseɛ bi bɔ mema baal obiara a ɔremma no rennya nkwa na yehu yɛɛ no aniteɛ mu sɛ ɔrebɛsɛe baal asomfoɔ
na yehu kaa sɛ mompae nhyia kronkron mma baal na wɔpaee
na yehu soma maa wɔkɔkyinii israel nyinaa na baal nkoa nyinaa bae wɔannya obiara a wamma na wɔbaa baal fie na baal fie yɛɛ ma firi ano kɔpem ano
na ɔka kyerɛɛ deɛ ɔhwɛ ntadeɛ dan soɔ no sɛ yiyi ntadeɛ brɛ baal nkoa nyinaa na ɔkɔyii ntadeɛ no de brɛɛ wɔn
ɛnna yehu ne rekab ba yehonadab kɔɔ baal fie na ɔka kyerɛɛ baal nkoa no sɛ mompeepee mu nhunu na awurade nkoa mu bi ammɛka mo ho ha sɛ baal nkoa nko
na ɔkɔɔ mu sɛ ɔrekɔbɔ afɔdeɛ ne ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ na yehu de mmarima aduɔwɔtwe agyina adihɔ sɛ sɛ mmarima a mede wɔn merehyɛ mo nsa yi mu biara firi mu kɔ a deɛ ɔmaa no kɔeɛ no kra bɛsi ne kra ananmu
na ɔwiee ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ no bɔ no yehu ka kyerɛɛ awɛmfoɔ ne akunini no sɛ monkɔ nkɔkunkum wɔn mommma obiara mmfi na awɛmfoɔ ne akunini no de nkrantɛ ano kunkumm wɔn totoo wɔn gui
na wɔkɔɔ baal fie ban no mu na wɔyii baal fie adum no na wɔhyeeɛ
na wɔbubuu baal dum no na wɔdwirii baal fie no gui na wɔde yɛɛ tiafi de bɛsi nnɛ
saa na yehu sɛee baal firii israel
nanso nebat ba yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne akyiri deɛ yehu amfi ɛne sika nantwie mma a ɛwɔ betel ne dan no
na awurade ka kyerɛɛ yehu sɛ ɛsiane sɛ woayɛ yei sɛ woayɛ deɛ ɛtene m ani soɔ na woayɛ ahab fie sɛdeɛ ɛwɔ m akoma mu nyinaa nti wo mma a wɔbɛtɔ so nnan no bɛtena israel adwa so
nanso yehu anhwɛ amfa n akoma nyinaa anni awurade israel nyankopɔn mmara so wamfiri yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne ho
nna no mu na awurade firii aseɛ twitwaa israel soɔ na hasael dii wɔn so israel ahyeɛ nyinaa so
ɛfiri yordan owiapueeɛ gilead asase nyinaa gadfoɔ ne rubenfoɔ ne manasefoɔ deɛ firi aroer a ɛwɔ arnon subonhwa ano ne gilead ne basan
na yehu ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ne ne mmaninneɛ nyinaa wɔantwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu anaa
na yehu tii n agyanom wɔ asamando na wɔsiee no samaria na ne ba yehoahas sii n ananmu dii hene
na nna a yehu de dii israel so hene samaria no yɛ mfirinhyia aduonu nwɔtwe
na ahasia ne na atalia hunuu sɛ ne ba awuo no ɔsɔree na ɔsɛee adehyeɛ abusua no nyinaa
na ɔhene yoram babaa yehoseba ahasia nuabaa faa ahasia ba yoas na ɔwiaa no firii ɔhene mma a wɔreku wɔn no mu de no ne ne bagyegyefoɔ kɔɔ pia mu na ɔde no hunta firii atalia anim na wɔanku no
na ɔne no huntaa awurade fie mfeɛ nsia na atalia dii asase no so hemmaa
na afe a ɛtɔ so nson mu no yehoiada soma maa wɔkɔfaa karifoɔ ne awɛmfoɔ no ɔha ha so asafohene baa ne nkyɛn awurade fie na ɔne wɔn pamee na ɔmaa wɔkekaa ntam awurade fie na ɔde ɔhene ba no kyerɛɛ wɔn
na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ adeɛ a monyɛ nie mo mu nkyɛmu mmiɛnsa mu baako mmra adwuma homeda na mommɛwɛn ɔhene fie
na nkyɛmu baako ntena sur pono ano na nkyɛmu baako nso ntena awɛmfoɔ akyiri pono no ano na monwɛn efie no mmɔ ho ban
na mo mu asafokuo mmienu wɔn a homeda wɔwɛn awurade fie no nkɔwɛn ɔhene no
na montwa ɔhene no ho nhyia monkurakura mo akodeɛ mo nsam na deɛ ɔbɛba mo kuo no mu no monku no na montena ɔhene ho n adifire ne ne muba mu
na asafohene no yɛɛ sɛdeɛ ɔsɔfoɔ yehoiada hyɛeɛ no nyinaa na wɔfaa wɔn nnipa a wɔba adwuma homeda ne wɔn a wɔmma homeda no na wɔbaa ɔsɔfoɔ yehoiada nkyɛn
na ɔsɔfoɔ no de ɔhene dawid mpea ne akyɛm a ɛwɔ awurade fie no maa ɔha asafohene no
na awɛmfoɔ no gyinagyina ho kurakura wɔn akodeɛ wɔn nsam ɛfiri ɛdan no anafoɔ fam ntwea so kɔsi ɛdan no atifi fam ntwea so afɔrebukyia no ho ne ɛdan no ho atwa ɔhene no ho ahyia
na ɔyii ɔhene ba no firii adi na ɔde ahemmotire no bɔɔ ne ti na ɔde adanseɛ nwoma no hyɛɛ ne nsa na wɔsii no hene na wɔsraa no ngo na wɔbobɔɔ wɔn nsam sɛ ɔhene tiri nkwa
ɛnna atalia tee awɛmfoɔ ne ɔman no gyegyeegye no ɔbaa nkurɔfoɔ no nkyɛn awurade fie
na ɔbɛhunui na hwɛ na ɔhene no gyina simpie no so sɛdeɛ ne yɛbea teɛ no na asafohene no ne ntotorobɛntohyɛnfoɔ wɔ ɔhene no nkyɛn na asase no so nkurɔfoɔ no nyinaa ani agye na wɔhyenhyɛnee ntotorobɛnto ɛnna atalia sunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu na ɔteaa mu sɛ atirisopam atirisopam
na ɔsɔfoɔ yehoiada hyɛɛ ɔha ha so asafohene a wɔhwɛ dɔm no soɔ no na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ monyi no mfa mo mu mfi na deɛ ɔbɛdi n akyire no momfa nkrantɛ nku no na ɔsɔfoɔ no kaa sɛ wɔnnku no awurade fie
enti wɔsɔɔ ne mu de no kɔfaa kwan a apɔnkɔ nam so ba ahemfie no so na wɔkumm no hɔ
na yehoiada de apam too awurade ne ɔhene ne ɔman no ntam sɛ wɔnyɛ awurade man na ɔde too ɔhene ne ɔman no nso ntam
ɛnna asase no so nkurɔfoɔ nyinaa kɔɔ baal fie kɔdwirii n afɔrebukyia ne n ahoni no wɔbubuu no pasaa na baal sɔfoɔ matan nso wɔkum no afɔrebukyia no anim na ɔsɔfoɔ no de awɛmfoɔ gyinagyinaa awurade fie no ho
na ɔfaa asafohene ne karifoɔ ne awɛmfoɔ ne asase no so nkurɔfoɔ nyinaa na wɔde ɔhene no firii awurade fie siane bɛfaa awɛmfoɔ pono ano kwan so baa ahemfie na ɔtenaa ahennwa no so
na asase no so nkurɔfoɔ nyinaa ani gyee na kuro no mu dwoe na atalia deɛ wɔde nkrantɛ kumm no ɔhene fie hɔ
yehoas bɛdii hene no na wadi mfirinhyia nson
yehu afe a ɛtɔ so nson so na yehoas bɛdii hene na ɔdii hene mfirinhyia aduanan wɔ yerusalem na ne na din de sibia a ɔfiri beer seba
na yehoas yɛɛ deɛ ɛtene awurade ani so ɛfiri sɛ ɔsɔfoɔ yehoiada na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ no
nanso sorɔnsorɔmmea no deɛ wanyi na ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔdeɛ na wɔhyee aduhwam sorɔnsorɔmmea no so
na yehoas ka kyerɛɛ asɔfoɔ no sɛ akronkronneɛ sika a wɔde ba awurade fie nyinaa ne obiara kra tiri sika sɛ wɔbɔ no boɔ no ne sika biara nso a ɛba obi akoma mu sɛ ɔde bɛba awurade fie no
asɔfoɔ no nnyegye no wɔn amannifoɔ nkyɛn na wɔmfa nsiesiee efie no baabi a ayɛ agoɔ no ne baabiara a wɔbɛhunu sɛ agoɔ bi wɔ hɔ
na ɔhene yehoas afe a ɛtɔ so aduonu mmiɛnsa soɔ no na asɔfoɔ no nnya nsiesiee efie no mu adango no
ɛnna ɔhene yehoas frɛɛ ɔsɔfoɔ yehoiada ne asɔfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ adɛn nti na monsiesiee efie no mu adango no afei monnnyegye sika amannifoɔ nkyɛn bio na monyi mma na wɔmfa nyɛ efie no adango no
na asɔfoɔ no penee sɛ wɔrennye ɔman no hɔ sika na wɔrenyɛ efie no mu adango no bio
ɛnna ɔsɔfoɔ yehoiada faa adaka bi na ɔtuu ne mmuasoɔ mu tokuro na ɔde sii afɔrebukyia ho deɛ wɔfa ba awurade fie no nifa na asɔfoɔ a wɔhwɛ ɛpono no ano no de sika a wɔde ba awurade fie no nyinaa guu mu
na sɛ wɔhunu sɛ sika pii wɔ adaka no mu a ɔhene atwerɛfoɔ ne ɔsɔfoɔ panin no foro ba na wɔbɛkyekyere na wɔkan sika a wɔhu no awurade fie no
na wɔde sika a wɔakarie no hyɛɛ wɔn a wɔyɛɛ adwuma no a wɔde wɔn sisii awurade fie so ahwɛfoɔ no nsa na wɔyi maa nnua adwumfoɔ ne adansifoɔ a wɔyɛ awurade fie no
ne abantofoɔ ne abotwafoɔ ne sɛ wɔde bɛtɔ nnua ne aboɔ a wɔatwa sɛ wɔde bɛpempam awurade fie adango no ne sɛ wɔde bɛtua efie no adango no bɛsiesie ho adeɛ a wɔhwereɛ nyinaa ka
nanso wɔamfa sika a wɔde ba awurade fie no mu bi anyɛ awurade fie dwetɛ nyowaa adumgya nkoraa ntotorobɛnto anaa sika ne dwetɛ adeɛ biara
na wɔde maa wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma no na wɔde siesie awurade fie no
nanso wɔne nnipa a wɔde sika hyɛɛ wɔn nsa sɛ wɔmfa mma adwumayɛfoɔ no ammu nkonta ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛɛ no nokorɛ mu
asodie afɔdeɛ sika ne bɔne ho afɔdeɛ sika deɛ wɔamfa amma awurade fie ɛyɛ asɔfoɔ no dea
ɛberɛ no mu na siriahene hasael foro bɛnee gat koeɛ na ɔfae na hasael de n ani kyerɛɛ sɛ ɔreforo aba yerusalem
ɛnna yudahene yehoas faa akronkronneɛ nyinaa a n agyanom yuda ahemfo yehosafat yehoram ne ahasia yɛɛ no kronkron no ne n akronkronneɛ ne sika a wɔhunuu no awurade fie ne ahemfie akoradeɛ mu nyinaa na ɔsoma maa wɔde kɔmaa siriahene hasael ɛnna ɔfirii yerusalem hɔ kɔeɛ
na yehoas ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa wɔatwerɛ no yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
na ne nkoa sɔre pam ne tiri so na wɔkumm yehoas wɔ milo dan a ɛwɔ kwan a ɛde rekɔ sila no mu
na ne nkoa simeat ba yosakar ne somer ba yehosabad bɔɔ no na ɔwui na wɔsiee no kaa n agyanom ho dawid kuro mu na ne ba amasia bɛdii n adeɛ
yudahene ahasia ba yoas afe a ɛtɔ so aduonu mmiɛnsa so na yehu ba yehoahas bɛdii israel so hene samaria mfeɛ dunson
na ɔyɛɛ awurade ani so bɔne na ɔdii nebat ba yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne akyi wamfiri ho
na awurade bo fu tiaa israel na ɔde wɔn hyɛɛ siriahene hasael nsa ne hasael ba ben hadad nsa wɔn nna nyinaa
na yehoahas koto srɛɛ awurade na awurade tiee no ɛfiri sɛ ɔhunuu ɔhaw a siriahene de reha israel no
na awurade maa israel ɔgyefoɔ na wɔfirii siriafoɔ nsa ase na israel mma tenaa wɔn ntomadan mu sɛ akane no
nanso wɔamfiri yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no fie bɔne ho emu na wɔnanteeɛ na asera nnua no nso sisii samaria
na wɔannya dɔm biara amma yehoahas gye apɔnkɔsotefoɔ aduonum ne nteaseɛnam du ne anammɔnmufoɔ mpem du ɛfiri sɛ na siriahene asɛe wɔn na wayɛ wɔn sɛ mfuturo a wɔtiatia soɔ
na yehoahas ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ne ne mmaninneɛ wɔantwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
na yehoahas tii n agyanom wɔ asamando na wɔsiee no samaria na ne ba yoas bɛdii n adeɛ
yudahene yoas afe a ɛtɔ so aduasa nson so na yehoahas ba yehoas bɛdii israel so hene wɔ samaria mfeɛ dunsia
na ɔyɛɛ awurade ani so bɔne wamfiri nebat ba yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne nyinaa ho emu na ɔnanteeɛ
na yoas ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ne ne mmaninneɛ sɛ ɔne yudahene amasia dii ako no wɔantwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
na yoas tii n agyanom wɔ asamando na yeroboam bɛtenaa n adwa so na wɔsiee yoas samaria kaa israel ahemfo ho
nso na elisa yare ne yadeɛ a ɔde wuiɛ no na israelhene yoas siane baa ne nkyɛn bɛsuu n anim na ɔkaa sɛ m agya m agya israel nteaseɛnam ne n apɔnkɔsotefoɔ
ɛnna elisa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ kɔfa tadua ne agyan na ɔde tadua ne agyan brɛɛ no
na ɔka kyerɛɛ israel hene no sɛ fa wo nsa sɔ tadua no mu na ɔde ne nsa sɔɔ mu na elisa de ne nsa guu ɔhene no nsa so
na ɔkaa sɛ hini apueeɛ mpomma no na ɔhiniiɛ na elisa se to na ɔtoe na ɔse awurade nkonimdie agyan siria so nkonimdie agyan na wobɛbɔ siria wɔ afek akɔsi sɛ wobɛdwerɛ wɔn
na ɔkaa sɛ fa agyan no na ɔtasee na ɔka kyerɛɛ israel hene no sɛ to bɔ fam na ɔto bɔɔ fam mprɛnsa na ɔgyaeɛ
ɛnna nyankopɔn nipa no bo fuu no kaa sɛ anka ɛsɛ sɛ woto no mprɛnnum anaa nsia ɛno na anka wobɛbɔ siria akɔsi sɛ wobɛdwerɛ wɔn enti nso mprɛnsa pɛ na wobɛbɔ siria
na elisa wui na wɔsiee no na afe no baeɛ no moabfoɔ afomfafoɔ asafo baa asase no so
na wɔrekɔsie onipa bi na hwɛ wɔhunuu asafokuo no wɔtoo onipa no twenee elisa da mu na onipa no kɔkaa elisa nnompe pɛ ɔnyaa nkwa na ɔsɔre gyinaa ne nan so
na siriahene hasael haa israel yehoahas nna nyinaa
nanso awurade dom wɔn na ne yam hyehyee no maa wɔn na ɔdanee ne ho kyerɛɛ wɔn n apam a ɔne abraham isak ne yakob pameeɛ no nti na wampɛ sɛ ɔsɛe wɔn na wanto wɔn antwene amfiri n anim de bɛsi seesei
na siriahene hasael wuiɛ na ne ba ben hadad bɛdii n adeɛ
na yehoahas ba yehoas sane kɔgyee hasael ba ben hadad nsam nkuro a ɔde ɔko bɛgyee no n agya yehoahas nsam no mprɛnsa na yoas bɔɔ no na ɔgyee israel nkuro no
israelhene yoahas ba yoas afe a ɛtɔ so mmienu mu na yudahene yoas ba amasia bɛdii hene
ɔbɛdii hene no na wadi mfeɛ aduonu nnum na ɔdii hene mfeɛ aduonu nkron wɔ yerusalem na ne na din de yehoadin a ɔfiri yerusalem
na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛtene awurade ani so nanso na ɛnte sɛ n agya dawid sɛdeɛ n agya yoas yɛeɛ no nyinaa na ɔno nso yɛeɛ
nanso sorɔnsorɔmmea no deɛ wɔanyi ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔdeɛ na wɔhyee aduhwam sorɔnsorɔmmea no so
na ahennie no timm ne nsam no ɔkumm ne nkoa a wɔkumm n agya ɔhene no
na awudifoɔ no mma no deɛ wanku wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no mose mmara no mu sɛdeɛ awurade hyɛɛ sɛ wɔnnkum agyanom mma nti a nso wɔnkum mma agyanom nti na mmom obiara bɔne so na wɔnkum no
ɔno na ɔkumm edom mu nnipa mpemdu nkyene bonhwa mu na ɔde ɔko faa sela na ɔtoo ne din yokteel de bɛsi nnɛ
ɛberɛ no mu na amasia somaa abɔfoɔ maa wɔkɔɔ israelhene yehu ba yehoahas ba yehoas nkyɛn sɛ bra ma yɛnsɔ yɛn ho nhwɛ
na israelhene yehoas soma maa wɔbaa yudahene amasia nkyɛn sɛ nkasɛɛ dua a ɛwɔ lebanon no soma maa wɔkɔɔ tweneduro a ɛwɔ lebanon no nkyɛn sɛ fa wo babaa ma me ba nware na wiram mmoa a wɔwɔ lebanon no sene bɛtiatiaa nkasɛɛ dua no so
kum deɛ woakum edom na w akoma ama wo so ma w animuonyam nnɔɔso mma wo na tena wo fie na adɛn nti na wo ne mmusuo rebɛdi aperepereɛ na woahwe aseɛ wo ne yuda nyinaa
na amasia antie ɛnna israelhene yehoas foro baeɛ na wɔbɛhyiaam koe ɔno ne yudahene amasia wɔ bet semes a ɛyɛ yuda dea hɔ
na yuda dii nkoguo wɔ israel anim na wɔdwane kokɔɔ wɔn ntomadan mu
na israelhene yoas kyeree ahasia ba yehoas ba yudahene amasia wɔ bet semes na ɔbaa yerusalem bɛdwirii yerusalem fasuo firi efraim pono no ho de kɔsii ntwea pono no ho basafa ahanan
na ɔfaa sika ne dwetɛ nyinaa ne nnwinneɛ a ɔhunuu no awurade fie ne ahemfie akoradeɛ mu ne nnommum pii na ɔsane kɔɔ samaria
na yoas ho nsɛm nkaeɛ deɛ ɔyɛeɛ ne ne mmaninneɛ ne sɛdeɛ ɔne yudahene amasia koeɛ no wɔantwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
na yehoas tii n agyanom wɔ asamando na wɔsiee no samaria kaa israel ahemfo ho na ne ba yeroboam bɛdii n adeɛ
yoas ba yudahene amasia tenaa ase yehoahas ba israelhene yehoas wuo akyi mfirinhyia dunum
na amasia ho nsɛm nkaeɛ no wɔatwerɛ no yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
na wɔpam ne tiri so yerusalem na ɔdwane kɔɔ lakis na wɔsoma maa wɔtii no kɔɔ lakis na wɔkɔkumm no wɔ hɔ
na wɔde no too apɔnkɔ so bae na wɔsiee no yerusalem kaa n agyanom ho dawid kuro mu
ɛnna yuda man no nyinaa faa asaria a wadi mfeɛ dunsia no na wɔsii no hene sii n agya amasia ananmu
ɔno na ɔkyekyeree elat na ɔdane maa yuda na akyire yi no ɔhene no tii n agyanom wɔ asamando
yudahene amasia yoas ba afe a ɛtɔ so dunum so na israelhene yeroboam yoas ba bɛdii hene samaria na ɔdii adeɛ mfeɛ aduanan baako
na ɔyɛɛ awurade ani so bɔne wamfiri nebat ba yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne nyinaa ho
ɔno na ɔkɔgyee israel hyeɛ sane maa wɔn de firi hamat de bɛsi araba po ano sɛ awurade israel nyankopɔn asɛm a ɔnam n akoa amitai ba yona odiyifoɔ a ɔfiri gat hefer so kaeɛ no
na awurade hunuu israel amanehunu sɛ ɛyɛ nwono papa na ɔdehyeɛ ne akoa nyinaa kɔ a israel nni ɔboafoɔ biara
nso na awurade nkaa sɛ ɔbɛpepa israel din afiri ɔsoro ase na ɔnam yoas ba yeroboam so gyee wɔn
na yeroboam ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ne ne mmaninneɛ sɛdeɛ ɔkoeɛ ne sɛdeɛ ɔdanee damasko ne hamat a na ɛyɛ yuda dea no maa israel no wɔantwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
na yeroboam tii n agyanom israel ahemfo wɔ asamando na ne ba sakaria bɛdii n adeɛ
israelhene yeroboam afe a ɛtɔ so aduonu nson mu na yudahene amasia ba asaria bɛdii hene
ɔbɛdii hene no na wadi mfeɛ dunsia na ɔdii hene mfirinhyia aduonum mmienu wɔ yerusalem na ne na din ne yekolia a ɔfiri yerusalem
na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛtene awurade ani so sɛdeɛ n agya amasia yɛeɛ no nyinaa
gye sorɔnsorɔmmea no na wɔanyie na ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔdeɛ na wɔhyee aduhwam wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea no so
na awurade bɔɔ ɔhene no maa no yaree kwata de kɔsii ne wuda na ɔkɔtenaa fie foforɔ a obiara nte mu na ɔhene ba yotam na ɔdii efie no soɔ na ɔbuu asase no sofoɔ atɛn
na asaria ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa wɔantwerɛ no yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
na asaria tii n agyanom wɔ asamando na wɔsiee no kaa n agyanom ho dawid kuro mu na ne ba yotam bɛdii n adeɛ
yudahene asaria afe a ɛtɔ so aduasa nwɔtwe mu na yeroboam ba sakaria bɛdii israel so hene samaria ɔdii hene abosome nsia
na ɔyɛɛ awurade ani so bɔne sɛdeɛ n agyanom yɛeɛ no wamfiri nebat ba yeroboam bɔne a ɔmaa israel yɛeɛ no ho
na yabes ba salum pam ne tiri so na ɔbɔɔ no ibleam kumm no na ɔsii n ananmu dii hene
na sakaria ho nsɛm nkaeɛ no hwɛ wɔatwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
ɛno ne awurade asɛm no a ɔka kyerɛɛ yehu sɛ w awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛtɔ so nnan mu mma bɛtena israel adwa so no baa mu
yabes ba salum bɛdii hene yudahene usia afe a ɛtɔ so aduasa nkron mu na ɔdii hene bosome wɔ samaria
na gadi ba menahem firii tirsa foro baa samaria na ɔbɛbɔɔ yabes ba salum wɔ samaria kumm no na ɔsii n ananmu dii hene
na salum ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne n apam a ɔpameeɛ no hwɛ wɔatwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
ɛberɛ no mu no menahem firii tirsa kɔkum tifsa ne deɛ ɛwɔ mu nyinaa ne ɛho asase ɛfiri sɛ wɔanhini no nti ɔkumm wɔn na ɔpaepaee emu anyinsɛnfoɔ nyinaa mu
yudahene asaria afe a ɛtɔ so aduasa nkron mu na gadi ba menahem bɛdii israel so hene mfeɛ du wɔ samaria
na ɔyɛɛ awurade ani so bɔne wamfiri nebat ba yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne ho ne nna nyinaa
asiriahene pul baa asase no so na menahem maa pul dwetɛ dwetikɛseɛ apem sɛ ɔmmoa no nhyɛ ne nsa mu den n ahennie no mu
na menahem gyegyee israel hɔ toɔ mmarima a wɔbɛtumi nyinaa hɔ dwetɛ nnwetɛbena aduonum aduonum sɛ ɔde rekɔma asiriahene ɛnna asiriahene nsa kaeɛ no ɔsaneeɛ na wannyina asase no so hɔ
na menahem ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa wɔantwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
na menahem tii n agyanom wɔ asamando na ne ba pekahia bɛdii n adeɛ
yudahene asaria afe a ɛtɔ so aduonum mu na menahem ba pekahia bɛdii israel so hene samaria mfeɛ mmienu
na ɔyɛɛ awurade ani so bɔne wamfiri nebat ba yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne ho
na ne kunini peka a ɔyɛ remalia ba pam ne tiri so na ɔbɔɔ no samaria ahemfie aban mu ɔne argob ne arie na gileadfoɔ mma mu mmarima aduonum ka ne ho na ɔkumm no na ɔbɛdii n adeɛ
na pekahia ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa hwɛ wɔatwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma mu
yudahene asaria afe a ɛtɔ so aduonum mmienu mu na remalia ba peka bɛdii israel so hene samaria mfeɛ aduonu
na ɔyɛɛ awurade ani so bɔne wamfiri nebat ba yeroboam a ɔmaa israel yɛɛ bɔne no bɔne ho
israelhene peka berɛ so na asiriahene tiglat pileser ba bɛfaa iyon abel bet maaka yanoa kedes hasor gilead ne galilea naftali asase nyinaa na ɔtuu wɔn kɔɔ asiria
na ela ba hosea pam remalia ba peka tiri so na ɔbɔɔ no kumm no na ɔbɛdii n adeɛ usia ba yotam afe a ɛtɔ so aduonu mu
na peka ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa hwɛ wɔatwerɛ no israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
israelhene remalia ba peka afe a ɛtɔ so mmienu mu na yudahene usia ba yotam bɛdii hene
ɔbɛdii hene no na wadi mfeɛ aduonu nnum na mfirinhyia dunsia na ɔdii hene yerusalem na ne na din de yerusa a ɔyɛ sadok babaa
na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛtene awurade ani so sɛdeɛ n agya usia yɛeɛ nyinaa na ɔyɛeɛ
gye sorɔnsorɔmmea na wanyiyie na ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔdeɛ hyee nnuhwam wɔ so ɔno na ɔsii awurade fie pono a ɛkorɔn no
na yotam ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa wɔantwerɛ no yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
