ɛnna wɔfrɛfrɛɛ ɔhene no atwerɛfoɔ bosome a ɛdi kan da ɛtɔ so dummiɛnsa soɔ na wɔtwerɛɛ no sɛdeɛ haman hyɛeɛ nyinaa de kɔmaa ɔhene no amradofoɔ ne amantam no mmaako mmaako so ahwɛfoɔ ne aman no nyinaa so mmapɔmma asase biara sɛdeɛ ne ntwerɛeɛ teɛ ne ɔman biara sɛdeɛ ne kasa teɛ wɔde ɔhene akas weros din na ɛtwerɛeɛ na wɔde ɔhene no pɛtea sɔɔ ano
na wɔde nwoma no somasomaa awɛmfoɔ maa wɔde kɔɔ ɔhene nsase nyinaa so sɛ wɔnsɛe na wɔnkunkum na wɔnnwerɛ yudafoɔ no nyinaa mfiri mmeranteɛ so nkɔsi nkɔkoraa so mmɔfra ne mmaa nso da koro bosome a ɛtɔ so dummienu a ɛne bosome adar no da a ɛtɔ so dummiɛnsa no so na wɔmfom wɔn nnoɔma
atwerɛ no nsususoɔ a wɔde kɔhyɛɛ mmara nsase no nyinaa soɔ no hyɛ amanaman no nyinaa sɛ wɔnsiesie wɔn ho nsie da no
na awɛmfoɔ no firi kɔɔ ntɛmntɛm sɛdeɛ ɔhene kaeɛ no na wɔhyɛɛ mmara no susa ahenkuro mu na ɔhene no ne haman tenaa ase sɛ wɔrebɛnom nsa na susa kuro no mu ayɛ bisibasaa
na mordekai hunuu deɛ aba no nyinaa no mordekai sunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu na ɔde ayitoma ne nso kataa ne ho na ɔfirii adi kɔɔ kuro no mfimfini na ɔsuu esu denden
na ɔkɔɔ ɔhene ponkɛseɛ anim nso na obiara nni ho kwan sɛ ɔfira ayitoma de hyɛne ɔhene ponkɛseɛ no mu
na asase no biara a ɔhene asɛm ne ne mmara no duruu hɔ no abooboodie kɛseɛ ne mmuadadie ne esu ne adwotwa baa yudafoɔ no mu na nnipa pii dedaa ayitoma ne nso mu
ɛnna ester mmabaa ne ne mpiafoɔ no ba bɛka kyerɛɛ no na ɔhemmaa no bɔɔ birim papa na ɔsomaa sɛ wɔmfa ntadeɛ nkɔhyɛ mordekai na wɔnyi ne ho ayitoma no nanso wannye
ɛnna ester frɛɛ hatak ɔhene mpiafoɔ no mu baako a wayi no sɛ ɔnsom no no na ɔsomaa no mordekai nkyɛn na wahunu adekodeɛ ne deɛ ɛfiri soɔ
na hatak firii adi kɔɔ mordekai nkyɛn kuro no mpraeɛ a ɛda ɔhene ponkɛseɛ anim no so
na mordekai kaa no deɛ ato no no nyinaa ne dwetɛ dodoɔ a haman aka sɛ yudafoɔ no nti ɔbɛkari agu ɔhene akoradeɛ mu sɛ wɔnsɛe wɔn no
na mordekai de mmara a wɔhyɛɛ no wɔ susa sɛ wɔnsɛe wɔn no atwerɛ nhwɛsoɔ maa no sɛ ɔmma ester nhunu na ɔnka nkyerɛ no na ɔnhyɛ no sɛ ɔnkɔ ɔhene nkyɛn nkɔkoto nsrɛ no na ɔnsrɛ wɔ n anim mma ne man
na hatak ba bɛkaa mordekai nsɛm no kyerɛɛ ester
ɛnna ester ka kyerɛɛ hatak na ɔsomaa no mordekai nkyɛn sɛ
ɔnkɔka nkyerɛ no sɛ ɔhene nkoa nyinaa ne ɔhene nsase so nkurɔfoɔ nim sɛ ɔbarima anaa ɔbaa biara a ɔba ɔhene nkyɛn emu fam abannwa soɔ a wɔmfrɛɛ no no ne mmara baako pɛ na ɛwɔ hɔ ɛne sɛ wɔku no gye deɛ ɔhene bɛtene sika ahempoma akyerɛ no sɛ ɔntena aseɛ no nso adaduasa ni wɔmfrɛɛ me sɛ menkɔ ɔhene nkyɛn
na wɔkɔkaa ester nsɛm no kyerɛɛ mordekai
na mordekai kaa sɛ wɔnkɔbua ester sɛ nsusu sɛ wobɛfiri mu afi wɔ ahemfie yudafoɔ nyinaa mu
na mmom sɛ womua w ano berɛ yi mu a ɛnneɛ mmoa ne ɔgyeɛ bɛsɔre afiri baabi ama yudafoɔ na wo ne w agya fie deɛ mobɛsɛe na hwan na ɔnim sɛ ɛberɛ a ɛte sɛɛ yi nti na wo nsa aka ahennie no
ɛnna ester kaa sɛ wɔnkɔbua mordekai sɛ
kɔhyia yudafoɔ a wɔhu wɔn susa nyinaa boa ano na me nti monni mmuada na monnnidi na monnnom nnansa awia ne anadwo me nso me ne me mmaawa bɛdi mmuada saa ara na mede saa makɔ ɔhene nkyɛn a ɛnnam mmara soɔ na sɛ mewu a na mawu
na mordekai sane kɔ kɔyɛɛ sɛdeɛ ester hyɛɛ no no nyinaa
na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no ester hyɛɛ ɔhemmaa atadeɛ na ɔkɔgyinaa ahemfie emu fam abannwa so ɔhene dan no ntentensoɔ na ɔhene no te n ahennwa so wɔ ahemfie efie no pono ano ntentensoɔ
na ɛbaa sɛ ɔhene no hunuu ɔhemmaa ester sɛ ɔgyina abannwa soɔ no ɔnyaa n anim animuonyam na ɔhene no tenee sika ahempoma a ɛwɔ ne nsam no kyerɛɛ ester na ester twe pinii na ɔbɛkaa ahempoma no ti
na ɔhene no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɛdeɛn na ayɛ woɔ ɔhemmaa ester na ɛdeɛn na worehwehwɛ ɛduru ahennie no fa mpo a wɔde bɛma wo
na ester se sɛ ɔhene pɛ a ma ɔhene ne haman mmra ɛpono a mereto ama ɔhene no ase nnɛ
na ɔhene no kaa sɛ monyɛ ntɛm mma haman mmra na wɔnyɛ deɛ ester aka no na ɔhene no ne haman baa ɛpono a ester atoɔ no ase
na ɔhene no ka kyerɛɛ ester apontoɔ no ase sɛ ɛdeɛn ne w adesrɛ na wɔmma wo na ɛdeɛn ne w adeɛ a worehwehwɛ eduru ahennie no fa mpo a wɔbɛyɛ
na ester buaa sɛ deɛ mesrɛ na merehwehwɛ ne sɛ
sɛ m anim aba nyam ɔhene anim na sɛ ɔhene pɛ sɛ ɔbɛma adeɛ a meresrɛ na wɔyɛ deɛ merehwehwɛ no a ɔhene ne haman mmra ɛpono a merebɛto wɔn no ase na ɔkyena mɛyɛ sɛdeɛ ɔhene aka no
ɛnna da no haman de anigyeɛ ne akoma pa firii adie na haman hunuu mordekai ɔhene ponkɛseɛ no mu sɛ wansɔre na wanka ne ho koraa n anim no ne bo fuu mordekai sɛ
nanso haman sii ne ho so na ɔsii mu kɔɔ ne fie na ɔsoma maa wɔkɔfrɛfrɛɛ n adɔfoɔ ne ne yere seres bae
na haman kaa wɔn n ahonya animuonyam ne ne mma dodoɔ ne kɛseɛ a ɔhene ayɛ no nyinaa ne sɛdeɛ wama no so asene mmapɔmma ne ɔhene nkoa no nyinaa
na haman kaa sɛ nso ɔhemmaa ester amma obiara ne ɔhene amma ɛpono a ɔtoeɛ no ase gye me nko ara na ɔkyena nso wɔahyia me ne ɔhene rekɔ ne nkyɛn
nso yei nyinaa nnɔɔso mma me berɛ a mehunu yudani mordekai no sɛ ɔte ɔhene ponkɛseɛ mu yi
ɛnna ne yere seres ne n adɔfoɔ no nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ma wɔnyɛ dua a ne tentene yɛ basafa aduonu nnum na ɔkyena anɔpa ka kyerɛ ɔhene na wɔnsɛne mordekai wɔ so na wo ne ɔhene nkɔ apontoɔ no ase anigyeɛ mu na asɛm no sɔɔ haman ani na ɔmaa wɔyɛɛ dua no
anadwo no ɔhene anna na ɔkaa sɛ wɔmfa berɛsosɛm nkaeɛ nwoma no mmra na wɔbɛkenkann no ɔhene anim
na wɔhunuu sɛ wɔatwerɛ sɛ mordekai na ɔbɛkaa bigtana ne teres ɔhene mpiafoɔ baanu a wɔhwɛ ɛpono ano a wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔkum ɔhene akas weros no ho asɛm no
ɛnna ɔhene no kaa sɛ anidie bɛn na wɔadi mordekai na dibea bɛn na woama no yei ho na ɔhene mmeranteɛ a wɔsom no no kaa sɛ wɔnyɛɛ hwee mmaa no
na ɔhene kaa sɛ hwan na ɔwɔ abannwa no soɔ nso na haman aba ahemfie akyiri abannwa no so sɛ ɔrebɛka akyerɛ ɔhene na wɔasɛne mordekai dua a wasi ama no no so
ɛnna ɔhene asomfo no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ hwɛ haman gyina abannwa no so na ɔhene no se ɔmmra
na haman baa mu na ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ ɛdeɛn na wɔnyɛ onipa a ɔhene pɛ no anidie no na haman see no n akoma mu sɛ hwan bio mpo na ɔwɔ ka me ho a ɔhene pɛ sɛ ɔdi no ni sene me ara
na haman ka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ onipa a ɔhene pɛ no anidie no
ma wɔmfa ahennie atadeɛ a ɔhene hyɛ no mmra ne ɔpɔnkɔ a ɔhene tena ne soɔ a wɔde ahennie abotire bɔ ne tire no
na wɔmfa atadeɛ no ne ɔpɔnkɔ no nhyɛ ɔhene mmapɔmma akɛseɛ no mu bi nsa na wɔmfa nhyɛ onipa a ɔhene pɛ no anidie no na wɔmma no ntena ɔpɔnkɔ no so mfa kuro no abɔntene so na wɔmpae nni n anim sɛ sei na wɔyɛ onipa a ɔhene pɛ no anidie no
ɛnna ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ haman sɛ ka wo ho kɔfa atadeɛ ne ɔpɔnkɔ no sɛdeɛ woaka no na yɛ saa ma yudani mordekai a ɔte ɔhene ponkɛseɛ mu no nnya deɛ woaka no nyinaa mu biara
na haman faa atadeɛ no ne ɔpɔnkɔ no na ɔde hyɛɛ mordekai na ɔde no tenaa ɔpɔnkɔ no so de no faa kuro no abɔntene no so na ɔpae dii n anim sɛ sei na wɔyɛ onipa a ɔhene pɛ no anidie no
na mordekai sane baa ɔhene ponkɛseɛ no mu na haman yɛɛ ntɛm de abooboodie kɔɔ ne fie wɔ animguaseɛ mu
na haman kaa deɛ ato no nyinaa kyerɛɛ ne yere seres ne n adɔfoɔ no nyinaa na n anyansafoɔ ne ne yere seres ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ sɛ mordekai a woafiri aseɛ rehwe ase n anim yi firi yudafoɔ asefoɔ mu deɛ a worentumi no na mmom ase na wobɛhwe n anim
na wɔne no da so rekasa no ɔhene mpiafoɔ no ba bɛfaa haman ntɛm so de no kɔɔ ɛpono a ester atoɔ no ase
na ɔhene ne haman baa sɛ wɔne ɔhemmaa ester rebɛnom nsa
na ɔhene ka kyerɛɛ ester da a ɛtɔ so mmienu no mu nso apontoɔ no ase sɛ ɛdeɛn ne w adesrɛ ɔhemmaa ester na wɔmma wo na ɛdeɛn ne w adeɛ a worehwehwɛ ɛduru ahennie no fa mpo a wɔbɛyɛ
ɛnna ɔhemmaa ester buaa sɛ ɔhene sɛ m anim aba nyam wɔ w anim na sɛ ɔhene pɛ a ma wɔmfa me nkwa nkyɛ me sɛ m adeɛ a meresrɛ ne me nkurɔfoɔ deɛ sɛ m adeɛ a merehwehwɛ
na wɔatɔn yɛn me ne me man sɛ wɔnsɛe yɛn nkunkum yɛn nnwerɛ yɛn na sɛ wɔretontɔn yɛn ayɛ nkoa ne mfenaa a anka mɛyɛ komm nanso ɔtamfoɔ no ntumi nhyɛ ɔhene adeɛ a ɛbɛsɛeɛ no ananmu
ɛnna ɔhene akas weros bisaa ɔhemmaa ester sɛ hwan ne no na ɛhe na ɔwɔ na wabɔ ne tirim sɛ ɔbɛyɛ saa no
na ester se onipa ɔhohiahiafoɔ ne ɔtamfoɔ no ne saa haman otirimuɔdenfoɔ yi ɛnna nketenkete kutaa haman ɔhene ne ɔhemmaa no anim
na ɔhene no sɔree n abufuo no mu firii nsa pono no ho kɔɔ ahemfie turo no mu na haman sɔre gyinaa sɛ ɔrepa ɔhemmaa ester ne nkwa ho kyɛw ɛfiri sɛ na wahunu sɛ ɔhene no abɔ ne ho pɔbɔne
na ɔhene no sane firii ahemfie turo no mu baa nsa pono no ase na haman ahwe nnaeɛ a ester wɔ soɔ no so na ɔhene kaa sɛ ɔrebɛhyɛ ɔhemmaa ne no ada mpo m anim wɔ me ara me fie ha nso asɛm no firii ɔhene anomu ara pɛ na wɔkataa haman ani wɔkataa haman ani ɛwom sɛ wɔatwerɛ no wɔ hebri no mu sɛ n anim deɛ nanso na ɛyɛ ne ti na wɔakata sɛdeɛ wɔyɛ onipa bi a wɔrekɔkum no wɔ persia berɛ soɔ no
na harbona mpiafoɔ no mu baako kaa no ɔhene no anim sɛ hwɛ dua a haman ayɛ ama mordekai a ɔkaa ɔhene ho asɛmpa no si haman fie ne tentene yɛ basafa aduonu nnum na ɔhene no se monkɔsɛne no wɔ so
na wɔsɛnee haman dua a wasiesie ama mordekai no so na ɔhene abufuo ano dwoe
da no ara na ɔhene akas weros de haman yudafoɔ tamfo no fie maa ɔhemmaa ester na mordekai baa ɔhene no anim ɛfiri sɛ na ester aka sɛdeɛ ɔne no ntam teɛ no
na ɔhene no yii ne pɛtea a ɔgyee no haman nsam no de maa mordekai na ester de mordekai sii haman fie so
na ester kasaa bio ɔhene anim na ɔhwee ne nan ase na ɔsu koto srɛɛ no sɛ ɔnyi agagni haman bɔne ne n adwene a ɔdwenee yudafoɔ ho no
na ɔhene tenee sika ahempoma no kyerɛɛ ester ɛnna ester sɔre gyinaa ɔhene no anim
na ɔkaa sɛ sɛ ɔhene pɛ na sɛ m anim aba nyam n anim na asɛm no tene ɔhene anim na me nso mesɔ n ani a ma wɔntwerɛ nkɔtwa nwoma a agagni haman a ɔyɛ hamedata ba dwenee ho na ɔtwerɛɛ sɛ ɔde rekɔsɛe yudafoɔ a wɔwɔ ɔhene nsase nyinaa soɔ no mu
na mɛyɛ dɛn na matumi ahwɛ bɔne a ɛbɛto me manfoɔ no na mɛyɛ dɛn na matumi mahwɛ me nkurɔfoɔ sɛeɛ
ɛnna ɔhene akas weros ka kyerɛɛ ɔhemmaa ester ne yudani mordekai sɛ hwɛ mede haman fie mama ester na ɔno nso wɔasɛne no dua no so sɛ anka ɔde ne nsa reka yudafoɔ no nti
na mo ara montwerɛ yudafoɔ no ho sɛdeɛ mopɛ wɔ ɔhene din mu na momfa ɔhene pɛtea nsɔ ano ɛfiri sɛ atwerɛ a wɔatwerɛ no ɔhene din mu na wɔde ɔhene pɛtea asɔ ano no wɔntumi nnane ani
ɛnna wɔfrɛfrɛɛ ɔhene atwerɛfoɔ berɛ no mu bosome a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa a ɛne bosome siwan siwan ɛte sɛ kɔtɔnimma bosome mpaemu ne ayɛwohomumɔ bosome mpaemu no da a ɛtɔ so aduonu mmiɛnsa no soɔ na wɔtwerɛɛ no sɛdeɛ mordekai hyɛeɛ no nyinaa kɔmaa yudafoɔ no ne amradofoɔ akɛseɛ ne nketewa no ne nsase no so mmapɔmma no de firi india kɔsi etiopia nsase ahodoɔ ɔha aduonu nson asase biara sɛdeɛ n atwerɛ teɛ ne ɔman biara sɛdeɛ ne kasa teɛ ne yudafoɔ nso sɛdeɛ wɔn atwerɛ ne wɔn kasa teɛ
na ɔde ɔhene akas weros din na ɛtwerɛeɛ na ɔde ɔhene pɛtea sɔɔ ano na ɔde nwoma no somasomaa awɛmfoɔ a wɔtete apɔnkɔ soɔ ne mfunumupɔnkɔ a wɔn ho yɛ hare a wɔyɛ apɔnkɔbere mfrafraeɛ mma so
emu na ɔhene maa yudafoɔ a wɔwɔ kuro biara so kwan sɛ wɔmmoaboa wɔn ano nhyia na wɔn nkwa nti wɔnnyina hɔ na wɔnsɛe na wɔnkum na wɔnnwerɛ ɛdɔm ne ɔman ne mantam biara a ɛhiahia wɔn ho mmɔfra ne mmaa nso sɛ wɔbɛfom wɔn nnoɔma
da koro ɔhene akas weros nsase no nyinaa so bosome a ɛtɔ so dummienu a ɛne bosome adar no da a ɛtɔ so dummiɛnsa so
atwerɛ no nsususoɔ a wɔde kɔhyɛɛ mmara nsase no nyinaa soɔ no ano da hɔ ma amanaman no nyinaa sɛ yudafoɔ no nsiesie wɔn ho nsie da no na wɔntɔ wɔn atamfoɔ so were
ammirikatufoɔ a wɔtete mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hare no soɔ no nam ɔhene asɛm so firi kɔe wɔkaa wɔn ho ntɛmntɛm na wɔhyɛɛ mmara no susa ahenkuro mu
na mordekai firii adi firii ɔhene no anim na ɔhyɛ ahentadeɛ bibire ne fufuo ne sika abotire bɔ no ne nwera pa ne tamkɔkɔɔ atadeɛ hyɛ no yuu na susa kuro no dii ahurisie na wɔn ani gyeeɛ
yudafoɔ no nyaa nkwa ne anigyeɛ ne ahosɛpɛ ne anidie
na asase biara ne kuro biara a ɔhene asɛm ne ne mmara no duruu soɔ no anigyeɛ ne ahosɛpɛ baa hɔ maa yudafoɔ no apontoɔ ne dapadie mu na asase no so amanaman no mu nnipa bebree danedanee wɔn ho yudafoɔ ɛfiri sɛ na yudafoɔ no ho hu aka wɔn
na bosome a ɛtɔ so dummienu a ɛne bosome adar no da a ɛtɔ so dummiɛnsa no a ɔhene asɛm ne ne mmara no duruu sɛ wɔdi soɔ no da no ara a yudafoɔ atamfoɔ ani daa so sɛ wɔbɛdi yudafoɔ so no danee sɛ yudafoɔ no mmom na wɔdii wɔn atamfoɔ no soɔ
yudafoɔ no boaboaa wɔn ano hyiaa wɔn nkuro mu ɔhene akas weros nsase nyinaa so sɛ wɔde wɔn nsa bɛgu wɔn a wɔpɛ wɔn bɔne no so na obiara annyina wɔn anim ɛfiri sɛ na wɔn ho hu aka amanaman no nyinaa
na nsase no so mmapɔmma ne amradofoɔ akɛseɛ ne nkumaa ne wɔn a wɔyɛ ɔhene adwuma no nyinaa boaa yudafoɔ no ɛfiri sɛ na mordekai ho hu aka wɔn
na mordekai yɛ onipa kɛseɛ ɔhene no fie na ne nka hyetaa nsase no nyinaa so na ɔbarima mordekai no kɔɔ so ara yɛɛ kɛseɛ
na yudafoɔ no de afena ano ne okum ne ɔsɛeɛ kaa wɔn atamfoɔ nyinaa na wɔyɛɛ wɔn atamfoɔ no sɛdeɛ wɔpɛ
na susa ahenkuro no mu no yudafoɔ no kumm na wɔsɛee mmarima ahanum
na parsandata dalfon aspata
porata adalia aridata
parmasta arisai aridai ne waisata
yudafoɔ hohiahiafoɔ hamedata ba haman ne mmammarima du no nso wɔkunkumm wɔn na fomfa adeɛ no deɛ wɔamfa wɔn nsa anka
da no ara nnipa a wɔkunkumm wɔn susa ahenkuro mu no dodoɔ bɛduruu ɔhene no aso mu
na ɔhene no ka kyerɛɛ ɔhemmaa ester sɛ susa ahenkuro mu na yudafoɔ akunkum na wɔasɛe mmarima ahanum ne haman mmammarima du no na ɛdeɛn na wɔayɛ ɔhene nsase a aka no soɔ nanso ɛdeɛn ne deɛ wosrɛ na wɔmma wo na ɛdeɛn ne deɛ woda so repɛ na wɔnyɛ
na ester se sɛ ɔhene pɛ a ma wɔnnya yudafoɔ a wɔwɔ susa no kwan nso ɔkyena na wɔnyɛ sɛdeɛ ɛnnɛ mmara no teɛ na haman mma du no wɔnsensɛne wɔn dua no so
na ɔhene no kaa sɛ wɔnyɛ saa na wɔhyɛɛ mmara no wɔ susa na wɔsensɛnee haman mmammarima du no
na yudafoɔ a wɔwɔ susa no boaboaa wɔn ano bosome adar da a ɛtɔ so dunan no soɔ nso na wɔkunkumm mmarima ahasa susa na fomfa adeɛ no deɛ wɔamfa wɔn nsa anka
na yudafoɔ no nkaeɛ a wɔwɔ ɔhene no nsase no soɔ no nso boaboaa wɔn ano hyiae na wɔperee wɔn nkwa na wɔnyaa wɔn atamfoɔ ho asomdwoeɛ na wɔkunkumm wɔn atamfoɔ no mu nnipa mpemaduɔson nnum na fomfa adeɛ no deɛ wɔamfa wɔn nsa anka
bosome adar da a ɛtɔ so dummiɛnsa mu na wɔnyaa ɔhome ne da a ɛtɔ so dunan no so na wɔde yɛɛ apontoɔ ne anigyeɛ da
na yudafoɔ a wɔwɔ susa no boaboaa wɔn ano ne da a ɛtɔ so dummiɛnsa ne ne da a ɛtɔ so dunan so na wɔhomee ne da a ɛtɔ so dunum mu na wɔde yɛɛ apontoɔ ne anigyeɛ da
enti yudafoɔ a wɔwɔ nkuraaseɛ no wɔn a wɔtete nkuro a ɛho nni afasuo mu no de bosome adar da a ɛtɔ so dunan no yɛ anigyeɛ ne apontoɔ da ne dapa a wɔde nnoɔma mema wɔn ho wɔn ho
na mordekai twerɛɛ nsɛm yi na ɔsoma maa wɔde nwoma kɔmaa yudafoɔ a wɔwɔ ɔhene akas weros nsase nyinaa soɔ no nyinaa wɔn a wɔbɛn ne wɔn a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri no
sɛ wɔmma yei ntim wɔn tirim sɛ wɔbɛdi bosome adar da a ɛtɔ so dunan ne ne da a ɛtɔ so dunum no daa afe
sɛ nna a yudafoɔ nyaa mu home firii wɔn atamfoɔ nsam ne bosome a ɛdanee wɔn firii awerɛhoɔ mu kɔɔ anigyeɛ mu na ɛfirii abooboodie mu kɔɔ dapa mu sɛ wɔmfa nyɛ apontoɔ ne anigyeɛ ne ɔyɔnko ne yɔnko adiama ne ahiafoɔ adekyɛ nna
na yudafoɔ no sɔɔ deɛ wɔafiri aseɛ reyɛ ne deɛ mordekai twerɛ brɛɛ wɔn no mu
sɛ agagni haman a ɔyɛ hamedata ba yudafoɔ no nyinaa tamfo no dwenee yudafoɔ no ho sɛ ɔbɛsɛe wɔn na ɔtwee pur ɛne ntonto sɛ ɔbɛdwerɛ wɔn na wasɛe wɔn
na ester baa ɔhene anim no ɔkaa no nwoma no mu sɛ haman adwemmɔne a ɔdwenee no yudafoɔ ho no nsane mmɛbua n atifi na wɔnsɛne no ne ne mma dua no so
enti wɔfrɛɛ nna yi purim sɛdeɛ pur din no teɛ enti nso nwoma yi mu nsɛm no nyinaa ne deɛ wɔhunuu no asɛm yi mu ne deɛ ɛtɔɔ wɔn soɔ no nti
yudafoɔ no maa no timii na wɔde too wɔn ho ne wɔn asefoɔ ne wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho bɛbataa wɔn ho nyinaa so sɛ wɔmmma nna yi mmienu nntwa mu a wɔrenni no sɛdeɛ wɔn atwerɛ ne wɔn berɛ a wɔahyɛ no daa afe nyinaa no teɛ
na wɔnkae nna yi na wɔnni no awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mmusua nsase ne nkuro nyinaa so na purim nna yi nntwa yudafoɔ no tiri so na ne nkaeɛ nso to nntwa wɔn asefoɔ mu
na ɔhemmaa ester a ɔyɛ abihail ba no ne yudani mordekai de tumi nyinaa twerɛe sɛ wɔbɛma purim nwoma a ɛtɔ so mmienu yi atim
na ɔsoma maa wɔde nwoma kɔmaa yudafoɔ nyinaa wɔ ɔhene akas weros ahennie nsase ɔha aduonu nson no so ɔmannwoeɛ ne nokorɛdie nsɛm
sɛ wɔde rema purim nna yi atim ne berɛ a wɔahyɛ no mu sɛdeɛ yudani mordekai ne ɔhemmaa ester ahyɛ wɔ wɔn mu no ne sɛdeɛ wɔama mmuadadie ne wɔn sufrɛ nsɛm no atim wɔn kra ne wɔn asefoɔ mu no
na ɔhemmaa ester mmara na ɛtintimm purim no ho nneyɛɛ nyinaa na wɔatwerɛ ne nyinaa nso
na ɔhene akas weros de apeatoɔ too asase no ne mpoano aman no so
na ne tumi ne ne mmaninyɛ nneyɛɛ ne mordekai kɛseɛ a ɔhene no maa no yɛeɛ no ho nsɛm no wɔantwerɛ no media ne persia ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu
na yudani mordekai no ne deɛ ɔdi ɔhene akas weros akyire wɔ tumi mu yudafoɔ no mu nso ɔyɛ onipa kɛseɛ na ne nuanom dodoɔ no pɛɛ n asɛm ɔhwehwɛɛ papa maa ne man na ɔkaa asomdwoeɛsɛm maa n asefoɔ nyinaa
﻿ ɔbarima bi tenaa us asase so a ne din de hiob na ɔbarima no di mu na ɔtene na ɔsuro onyankopɔn na ɔyi ne ho firi bɔne ho
na ɔwoo mmammarima baason ne mmammaa baasa
na ɔwɔ nnwan mpem nson ne yoma mpensa ne anantwie mpamho ahanum ne mfunumu bereɛ ahanum ne asomfoɔ bebree pa na ɔbarima yi yɛ titire wɔ apueeɛ mma no nyinaa mu
na ne mmammarima no kɔto pono wɔ ɔbaako biara fie obiara ne ne da na wɔsoma maa wɔkɔfrɛfrɛɛ wɔn nua mmaanom baasa no baa sɛ wɔne wɔn mmɛdidi na wɔnnom
na apontoɔ nna no fa wɔn so hyia a hiob soma kɔdwira wɔn na ɔtua nhema kɔbɔ ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ sɛdeɛ wɔn nyinaa dodoɔ teɛ ɛfiri sɛ hiob kaa sɛ ebia me mma no ayɛ bɔne na wɔadome onyankopɔn wɔn akoma mu saa na na hiob yɛ daa
na ɛbaa sɛ da bi ɔsoro dɔm hebri no ka no sɛ onyankopɔn mma no ba bɛgyinaa awurade anim na satan nso dii wɔn mu bae
na awurade bisaa satan sɛ ɛhe na wofiri baeɛ yi na satan buaa awurade sɛ mefiri asase so kyini ne ɛso ananteananteɛ na mereba
na awurade ka kyerɛɛ satan sɛ woadwene m akoa hiob nso ho na obiara nni hɔ a ɔte sɛ ɔno asase no soɔ ɔbarima a ɔdi mu na ɔtene ɔsuro onyankopɔn na ɔyi ne ho firi bɔne ho
na satan buaa awurade sɛ ɛnyɛ biribi nti na hiob suro onyankopɔn no anaa
ɛnyɛ wo na woabɔ ɔno ne ne fie ne ade a ɔwɔ nyinaa ho ban ahyia ne nsa ano adwuma woahyira so na n afieboa ase akyene asase so
ɛnneɛ afei tene wo nsa ka deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa hwɛ ɛ sɛ ɔrennome wo ntɛm ara anaa
na awurade ka kyerɛɛ satan sɛ hwɛ deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa wɔ wo nsam ɔno ara deɛ mfa wo nsa nka no ɛnna satan firii awurade anim kɔeɛ
na da bi na hiob mmammarima ne ne mmammaa redidi na wɔrenom nsa wɔ wɔn nua panin fie
na ɔbɔfoɔ bi baa hiob nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ berɛ a anantwie no refɛntɛm na mfunumu bereɛ no nso redidi wɔn nkyɛn mu
ɛnna sabafoɔ bɛto hyɛɛ wɔn so na wɔafa wɔn kɔ na mmeranteɛ no wɔde nkrantɛ ano akukum wɔn na me nko ara na mafiri mu maba sɛ merebɛka makyerɛ wo
ɔno da so rekasa no ɔfoforɔ ba bɛkaa sɛ nyankopɔn gya firi soro atɔ abɛhye nnwan ne mmeranteɛ no na asɛe wɔn na me nko ara na mafiri mu maba sɛ merebɛka makyerɛ wo
ɔno da so rekasa no obi ba bɛkaa sɛ kaldeafoɔ abɔ kyenku mmiɛnsa abɛto ahyɛ yoma no so afa wɔn kɔ na mmeranteɛ no so wɔakukum wɔn nkrantɛ ano na me nko ara na mafiri mu sɛ merebɛka makyerɛ wo
ɔno nso da so rekasa no ɔfoforɔ ba bɛkaa sɛ wo mmammarima ne wo mmammaa redidi na wɔrenom nsa wɔ wɔn nua panin fie no
hwɛ mframa kɛseɛ firi ɛserɛ so aba abɛbɔ ɛdan no ntwea nnan no na adwiri agu wɔn so ama wɔawuwu na me nko ara na mafiri mu sɛ merebɛka makyerɛ wo
ɛnna hiob sɔre sunsuanee n atadeɛ mu na ɔyii ne ti na ɔhwee fam sɔree onyankopɔn
na ɔkaa sɛ adagya na mede mefiri me na yam baeɛ na adagya na mede bɛsane akɔ awurade de mae na awurade afa nhyira nka awurade din
yei nyinaa mu no hiob anyɛ bɔne sɛ ɔbɛbɔ onyankopɔn soboɔ
na da bi nso ɔsoro dɔm sane baa sɛ wɔrebɛgyina awurade anim na satan nso dii wɔn mu baa sɛ ɔrebɛgyina awurade anim bi
na awurade bisaa satan sɛ ɛhe na wofiri baeɛ yi na satan buaa awurade sɛ mefiri asase so kyini ne ɛso anantenanteɛ na mereba
na awurade ka kyerɛɛ satan sɛ woadwene m akoa hiob ho na obiara nni hɔ a ɔte sɛ ɔno asase so ɔbarima a ɔdi mu na ɔtene ɔsuro onyankopɔn na ɔyi ne ho firi bɔne ho nanso ɔda so kura ne mudie no mu ara na wo satan woahwanyan me atia no sɛ mensɛe no kwa
na satan buaa awurade sɛ wɔde wedeɛ pere wedeɛ na deɛ onipa wɔ nyinaa ɔde ma pere ne kra
na afei tene wo nsa na ka ne dompe ne ne nam sɛ ɔrennome wo ntɛm ara anaa
na awurade ka kyerɛɛ satan sɛ hwɛ ɔni ɔwɔ wo nsam ne nkwa nko na kora
ɛnna satan firii awurade anim kɔeɛ na ɔde akuro bɔne kɔtutuu hiob firi ne nan ase kɔsii n apampam
na ɔfaa kyɛmferɛ bi sɛ ɔde redwi ne ho na ɔtenaa nso mu
na ne yere bisaa no sɛ woda so kura wo mudie no mu ara dome onyankopɔn na wu
na ɔbuaa no sɛ sɛdeɛ mmaa agyegyentwie no mu bi kasa na wokasa yi yɛagye nyankopɔn hɔ adepa na adebɔne na yɛrennye anaa yei nyinaa mu no hiob amfa n ano anyɛ bɔne
na hiob nnamfo baasa tee amanehunu a aba ne soɔ yi nyinaa no wɔn mu biara firi deɛ ɔwɔ bae temanni elifas ne suhini bildad ne naamani sofar na wɔbɛhyiaa sɛ wɔrebɛgyam no na wɔakyekyere ne werɛ
na wɔfiri akyirikyiri memaa wɔn ani so na wɔhunuu no no wɔanhu no na wɔmemaa wɔn nne so sui na wɔsunsuanee wɔn ntadeɛ mu na wɔtoo mfuturo kɔɔ soro guu wɔn atifi
na wɔne no tenatenaa fam nnanson adekyeeɛ ne adesaeɛ na obiara ne no ankasa ɛfiri sɛ wɔhunuu sɛ n amanehunu no so pa ara
yei akyiri no hiob buee n ano na ɔdomee n awoda
na hiob kaa sɛ
ma ɛda a wɔwoo me mu no nyera ne anadwo a ɛse wɔanyinsɛn ɔbabanin no
ɛda no nnuru sum mma onyankopɔn mmfiri soro mmmisa akyiri kwan na hann biara nnhyerɛn so
esum ne sunsum nnye no mununkum ntena so deɛ ɛma adekyeeɛ duru sum nyi no hu
anadwo no esum kabii nkuta no wɔmmma no nnnya anigyeɛ biara afe nna no mu wɔmmma no mmma abosome dodoɔ no mu
hwɛ anadwo no nyɛ kwawee ahurisie dwom biara mma mu
ma wɔn a wɔdome da no mmɔ no dua wɔn a wɔtumi hwanyan dɛnkyɛmmirampɔn mpo no
n ahemadakye nsoromma bɛduru sum ɛbɛtwɛn hann na ebi remma na ɛrenhunu adekyeeɛ anisuatɛtɛ
ɛfiri sɛ anto m awoɔ apono mu na anyi ɔhaw anhunta m ani
adɛn nti na manwu yafunu mu na mannyaa mu awoeɛ
adɛn nti na anankoroma sɔɔ me na adɛn nti na metoo nufoɔ menumiiɛ
anka sɛsɛɛ meda hɔ mayɛ komm anka mada ɛno deɛ anka manya ahomegyeɛ
me ne ahemfo ne asase so afotufoɔ a wɔkyekyeree amamfo faeɛ no
anaasɛ me ne mmapɔmma a wɔwɔ sika wɔn a wɔde dwetɛ hyehyɛɛ wɔn afie amaama no
anaasɛ menni hɔ sɛ ɛpɔn ba a wɔakora no anaa nkɔkoaa a wɔanhunu hann da
ɛhɔ na abɔnefoɔ nha obiara bio na abrɛfoɔ gye wɔn ahome
ɛhɔ ara na nneduafoɔ te dwoodwoo wɔnte apiafoɔ nne
ɛhɔ na onipa ketewa ne onipa kɛseɛ wɔ na akoa afiri ne wura nsa
adɛn nti na ɔma mmɔborɔni hann na ɔde nkwa ma wɔn a wɔn kra werɛ ahoɔ
wɔn a wɔtwɛn owuo na ɛmma na wɔbɔre hwehwɛ no sene akoradeɛ
wɔn a wɔn ani gye mmorosoɔ na wɔn ho sɛpɛ wɔn sɛ anka wɔbɛnya damena
ne ɔbarima a wɔde ne kwan ahunta na onyankopɔn de ban atwa ne ho ahyia
na m apinisie abɛsi m aduane ananmu na mesu gu sɛ nsuo
na deɛ mesuro no ɛno ara na ɛto me na deɛ m akoma tutu ho no ɛba me so
mennya ahodwoɔ ne kommyɛ ne ɔhome na ahodwan ara na ɛba
ɛnna temanni elifas bua see sɛ
sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔka asɛm yi ho bi kyerɛ wo a ɛbɛyɛ wo ahomete anaa nanso mpo twa ara na ɛtwa sɛ ɔka
hwɛ wo na woatenetene nnipa bebree na nsa a agoɔ no woahyɛ no den
wo nsɛm ama deɛ ɔrebɛhwe ase agyina na nankoroma a ahodwo no wɔahyɛ no den
na afei ɛtoo woɔ yi woagyigya ɛkaa woɔ yi woabɔ nnyinnyen
ɛnyɛ wo nyamesuro ne deɛ wode wo ho to soɔ na w akwan a ɛtene ne w anidasoɔ anaa
kae ɛ hwan na ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara na wɔasɛe no pɛn anaa ɛhe na wɔatwa ateneneefoɔ atwene pɛn
manya nhunui sɛ wɔn a wɔfɛntɛm amumuyɛ na wɔgu mmusuo no ɛno ara na wɔtwa
nyankopɔn home sɛe wɔn na wɔhye n abufuo mframa ano
wote sɛ gyata mmobɔmu ne ɔsebɔ nne a ɛgyae na gyataburuwa sebɔmmɔfoɔ tutu no
ɛno na hanam bɛbɔ ɛserɛ mu sɛe ama no awu na gyatabereɛ mma abɔ pete
na me deɛ asɛm bi wiawiaa ne ho baa me nkyɛn na m aso tee ɛho asomusɛm bi
ɔdadwene a ɛfiri anadwo adehunu mu mu berɛ a nnahɔɔ atɔ nnipa soɔ no
ehu ne ahopopoɔ kaa me na ɛmaa me nnompe nyinaa wosoe
na honhom bi twaa mu faa m ani so me ho nwi nyinaa sɔre gyinagyinae
ɛgyinae nanso manhunu ne su suban bi gyinagyina m ani so metee nne bɔkɔɔ bi sɛ
ɔdasani tene sene onyankopɔn anaa onipa ho te sene ne yɛfoɔ
hwɛ ne nkoa mpo ɔmfa ne ho nto wɔn so na n abɔfoɔ no ɔbu wɔn sɛ wɔtɔ mu
na nkantom wɔn a wɔte dɔteɛ adan mu na wɔn nnyinasoɔ wɔ mfuturo mu na wɔfurofuro wɔn sɛ abubummabaa
ɛfiri anɔpa kɔsi anwummerɛ na wɔaposa wɔn wɔyera korakora a obi nnwene ho
sɛ wɔtete wɔn ho ntomadan homa a ɛnyɛ wuo na wɔwuo a wɔanhunu nyansa biara
frɛ ɛ obi wɔ hɔ a ɔbɛbua woɔ na akronkronfoɔ mu hwan na wode bɛdan no
na ahisɛm kum agyimifoɔ na ninkuntwe kum atetekwaa
me deɛ mahunu ogyimifoɔ a ɔgyee nhini nanso amonom hɔ ara na medomee ne tenabea
ne mma ne nkwagyeɛ ntam twe na wɔpɛkyɛ wɔn wɔ kuro pono mu a ɔgyefoɔ nni hɔ
wɔn a wɔdi kɔm bɛdi ne nnɔbaeɛ na nsɔeɛ mu mpo na wɔbɛfa na adufudepɛfoɔ amene wɔn adedodoɔ
ɛfiri sɛ mmusuo mfifiri mfiri mfuturo mu na ɔhaw nso mfu mfiri fam
na wɔwoo onipa maa ɔhaw sɛ ogyaframa tutu kɔ soro no
na me a anka mɛhwehwɛ nyankopɔn akyiri kwan na mede m asɛm mahyɛ ne nsa
deɛ ɔyɛ ade kɛseɛ a ɛnni nhwehwɛmu anwanwadeɛ nso a wɔntumi nkan
deɛ ɔma osuo tɔ asase soɔ na ɔma nsuo ba wira mu
ɔde ahobrɛasefoɔ tena deɛ ɛkorɔn na ɔma abooboodifoɔ so kɔ yiedie mu
ɔsɛe anitefoɔ atirimpɔ na wɔn nsa antumi anyɛ adepa biara
ɔkyere anyansafoɔ wɔn aniteɛ mu na ɔbutu akontonkyifoɔ agyina
wɔtɔ sum mu awia na awia ketee wɔkeka sɛ anadwo
na ɔgye ohiani firi afena a ɛfiri wɔn anomu no ano ne ɔhoɔdenfoɔ nsam
na mmɔborɔni nya anidasoɔ na amumuyɛ mua n ano
hwɛ nhyira ne ɔdasani a onyankopɔn ka n anim enti mpo otumfoɔ atenetene no
deut hos na ɔno na ɔpira na ɔkyekyere soɔ ɔpɛkyɛ na ne nsa nso sa
ɔbɛyi wo afiri ahohiahia nsia mu aane na deɛ ɛtɔ so nson no mu bɔne renka wo
ɛkɔm berɛ ɔbɛgye wo afiri owuo mu na akodie mu nso wagye wo afiri afena ano
ɔbɛkora wo afiri tɛkyerɛma mpire ano na wɔrensuro sɛeɛ a ɛbɛba
wobɛsere sɛeɛ ne ɛkɔm na asase so mmoadoma nso worensuro wɔn
ɛfiri sɛ wo ne wiram aboɔ mpo bɛyɛ apam na wiram mmoadoma bɛdwo ama wo
na wobɛhunu sɛ wo ntomadan si hɔ dwoodwoo na wohwɛ wo tenabea a worenhunu sɛ atɔ mu
na wobɛhunu nso sɛ w asefoɔ bɛdɔɔso pii na wɔn a wɔfiri wo mu bɛyɛ sɛ asase so nhahan
wode onyinkyerɛ na ɛbɛkɔ damena mu sɛ wɔde ayuo afiafi ba mu ne berɛ mu no
hwɛ yei na yɛahwehwɛ ahunu sɛ ɛteɛ nie tie na wo nso hunu fa
na hiob gyee so sɛ
o sɛ anka wɔrekari m awerɛhoɔ na wɔde me yea nso agu nsania mu susu ɛ
ɛno deɛ anka ɛbɛsene mpoano anwea duru enti na me nsɛm ayɛ hatuhatu yi
na otumfoɔ agyan tuatua me mu me honhom renom emu borɔ nyankopɔn ahuyideɛ atwa me ho mpasua
ɔtorɔmo nya ɛserɛ mono a ɔteateam anaa ɔnantwie su n aduane ho
wɔdi aduane hunu a nkyene nni mu ɛdɛ bi wɔ kosua mu fufuo mu
adeɛ a me kra ampɛ sɛ ɛbɛka me no ɛno ara na ayɛ me aduane a ɛyɛ me nwunu
o sɛ anka merenya m abisadeɛ na onyankopɔn ama me m anigyinadeɛ no ɛ
sɛ onyankopɔn pene na ɔpɛkyɛ me na ɔgya ne nsa kwan na ɛtwa me ɛ
anka ɛbɛyɛ me awerɛkyekyerɛ ara na madi ahurisie ɛyea a ɛnni adɔna me soɔ no mu ɛfiri sɛ mensane ɔkronkronni no nsɛm no
m ahoɔden ne deɛn sɛ mede bɛtɔ me bo aseɛ na m awieeɛ ne deɛn sɛ me kra bɛkyɛre ho
m ahoɔden yɛ aboɔ ahoɔden me honam yɛ kɔbere mfrafraeɛ
ɛnyɛ mmoa bi na ɛnni me mu na wɔatu ahoɔden afiri me ho
deɛ ne home te no no ɛsɛ no ne yɔnko nsam adɔeɛ anyɛ saa a ɔgyaa otumfoɔ no suro
me nuanom twa nkontompo sɛ asusɔsuwa sɛ subonhwa a emu nsuwansuwa resene korɔ
nsukyeneeɛ nti ani fono sukyerɛmma hyɛne mu hunta
sɛ hyehyeɛ ka no a ɛtwitwa ahuhuro mu ɛyera firi n afa
n akwantemfoɔ no kwan kontonkonton ɛdane huruhuro kɔ soro na ɛyera
tema akwantemfoɔ asafo no hwɛe seba anantefoɔ ani daa so
wɔn ani wuu sɛ wɔde wɔn ani too soɔ wɔkɔduruu ho na wɔn anim guu ase
na afei saa ara na mo nso moteɛ moahunu m amanehunu yi moannya tema biara amma me
maka sɛ mommrɛ me biribi na me nti momfa mo adeɛ bi nkyɛ
na monyi me ɔhohiahiafoɔ nsam na monnye me mfiri nhyɛsofoɔ nsam anaa
monkyerɛkyerɛ me na mɛyɛ komm na deɛ mafom wɔ mu no momma menhunu
sɛdeɛ atɛntenenee si yɛ den fa na mo atɛnyie yi deɛ animka bɛn na ɛwɔ mu
nsɛm ho animka na modwene ɔwerɛhoni deɛ ne nsɛm yɛ mframa
awisiaa so mpo moretwe ntonto na mo yɔnko tiri nso moredi ano
na afei mompɛ ani pa nhwɛ me na merenni torɔ mo anim ha
mompɛ mu bio ɛ na mommmu ntɛnkyea na monsane mpɛ mu na m asɛm wom ara
deɛ ɛntene bi wɔ me tɛkyerɛma so anaasɛ me dodom nhunu abusudeɛ
ɛnyɛ akodie na ɛwɔ hɔ ma ɔdasani asase soɔ na ne nna te sɛ ɔpaani nna
sɛ akoa pere onwunu ho ne sɛ ɔpaani hwɛ n apaadeɛ kwan no
saa ara na wɔama madi abosome hunu na wɔabu ɔhaw anadwo ama me
sɛ mekɔda a meka sɛ da bɛn na mɛsɔreɛ na anadwo atwam akorɔ ɔdafatwa fono me kɔsi ahemadakye
me honam fira mmoaa ne dɔteɛ abon me wedeɛ ayɛ twann na ɛrefiri nsuo
me nna yɛ hare sene ɔnwomfoɔ akurokurowa na ɛrehi na anidasoɔ biara nni hɔ
kae sɛ me nkwa yɛ mframa m ani rensane nhunu papa
deɛ ɔhu me anisoɔ renhu me bio w ani tua me nso na menni hɔ
sɛdeɛ mununkum sa na ɛkorɔ no saa ara na deɛ ɔsiane kɔ asamando no remforo mma bio
ɔrensane mma ne fie bio na ne tenabea renhu no bio
enti me nso meremmua m ano mɛkasa me honhom ahohiahia mu mɛsi apini m awerɛhoɔ mu
meyɛ ɛpo anaa asuo mu bɔpɔn na ɛma wode awɛmfoɔ sisi me ho yi
sɛ mese me mpa bɛkyekyere me werɛ na me daberɛ bɛdwodwo m apinisie no a
ɛnneɛ wode daeɛso hyɛ me yea na anisoadehunu mu na woma mebɔ binim
na ɛma me kra yi menebɔ ne owuo mmom sene me nnompe yi
afono me merentena ase daa gyaa me na me nna yɛ huruhuro
ɔdasani ne hwan a wobu no ɔkɛseɛ na wodwene ne ho
na wohwɛ no daa anɔpa na wotaa sɔ no hwɛ ara
worenyi w ani mfiri me so de rekɔsi da bɛn wonnya me kwan na memmene me ntasuo mpo
mayɛ bɔne a ɛdeɛn na mayɛ woɔ nnipa hwɛfoɔ adɛn na wode me ayɛ w adeɛ a wo ne no anya na madane adesoa ama me ho yi
na adɛn na womfa me mmarato nkyɛ na womma me mfomsoɔ nsene nkorɔ na afei mɛda mfuturo mu na wobɛhwehwɛ me nso na menni hɔ bio
ɛnna suhini bildad gyee so sɛ
ɛnkɔsi berɛ bɛn na wobɛka yeinom na w anomu nsɛm bɛyɛ sɛ mframa denden yi
onyankopɔn bɛkyea atemmuo anaasɛ otumfoɔ bɛkyea tenenee
sɛ wo mma ayɛ no bɔne a wagyaa wɔn de wɔn ahyɛ wɔn mmarato nsam
sɛ wo ara wohwehwɛ nyankopɔn akyiri kwan na wokoto srɛ otumfoɔ no
sɛ wo ho te na wotene a ampa ara ɔbɛkanyan ne ho ama wo na wama wo tenenee tenabea no adi yie
na sɛ mpo wo mfitiaseɛ yɛ ketewa a w awieeɛ bɛso kokuroo
mesrɛ wo bisa awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ ɛ na ma w akoma mmra deɛ wɔn agyanom ahwehwɛ ahunu no so
na yɛn deɛ nnora nko ara na yɛfiri hɔnom na yɛnnim hwee ɛfiri sɛ yɛn nna te sɛ sunsum asase so
ɛnyɛ wɔn na wɔbɛkyerɛ wo na wɔaka akyerɛ woɔ anaa na wɔayiyi nsɛm afiri wɔn akoma mu
nkyɛkyerɛ fifiri deɛ ɔwora nnie anaasɛ mmɛwa bɛma ne ho so deɛ nsuo nnie
ɛda so wɔ ne frɔmfrɔmyɛ mu a wɔntwaeɛ no ɛdi wura nyinaa anim kusa
saa ara na wɔn a wɔn werɛ firi onyankopɔn nyinaa akwan teɛ na ɔbɔnefoɔ anidasoɔ bɛyera
ɛfiri sɛ wɔtwa deɛ ɔde ne ho to soɔ na n anidasoɔ yɛ ananse ntentan
ɔtwere ne dan na ɛrennyina ɔkura mu nso ɛrentena hɔ
ɔyɛ frɔmfrɔm owia ano na ne mman yiyi kata ne turo so
ne nhini mantammantam aboɔkuo ho ɔhyɛne aboɔ ntam
sɛ wɔsɛe no firi ne tenabea a ɛpa no ka sɛ menhunuu wo da
hwɛ sɛdeɛ ne kwan ho ahosɛpɛ teɛ ne no na mfuturo no mu na afoforɔ fifire
hwɛ onyankopɔn mpo deɛ ɔdi mu na abɔnefoɔ nso ɔnsɔ wɔn nsa
ɔde sereɛ bɛhyɛ w anomu ma na wama ahurisie nne afa w anofafa mu
w atamfo bɛfira aniwuo na abɔnefoɔ ntomadan rennyina hɔ bio
na hiob gyee so sɛ
ampa ara menim sɛ ɛte saa na ɔdasani bɛtene wɔ nyankopɔn anim sɛn
sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔne no yiyi ano a ɔntumi mmua no apem mu baako mpo
akoma mu nyansafoɔ ne tumi mu hoɔdenfoɔ no hwan na wasene ne kɔn wɔ ne soɔ na asi no yie
ɔtutu mmepɔ mpatuo mu ɔbutu no n abufuo mu
ɔwoso asase firi n atenaeɛ na ne nnyinasoɔ popo
ɔhyɛ owia na ɛmpue na ɔsosɔ nsoromma ano
ɔno nko na ɔtrɛ ɔsoro mu na ɔtiatia po asorɔkyeɛ so
ɔyɛ nsorommason nwenwenente ne akokɔbaatan ne ne mma ne anafoɔ fam mpiakyire
ɔyɛ ade akɛseɛ a ɛnni nhwehwɛmu ne anwanwadeɛ a wɔntumi nkan
hwɛ ɔnam me ho nso menhu no ɔsene nso menhu no
hwɛ ɔhwim kɔ hwan na ɔbɛsane no hwan na ɔbɛbisa no sɛ ɛdeɛn na woreyɛ yi
onyankopɔn rensianka n abufuo rahab aboafoɔ brɛ wɔn ho ase wɔ n ase
na nkantom sɛ me na mɛbua no anaasɛ mɛhwehwɛ me nsɛm mu na me ne no ayiyie
ɔno na sɛ metene mpo a meremmua no mɛkoto no sɛ me temmufoɔ
sɛ mefrɛ na ɔgye me so a merennye menni sɛ wayɛ aso ama me nne
ɔno a ɔde ahum posa me na ɔma m akuro dɔɔso kwa no
ɔmmma mennya ahomegyeɛ na ɔde awerɛhoɔ hyɛ me ma tɔ
sɛ wɔdi no ɔhoɔdenfoɔ tumi so a anka ɔnnie na sɛ atemmuo nso a anka hwan na ɔbɛsane no
sɛ metene mpo a anka m ano bɛbu me fɔ na medi mu mpo a ɔbɛma makyea
me deɛ medi mu deɛ nanso memmu me ho me nkwa afono me
ne nyinaa yɛ bafua enti na mese deɛ ɔdi mu ne ɔbɔnefoɔ nyinaa na ɔsɛe wɔn
sɛ atoyerɛnkyɛm kum obi mpofirim a ɔseresere wɔn a wɔdi bem amaneɛ
wɔde asase ahyɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ nsa ɔkata n atemmufoɔ ani sɛ ɛnyɛ ɔno a na ɛyɛ hwan a
na me nna ho yɛ hare sene mmirikatuni ɛdwane kɔ ɛnhunu adepa biara
ɛsene kɔ sɛ demmire nkyɛkyerɛ hyɛn sɛ ɔkɔdeɛ a ɔsi aduane soɔ
sɛ mese me werɛ bɛfiri m apinisie mɛgyae mosooyɛ na mate m anim a
me yea nyinaa yɛ me hu ɛfiri sɛ mehunu sɛ woremmu me bem
na sɛ wɔbɛbu me fɔ a adɛn nti na memmrɛ nguo
sɛ medware sukyerɛmma nsuo na mede dɔw mehohoro me nsa a
ɛno nso wode me bɛto amena mu na me ho ayɛ me ntadeɛ mpo nwunu
na ɔnyɛ onipa sɛ me na mabua no na yɛn baanu ahyiam abɔ nkuro
nso ntamgyinafoɔ bi nni yɛn ntam a ɔde ne nsa bɛto yɛn baanu soɔ
ma no nyi n abaa mfiri me so na ne ho hu ankuta me
ɛnna anka mɛkasa a merensuro no nanso mentumi nyɛ saa wɔ me ara m afam
me nkwa yɛ me kra nwunu mɛgyaa m apinisie mu wɔ me mu mɛkasa m awerɛhoɔ mu
mɛse onyankopɔn sɛ mmu me fɔ ma menhunu adekodeɛ a enti wo ne me ham yi
ɛyɛ ma wo sɛ wohyɛ obi soɔ anaa sɛ wopo wo nsa ano adwuma na wopene abɔnefoɔ agyina soɔ
wowɔ honam aniwa anaasɛ wohunu adeɛ sɛ ɔdasani hu no
wo nna te sɛ ɔdasani nna anaa wo mfeɛ te sɛ onipa nna anaa
sɛ wohwehwɛ me mfomsoɔ akyiri kwan na wodi me bɔne akyire
nanso wonim sɛ menyɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ na obi nni hɔ a ɔbɛgye wo nsam
wo nsa na ɛnwonoo me na ɛyɛɛ me me nipa mu nyinaa prɛko ɛnna woamene me yi
kae sɛ wonwonoo me sɛ anwommoɔ na wobɛma madane mfuturo bio anaa
anaa woanhwie me angu sɛ nufosuo na womaa mepii sɛ nufosuo a akyenkyen ɛtoa
wode wedeɛ ne nam na ɛhyɛɛ me na wode nnompe ne ntini wurawuraa me mu
nkwa ne adɔeɛ na wode ayɛ me na wo hwɛ nso wɛn me honhom
na yeinom na wode siee w akomam na mahunu sɛ yei na wowɔ tia me
sɛ meyɛ bɔne a wobɛhwɛ me na woremmu me bem me mfomsoɔ ho
sɛ medi abɔnefosɛm a mennue na sɛ metene nso a meremma me tiri so ɛfiri sɛ ahohora ahyɛ me ma na mehwɛ m amanehunu
na sɛ mema me ho so a wobɛti me sɛ gyata na woasane ne me adi anwanwasɛm
na wode w adansefoɔ afoforɔ ara abɛgyina m anim na woama w abufuo adɔɔso me so na ɛdɔm a ɛto dɔm agu me so
adɛn nti na woyii me firii yafunu mu anka menya megyaa mu na ani biara anhu me ɛ
sɛ menya meyɛɛ sɛ adeɛ a ɛnni hɔ ɛ mefirii yafunu mu no ɛnna anka wɔkɔgyaa me ɛda mu ɛ
me nna nyɛ kakraa bi ma no nnyaa me ɔnyi n ani mfiri me so na me ho nsane me kakra
ansa na makɔ deɛ merensane memma na makɔ sum ne sunsum asase so
esum kabii a ɛte sɛ ɔdasuom tumm asase sunsum ne sakasaka asase a hann te sɛ ɔdasuom tumm no
ɛnna naamani sofar gyee so sɛ
wɔremmua nsɛm dodoɔ yi anaasɛ wɔmma ɔbarima tɛkyerɛmakyene nni bem anaa
wo kasa worɔworɔ bɛma nnipa amua wɔn ano anaa na sɛ wodi fɛw a obi renhyɛ wo aniwuo anaa
na woaka sɛ me nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛ gyenegyene na me ho te wɔ onyankopɔn anim
o anka ma onyankopɔn nkasa na ɔmmue n ano nkyerɛ wo
na ɔnka wo nyansa ahuntasɛm sɛ emu dɔ yie na hunu sɛ onyankopɔn yi n ani firi w amumuyɛ no bi so
wobɛhwehwɛ ahunu onyankopɔn anaasɛ wobɛhunu akɔduru otumfoɔ pɛyɛ mu anaa
ɛkorɔn sɛ ɔsoro ɛdeɛn na wobɛyɛ ɛyɛ kuronkuron sɛ asamando ɛdeɛn na wonim
ne nsusuiɛ ware sene asase na ɛtrɛ sene ɛpo
sɛ ɔtwam ba na ɔde nnipa gu nnua mu na ɔhyia asennie a ɛnneɛ hwan na ɔbɛsianka no
na ɔno na ɔnim nnipa ahuhufoɔ na ɔhunu abusudeɛ nanso ɔmmu
na onipa tibɔnkɔso nya nyansa akoma a na ɛte sɛdeɛ wɔawo afunumu ba onipa
sɛ wo deɛ wosiesie w akoma na wotrɛ wo nsam kyerɛ no a
sɛ amumuyɛ wɔ wo nsam a yi kɔ akyiri na mma abusudeɛ nntena wo ntomadan mu
ɛno na wobɛma w ani so a wonni dɛm na wobɛtim pintinn a worensuro
na wo werɛ bɛfiri wo haw wobɛkae no sɛ nsuo a asene
na wo nkwa nna bɛyɛ sɛ awia ketee esum bɛdane sɛ adekyeeɛ
na wobɛnya abotɔyam sɛ anidasoɔ wɔ hɔ na wobɛhwɛ wo ho ahyia na woada dwoodwoo
wobɛda ahome na obi renyi wo hu na nnipa bebree bɛhwehwɛ wo hɔ adom
na abɔnefoɔ deɛ wɔn ani so bɛsi na dwanekɔbea abɔ wɔn na wɔn anidasoɔ bɛdane wɔn wuo
na hiob gyee so sɛ
yoo mone ɔman no nne na mowu a nyansa bɛwu
me nso mewɔ nteaseɛ sɛ mo ara me deɛ mentɔ mu mo anim na hwan na ɔnnim nnoɔma a ɛte sɛɛ yi
deɛ ne yɔnko sere no ne me deɛ ɔsu frɛɛ onyankopɔn na ɔgyee no soɔ wɔsere ɔteneneeni a ɔdi mu no
deɛ ɔte hɔ dwoodwoo no tirim deɛ animtiabuo na ɛfata amanehunu ɛne deɛ wasiesie ama wɔn a wɔn nan watirie
amimfoɔ ntomadan si hɔ dwoodwoo na wɔn a wɔhuru nyankopɔn boɔ te hɔ komm wɔn a wɔkura wɔn nyame wɔ wɔn nsam no
na yei deɛ bisa mmoa ɛ na wɔnkyerɛ wo ne ɔsoro nnomaa nso na wɔnka nkyerɛ wo
anaasɛ bisa asase hwɛ na ɛnkyerɛ wo na ɛpo mu mpataa nka nkyerɛ wo
hwan na ɔrenhunu yei nyinaa mu sɛ awurade nsa na ɛyɛɛ yeinom
ne nsam na ɔteasefoɔ biara kra wɔ ne adasamma nyinaa ahonhom
ɛnyɛ aso na ɛsɔ nsɛm hwɛ na dodom nso ka aduane hwɛ
nkɔkoraayɛ mu na nyansa wɔ na onyinkyerɛ ma nhunumu
ɔno nkyɛn na nyansa ne mmaninneɛ wɔ ɔno na afotuo ne nhunumu wɔ no
hwɛ ɔdwiri na wɔrento ɔto onipa mu na wɔremmue
hwɛ ɔsianka nsuo ma no we nanso ɔgyaa mu ma no butu asase
ɔno nkyɛn na ahoɔden ne nyansa wɔ deɛ wɔdaadaa no ne ɔdaadaafoɔ nyinaa yɛ ne dea
ɔpa apamfoɔ ho de wɔn kɔ na ɔma atemmufoɔ dane nkwaseafoɔ
ɔsane ahemfo nkyehoma na ɔde nhoma kyekyere wɔn asene
ɔpa asɔfoɔ ho de wɔn kɔ na ɔde wɔn a wɔatim no hwe fam
ɔma anotefoɔ gyae kasa na ɔgye mpanimfoɔ nimdeɛ
ɔde animtiabuo gu mmapɔmma so na ɔhodwo nnɔmmarima abɔsoɔ mu
ɔyi adeɛ kuronkuron adi firi sum mu na ɔde sum kabii firi ba hann mu
ɔma aman dɔɔso na ɔsɛe wɔn ɔtrɛ amanaman mu na ɔtu wɔn kɔ
ɔgye asase so aman mu atitire akoma na ɔma wɔkyini asasesofoɔ a ɔkwan nni hɔ so
wɔkeka sum a hann nni hɔ mu na ɔma wɔkyini sɛ nsaboni
hwɛ m ani ahunu ne nyinaa m aso nso ate na ate aseɛ
deɛ monim no me nso menim mentɔ mu wɔ mo mu
me deɛ mepɛ sɛ anka me ne otumfoɔ no mmom bɛkasa na mehwehwɛ sɛ me ne onyankopɔn bɛyiyi nsɛm ano
na mo deɛ moyɛ atorofoɔ mapa ayaresafoɔ ahuhufoɔ ne mo nyinaa
sɛ momua mo ano mmom koraa a anka ɛyɛ mo nyansa
montie me nkurobɔ na monyɛ aso mma m anoyie
mobɛka deɛ ɛntene ama onyankopɔn na mode nnaadaa aka ama no anaa
mobɛgye ne ti anaasɛ mobɛham ama onyankopɔn
ɔhwehwɛ mo mu a ɛbɛsi yie anaasɛ mobɛdaadaa no sɛdeɛ wɔdaadaa ɔdasani
sɛ mohwɛ nnipa anim kokoa mu a ɔbɛka mo anim ampa
ne kɛseyɛ rentu mo akoma na ne ho hu mma mo so
mo kasammebuo yɛ nso mmebusɛm mo anoyie yɛ dɔteɛ anoyie
mommua mo ano mfiri me so na me ara menkasa na deɛ ɛbɛba me soɔ mmra
adɛn nti na memfa me honam mentua me se ano na memfa me kra mento me nsam
sɛ ɔreku me mpo a mehwɛ ɔno ara mede me nsɛm bɛto n anim
yei ara nso na ɛbɛyɛ me nkwagyeɛ ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ remma n anim
montie montie deɛ mewɔ meka na m asɛm nkyerɛaseɛ nhyɛne mo aso mu
hwɛ masiesie m asɛm mato hɔ menim sɛ me na mɛdi bem
hwan ne deɛ ɔne me bɛham ɛnneɛ anka mɛyɛ komm na magyaa mu
ao awurade sɛ woreyɛ adeɛ mmienu yi pɛ ama me a ɛno na meremfa me ho menhunta mfiri w anim
yi wo nsa firi me so kɔ akyirikyiri na mma wo ho hu nnkuta me
ɛno na frɛ me na me nso mɛgye so anaasɛ mɛkasa na woabua me
me bɔne ne me mfomsoɔ yɛ ahe ara ma menhunu me mmarato ne me bɔne
adɛn nti na wode w ani hunta na wobu me wo tamfo
wobɛyi ahahan a mframa de rekorɔ ahi na wobɛti nkraadua a adwan
na wotwerɛɛ me ho nsɛm yaya na woma medi me mmeranteberɛ mu bɔne so adeɛ
wode me nan hyehyɛ ɛpa mu na wowɛn m akwan nyinaa wotwa m anammɔn ho hyeɛ
na onipa deɛ ɔporɔ sɛ dufɔkyeɛ sɛ ntoma a nweweboaa redie
onipa a ɔbaa awo no ne nna yɛ tiaa bi na ɔhaw ma
ɔpue sɛ nhwiren na wɔtwa ɔdwane sɛ sunsum na ɔnnyina
na yei so na woabue w ani na wode me rekɔ atemmuo mu w anim
hwan na ɔbɛnya ɔhoteni wɔn a wɔn ho akum no mu obiara nni hɔ
sɛ wɔahyɛ me nna ato hɔ na n abosome dodoɔ wɔ wo tirim na woatwa hyeɛ a ɔrensiane ho ama no a
ɛnneɛ yi w ani firi ne so na ɔnhome nkɔsi sɛ ɔbɛwie ne da sɛ ɔpaani
na dua mpo anidasoɔ wɔ hɔ ma no sɛ wɔtwa a ɛbɛfefɛ na ne nnubaa remmɔ no
sɛ ne nhini kyenkyen ɛfam na ne dunsini wu dɔteɛ mu a
nsuo hwa nti ɛfefɛ na ɛyiyi mman sɛ dua a wɔatɛ
na ɔdasani deɛ ɔwu na ɔbea hɔ na onipa gyaa mu na ɔwɔ he
na sɛdeɛ nsuo firi ɔtadeɛ mu na ɛdɔ mpumpunadeɛ na asuo nso mem na ɛweɛ no
saa ara na onipa kɔda hɔ na ɔnsɔreɛ ɔsoro nnya ntwaa mu yi wɔrennyane na wɔrempusu wɔn mfiri wɔn nna mu
o sɛ wode me resie asamando ɛ sɛ wode me rehunta akɔsi sɛ w abufuo bɛsane akorɔ ɛ sɛ wohyɛ me da na wokae me ɛ
sɛ onipa wu a ɔbɛtena ase bio anaa anka m akodie nna nyinaa mɛtwɛn akɔsi sɛ me nsakyera bɛba
anka wobɛfrɛ na me nso magye wo so anka w ani bɛgyina wo nsa ano adwuma no
nanso afei deɛ wokan m anammɔn na wonyi w ani mfiri me bɔne so
wɔasɔ me mmarato ano de ahyɛ kotokuo mu na woakyekyere me bɔne ano
ampa ara bepɔ mpo hwe ase yera na ɔbotan nso twe firi n afa
na sɛdeɛ aboɔ nso nsuo hono no na ne yire pra fam dɔteɛ kɔ saa ara na ɔdasani anidasoɔ nso woma no yera
wotintim ne so ma no twam kɔ wosakyera n anim na wosum no kɔ
ne mma nya animuonyam mpo a ɔnnim wɔbrɛ wɔn ase nso a ɔnhunu mma wɔn
ɔno ara ne honam yea nko na ɔteɛ na ne kra di ɔno ara ne ho abooboo
ɛnna temanni elifas buaa sɛ
onyansafoɔ de nimdeɛ huuhuu bɛbua na ɔde apueeɛ mframa ahyɛ n afuru ma anaa
ɔde nsɛm a ɛmfra bɛyi atɛn ne nsɛnkeka a mfasoɔ nni mu anaa
nso woto nyamesuro twene na wosi nyankopɔn anim nsusuiɛ ho kwan
na w ano nsɛm kyerɛ wo bɔne na woafa aniteɛ tɛkyerɛma
wo ara w ano na ɛbu wo fɔ na ɛnyɛ me aane wo ara ankasa w ano na ɛdi adanseɛ tia woɔ
wone deɛ ɔdi kan a wɔwoo no onipa na wɔnyinsɛn wo ansa na wɔreyɛ nkokoɔ
wokɔtiee nyankopɔn agyinatuo na woasi nyansa ano afa
ɛdeɛn na wonim a yɛnnim na wohunu mu a ɛnni yɛn nkyɛn
hwɛ wafu dwono ne akɔkoraa wɔ yɛn mu deɛ ɔsene w agya panin mpo
nyankopɔn awerɛkyekyerɛ ne n asɛm a wɔne woka no brɛɛ no sua w ani so anaa
adɛn na w akoma twe wo korɔ na adɛn na w ani pa anyinam
na wodane wo honhom tia onyankopɔn na woma nsɛnkeka firi w anomu
hwan ne ɔdasani a ne ho bɛteɛ ne deɛ ɔbaa awo no a ɔtene
hwɛ n akronkronfoɔ so mpo ɔmfa ne ho nto na ɔsoro ho nso nte n ani so
na nkantom deɛ ne ho yɛ nwunu na waporɔ onipa a ɔnom amumuyɛ sɛ nsuo
mɛkyerɛ wo na tie me na deɛ mahunu yi mɛka akyerɛ wo
deɛ anyansafoɔ aka akyerɛ na wɔansi so firi wɔn agyanom berɛ soɔ
wɔn nko na wɔde asase no maa wɔn na ɔhɔhoɔ biara antwam wɔn mu
ɔbɔnefoɔ ho yera no ne nna nyinaa na wɔde mfeɛ a wɔakan asie otirimuɔdenfoɔ
ehu nkateɛ gyegye n aso mu asomdwoeɛ mpo mu na ɔsɛefoɔ ba ne soɔ
ɔnnye nni sɛ ɔbɛsane afiri sum mu na wɔayi no ama afena
ɔkyini hwehwɛ aduane ka sɛ ɛhe na ɛwɔ ɔnim sɛ esum da abɛn no
ahohiahia ne ahokyere yi no hu ɛtintim no sɛ ɔhene a wasiesie ne ho ama ɔko a ɛyɛ hu
ɛfiri sɛ watene ne nsa atia onyankopɔn na wate otumfoɔ so atua
ɔde kɔn a asene ato aba ne so ne n akyɛm akyi apɔapɔ a emu yɛ duro no
ɛfiri sɛ wama ne sradeɛ akata n anim na wama ne mfe mu adɔre sradeɛ
na wakɔtena nkuro a aguo so afie a obi nte mu na wɔahyɛ sɛ ɛnyɛ afituo mu
ɔrennya ne ho na n adedodoɔ nso rennyina na ne nnɔbaeɛ renkonkom mma fam
ɔremfiri sum mu mfi ogyaframa bɛma ne nnuaban adwan na n anomu mframa bɛpra ne nhyerɛne akɔ
mma no mmfa ne ho nnto ahuhudeɛ so nnnaadaa ne ho na ahuhudeɛ ara na ɛbɛyɛ n akatua
ne da nnya nnuruiɛ no na akatua no bɛba na ne duban renyɛ frɔmfrɔm
ɔbɛpore n asia abunu sɛ obobe deɛ na wawoso ne nhyerɛne agu sɛ ngodua deɛ
na abɔnefoɔ fekuo bɛyɛ abonini na ogya bɛhye adanmudegyeɛ ntomadan
wɔnyinsɛn ɔhaw na wɔwo mmusuo na wɔn yafunu siesie nnaadaa
na hiob gyee so sɛ
mate saa nsɛm a ɛte sɛɛ bebree mo nyinaa moyɛ gyamserefoɔ
nsɛnhuuhuu yi awieeɛ nie anaasɛ ɛdeɛn na ɛhwanyan wo ma wobua
sɛ mowɔ me tebea mu a anka me nso mɛkasa sɛ mo anka mɛhɔre nsɛm magu mo so na mawoso me ti magu mo so
aane anka mede m ano bɛhyɛ mo den na m anomu duema ama mo yea aboto
sɛ mekasa a me yea no mmoto na sɛ megyae nso a ɛdeɛn na ɛfiri me ho korɔ
na afei deɛ onyankopɔn ahodwo me woama me ho nnipa nyinaa agu
woapompono me ama no adane adanseɛ na me fɔn asɔre atia me atoto m ano wɔ m anim
wasunsuane me n abufuo mu na ɔtaa me ɔtwɛre ne se gu me so m ahohiahiafoɔ no pɔkyere n ani hwɛ me
wɔhaahaa wɔn anomu tia me wɔde ahohorabɔ bobɔ m aso mu wɔn nyinaa boaboa wɔn ano tia me
onyankopɔn ayi me ahyɛ abusufoɔ nsa na wasum me ato abɔnefoɔ nsam
anka medi yie na ɔbubuu me ɔsɔɔ me kɔn na ɔbubuu me pasaa na ɔde me sii hɔ yɛɛ ne botaeɛ
n agyan dii me so ntwaguo ɔpaee me sawa mu na wannodo ho ɔhwiee me bɔnwoma guu fam
ɔbubuu me mprɛ bebree ɔto baa me so sɛ ɔdɔmmanin
mepam ayitoma mekataa me wedeɛ so na mede m ahoɔden too mfuturo mu
esu nti m ani abere kɔkɔkɔkɔ na owuo sunsum da m anisuatɛtɛ so
nanso amim biara nni me nsam na me mpaebɔ ho te
o asase nkata me mogya so na mma me sufrɛ nnnya homebea
seesei mpo hwɛ ɔsoro na me danseni wɔ na me dimafoɔ wɔ deɛ ɛkorɔn
me nnamfo mpo di me ho fɛw nanso onyankopɔn na m ani porepore nisuo ma no
sɛ ɔnni mma onipa wɔ nyankopɔn anim sɛdeɛ onipa ba di ma ne yɔnko no
na mfeɛ a ɛwɔ ano no bɛdu na makɔ kwan a merensane memma
m ahome asa me nna ahi damena na ɛwɔ hɔ ma me
ampa ara ahiyifoɔ na wɔne me wɔ hɔ na m ani tua wɔn ntɔkwapɛ
si awowa ɛ di me agyinamu wo ara w anim hwan na ɔbɛgyina m akyire
na wode nimdeɛ ahunta wɔn akoma enti woremma wɔn so
deɛ ɔpa ne nnamfo de nya kyɛfa bie no ne mma bɛhwere saa kyɛfa no
na ɔde me ayɛ aman akasabebuo na wɔahinam m ani so ntasuo
m awerɛhoɔ nti m ani so asi na me ho ade nyinaa ayɛ sɛ sunsum
teefoɔ ho dwiri wɔn yei ho na deɛ ɔdi bem no bo huru ɔkɔnkɔnsani
nanso ɔteneneeni bɛkura ne kwan mu na deɛ ne nsa ho teɛ no bɛkɔ so anya ahoɔden
na mo nyinaa monsane mmra ɛ nanso merenhunu mo mu nyansafoɔ biara
me nna atwam wɔatwitwa m atirimpɔ mu m akoma adeɛ a ɛpɛ no mu
wɔde anadwo yɛ awia wɔse hann bɛn deɛ esum wɔ
sɛ mede asamando yɛ me fie na meto me mpa esum mu
na mese amena sɛ m agya ne wo ne mmoaa sɛ me na ne me nuabaa ne mo a
na afei ɛhe na m anidasoɔ wɔ na deɛ m ani da soɔ no hwan na ɔbɛhunu
ɛbɛsiane akɔ asamando adaban mu berɛ a yɛn nyinaa home wɔ mfuturo mu
ɛnna suhini bildad buaa sɛ
mobɛkɔ nsɛnkeka so akɔsi da bɛn monnwene ho na ɛno akyiri no yɛakasa
adɛn na wɔbu yɛn sɛ anantwie na yɛyɛ mo ani so sɛ tibɔnkɔso anaa
wo a wotete wo ho w abufuo mu wo nti na wɔbɛgya asase na wɔatu ɔbotan afiri ne sibea anaa
nanso ɔbɔnefoɔ kanea bɛdum na ne gyaframa renhyerɛn
hann bɛduru sum ne ntomadan mu na ne kanea adum wɔ ne so
n ahoɔden anammɔn ano bɛmoa na n agyinatuo ahwe no ase
na ɔno ara ne nan bɛka no ato atena mu na wanante mfidie so
nsɛmma bɛsɔ ne nantin na nkyehoma akyekyere no
wɔde kantankoraa bɛhunta fam ama no na wɔasum no fidie ɔkwan so
ehu bɛkuta no mmaa nyinaa ahyia na ati no n anammɔn mu
ɛkɔm bɛsɛe n ahoɔden na mmusuo rebɛma no asunti
ɛbɛdi ne honam akwaa aane owuo abakan bɛdi n akwaa
wɔbɛtu n anidasoɔ afiri ne ntomadan mu na wɔde no akɔ ahudeɛ mu hene no nkyɛn
deɛ ɛnyɛ ne dea bɛtena ne ntomadan mu wɔbɛbɔ sɔfe apete ne tenabea
ne nhini bɛwuwu wɔ aseɛ na ne mman adwinnwan wɔ soro
ne nkaeɛ bɛsɛe afiri asase so na ɔrennya din asase ani
wɔbɛsum no afiri hann mu akɔ sum mu na wɔapam no afiri wiase
ɔrennya mma anaa mmanana ne man mu n aseni biara renka n atenaeɛ
ne da bɛyɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ atɔeɛ ahodwiri sɛdeɛ ehu kutaa wɔn a wɔwɔ apueeɛ no
ampa ara sɛdeɛ amumuyɛfoɔ tenabea teɛ ne no ne deɛ ɔnnim onyankopɔn no nso kyɛfa nie
na hiob gyee so sɛ
mobɛha me kra akɔsi da bɛn na mode nsɛm abubu me pasaa
mprɛdu nie a moasopa me mo ani nwu mpo sɛ moho me werɛ
na mpo sɛ ampa sɛ mafom a me so na mfomsoɔ no da
sɛ ampa sɛ moma mo ho so tia me na moyi me m ahohora ho atɛn a
ɛnneɛ monhunu sɛ onyankopɔn na wakyea me kwan ama me na ɔde n asau atwa me ho ahyia
hwɛ ayayadeɛ nti meteam nso wɔnnye me so mesu mefrɛ mmoa nanso ɔgyeɛ biara mma
ɔde ban atwa me kwan mu na mentumi mensene na me kwan so aduru sum
wayi m animuonyam afiri me so na wahotiri me tiri so abotire
wabubu me afa nyinaa a menni hɔ bio na watu m anidasoɔ ase sɛ dua
wama n abufuo afram me so na ɔbu me sɛ n atamfo mu baako
n asafo ahodoɔ bɔɔ mu bae na wɔbɔɔ wɔn akwan wɔ me so na wɔkyeree nsraban twaa me ntomadan ho hyiae
wayi me nuanom afiri me ho kɔ akyirikyiri na wɔn a wɔni me adanedane me ahɔhoɔ koraa
m abusuafoɔ atwe wɔn ho kɔ na wɔn a meni wɔn werɛ afiri me
wɔn a wɔbɛtena me fie ne me mmaawa bu me sɛ ɔhɔhoɔ madane wɔn ani so ɔnanani
mefrɛ m akoa na ɔmmua me mede m ano mepa no kyɛw mpo
me yere mpo kyiri me home na me yafumma mpo mpɛ m ahomeguo
ntɔtɔfefewa mpo bu me animtia mese meresɔre a wɔkasa tia me
me ho yɛ me nnamfo pa nyinaa nwunu na m adɔfo adane wɔn ani atia me
me nnompe femfam me wedeɛ ne me nam ho na me se ho wedeɛ nko na mede afiri mu afire
monhu me mmɔbɔ monhu me mmɔbɔ me yɔnkonom na nyankopɔn nsa aka me
adɛn nti na moti me sɛ onyankopɔn na me nam nso mmee mo
o sɛ anka wɔretwerɛ me nsɛm ɛ sɛ wɔde rehyɛ nwoma mu ɛ
sɛ wɔde dadeɛ adetwerɛdeɛ ne sumpii rekurukyire ɔbotan mu na atena hɔ daa ɛ
na me deɛ menim sɛ me gyefoɔ te ase na awieeɛ no ɔbɛdi m asɛm ama me wɔ asase so
na wɔasɛe me wedeɛ seyie akyiri no na mɛfiri me honam mu afi ahunu onyankopɔn
ɔno na me ara mɛhwɛ no mafa na m aniwa bɛhunu na ɛnyɛ ɔhɔhoɔ bi me sawa resa wɔ me mu
sɛ mose sɛdeɛ yɛbɛsi apamo no afa ne yɛahunu asɛm no ase wɔ ne hɔ a
monsuro afena ɛfiri sɛ abufuhyeɛ de afena asotwe ba na moahunu sɛ atemmuo wɔ hɔ
ɛnna naamani sofar buaa sɛ
me ho pere me nti m adwene yɛ me sɛ memmua
mate atenetene a asopa me nanso honhom firi me nhunumu mu bua me
wonnim yei a ɛfiri tete ɛfirii sɛ wɔde nnipa sii asase soɔ no
sɛ abɔnefoɔ ahurisidie nkyɛ na nyaatwomfoɔ anigyeɛ yɛ berɛ tiaa bi
sɛ ne kɛseyɛ korɔn kɔpem ɔsoro na ne tiri kɔka mununkum a
ɔbɛyera koraa sɛ ne sɛbeɛ wɔn a wɔhu no no bɛbisa sɛ ɔwɔ he
ɔbɛtu akɔ sɛ daeɛ na wɔrenhu no na wɔbɛpamo no akɔ sɛ anadwo adehunu
aniwa a ahu no renhu no bio na ne tenabea renhu no bio
ne mma bɛpata mmɔborɔfoɔ na ne nsa adane n ahodeɛ ama
ne mmeranteberɛ mu ahoɔden hyɛɛ ne nnompe mama na afei ɛne no abɛda dɔteɛ mu
sɛ adebɔne yɛɛ n anomu fremfrem na ɔde siee ne tɛkyerɛma ase
na ɔdii adɔna na wannyaa mu na ɔmaa no kaa ne dodom a
afei deɛ n aduane asakyera ne nsono mu nhuritia borɔ wɔ ne yam
wamene adedodoɔ na ɔbɛfe bio onyankopɔn bɛtu afiri ne yam
ɔbɛfefe ahuritia borɔ na ɔprammire tɛkyerɛma bɛku no
n ani rennye nsuwansuwa ho ɛwoɔ ne nufosuo ani sradeɛ asuasu nsubɔntene ho
ɔbɛdane deɛ wabrɛ ho ama na ɔremmene n adeɛ a wanya no ɔrenni ho ahurisie sɛdeɛ ne dodoɔ teɛ no
ɛfiri sɛ wapɛkyɛ mmɔborɔfoɔ apo wɔn na wafa efie a ɛnyɛ ɔno na ɔsiiɛ
ɛnam sɛ ne yafunu ammee da nti ɔrenkora deɛ n ani gye ho no biara
wannidi annya bi da enti n ahonyadeɛ rentena hɔ
n adedodoɔ mayɛ mu ne ho bɛhiahia no amanehunufoɔ nyinaa nsa bɛba ne so
ɔbɛma n abufuhyeɛ aba ne so ama no de ahyɛ n afuru ma na ɔbɛma no atɔ agu ne so de ayɛ n aduane
ɔdwane firi dadeɛ akodeɛ ano a kɔbere mfrafraeɛ agyan bɛwɔ no ahwire ne mu
ɔtu firi ne honam mu na agyan no firi ne bɔnwoma mu a owuo ho hu bɛtɔ ne so
wɔde sum nyinaa asie n akoradeɛ ogya a obi mfite mu bɛhye no ɛbɛhye deɛ aka ne ntomadan mu
ɔsoro bɛyi n amumuyɛ adi na asase bɛsɔre atia no
wɔbɛsoa ne fie ahonyadeɛ akɔ wɔbɛtwe akɔ n abufuo da no
yei ne onipa ɔbɔnefoɔ kyɛfa a ɛfiri nyankopɔn nkyɛn ne n agyapadeɛ a onyankopɔn ahyɛ ama no no
na hiob gyee so sɛ
tie na montie me kasa na yei nyɛ mo awerɛkyekyerɛ
monnyaa me mma me nso menkasa na mekasa mewie a afei moadi fɛw
me deɛ onipa na medi abooboo mekyerɛ no anaa na adɛn nti na me home rente me
monnane mo ani nhwɛ me na mo ho nnwiri mo na momfa mo nsa ntuatua mo ano
sɛ mekae a mebɔ binim na nketenkete kuta me honam
adɛn nti na abɔnefoɔ nya nkwa wɔnyini kyɛ na wɔyɛ ahoɔdenfoɔ akɛseɛ nso
wɔn mma si wɔn anim pintinn ka wɔn ho aane mekyerɛ wɔn asefoɔ
wɔn afie mu dwo ehu biara nni mu na nyankopɔn ntea bi nni wɔn so
ne nantwinini wo na ɔnyɛ krawa ne nantwibereɛ yɛ awoyie na ɔmpɔn
wɔyi wɔn ntɔtɔfefewa adi sɛ nnwankuo na wɔn mmotafowa nso hurihuri
wɔn nne di atweneka ne sankubɔ mu na wɔn ani gye abɛnhyɛne ho
wɔhwere wɔn nna nnepa mu na wɔsiane kɔ asamando ntɛm so
nanso wɔka kyerɛɛ onyankopɔn sɛ firi yɛn so na yɛnhwehwɛ w akwan ho nimdeɛ
ɛdeɛn ne otumfoɔ no a yɛnsom no na sɛ yɛbɔ no mpaeɛ a mfasoɔ bɛn na yɛbɛnya
nanso hwɛ ɛnyɛ wɔn ara wɔn nsam na wɔn nnepa wɔ abɔnefoɔ agyinatuo mpare me
mprɛ ahe na abɔnefoɔ kanea dum na wɔn mmusuo nso ka wɔn na onyankopɔn kyekyɛ awerɛhoɔ n abufuo mu
wɔte sɛ nkyɛnkyɛmma mframa ano ne ntɛtɛ a ahum soa korɔ
moka sɛ onyankopɔn kora n amumuyɛ adeɛ ma ne mma ma no ntua ɔno ara ne ka na ɔnhunu
ma n ani nhunu ne mmusuo na ɔnnom otumfoɔ no abufuhyeɛ no bi
na efie a ɔgya no n akyire no mfa ne ho hwee bio berɛ a n abosome dodoɔ to atwa no
obi bɛkyerɛ onyankopɔn nhunumu anaa ɔno a ɔbu ɔsorofoɔ no atɛn no
obi wɔ ahoɔden pintinn nanso ɔwu berɛ a ne ho tɔ no na n aso mu dwo no
nufosuo ahyɛ ne nhina amaama na ne nnompe mu hon yɛ sɔɔsɔɔ
na ɔfoforɔ nso de ne kra awerɛhoɔ wu a wanni nnepa no bie
faako ara dɔteɛ mu na wɔdeda na mmoaa kata wɔn so
hwɛ menim mo adwene ne adwemmɔne a mowɔ no me ho no
sɛ moka sɛ ɛhe na bakoma no fie wɔ na ɛhe na ntomadan a abɔnefoɔ tenaa mu no wɔ
mommisaa wɔn a wɔfa ɔkwan no soɔ na wɔn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ nso monkarii
na wɔakora onipa bɔne de kɔsi sɛeɛ da wɔde wɔn kɔ aweretɔ da
hwan na ɔbɛka n anim n abrabɔ ho na deɛ wayɛ no hwan na ɔbɛtua no ɛso ka
na ɔno deɛ wɔkɔgya no damena mu na wɔwɛn ne damena so ara
bonhwa mu dɔtetoa yɛ no dɛ na nnipa nyinaa twe wɔn ho di n akyi na n anim nso wɔnnim wɔn dodoɔ
na adɛn na mokyekyere me werɛ kwa na mo mmuaeɛ yɛ nkontompo ara yi
ɛnna temanni elifas buaa sɛ
ɔdasani bi bɛtumi adi mu wɔ onyankopɔn anim anaa hwɛ onimdefoɔ mpo ɔdi mu wɔ n ankasa n ani so
otumfoɔ nya ho biribi sɛ wotene anaasɛ ɔnya mfasoɔ sɛ w akwan di mu
wo suro nti na ɔbɛka w anim na ɔde wo akɔ atemmuo mu anaa
ɛnyɛ sɛ wo bɔne dɔɔso na w amumuyɛ nni awieeɛ
sɛ woagye wo nuanom awowa ɔkwa na woapa adagyafoɔ ho ntoma
woamma opititɔfoɔ nsuo annom na woakame deɛ ɔdi kɔm aduane
na onipa a ne basa mu yɛ den no ɔno na asase wɔ no na deɛ ɔwɔ animuonyam no na ɔtena soɔ
woama mmaa akunafoɔ de nsapan kɔ na nwisiaa abasa nso wɔabubu
enti na afidie atwa wo ho ahyia na nketenkete yi wo hu mpofirim
anaasɛ wonhunu sum ne nsuo pii a akata wo soɔ
ɛnyɛ ɔsoro korɔn mu na onyankopɔn wɔ na hwɛ nsoromma a ɛwɔ sorosoro no sɛdeɛ ɛkorɔn fa
na woka sɛ ɛdeɛn na onyankopɔn nim esum kabii akyiri nohoa na ɔbɛbu atɛn
mununkum yɛ no nkataho na ɔnhunu adeɛ na ɔsoro kɔntɔnkrɔn so na ɔnanteɛ
wobɛfa tete tempɔn no a mma busufoɔ nantee soɔ no so anaa
wɔn a wɔpraa wɔn kɔeɛ ansa na ɛberɛ reduro na wɔn nnyinasoɔ sene kɔɔ sɛ asuo no
wɔn na wɔka kyerɛɛ onyankopɔn sɛ firi yɛn so na ɛdeɛn nso na otumfoɔ bɛyɛ wɔn
nanso ɔde nnepa hyehyɛɛ wɔn afie amaama na abɔnefoɔ agyinatuo mpare me
ateneneefoɔ hunu na wɔn ani gye na deɛ ɔdi bem no di wɔn ho fɛw
ka sɛ ampa ara wɔn a wɔsɔre tiaa yɛn no ayera na wɔn nnikaeɛ no ogya ahye
fa wo ho bɔ nyankopɔn ho ɛ na wo ho nnwo wo yei mu na adepa bɛba ama woɔ
gye n anomu mmara na fa ne nsɛm sie w akomam
sɛ wosane kɔ otumfoɔ nkyɛn a wɔde wo bɛsi hɔ sɛ woyi wo ntomadan mu abusudeɛ kɔ akyirikyiri a
fa sika amapa gu mfuturo mu na ofir sika nso fa gu asubɔnten mu mmoseaa mu
na otumfoɔ bɛyɛ wo sika amapa bebree ne dwetɛ a wɔahɔre ama woɔ
ɛno na wo ho bɛsɛpɛ wo otumfoɔ ho na woama w ani so akyerɛ onyankopɔn
wobɛsrɛ no na watie wo na w aboadeɛ ka no woatua
wobɛbɔ wo tirim na ɛbɛgyina ama wo na hann bɛhyerɛn w akwan so
sɛ wɔbrɛ wo ase a ɛno deɛ ahomasoɔ ntira ɛfiri sɛ ɔhobrɛaseni deɛ ɔbɛma no adi yie
sɛ deɛ ɔnnii bem mpo ɔbɛgye no a ɛnneɛ w ahoteɛ so na wɔbɛgye wo
na hiob gyee so sɛ
ɛnnɛ na m abooboodie mu ayɛ den na me pira ayɛ den asene m apinisie
o sɛ anka menya mehunu deɛ mɛhunu no na mekɔduru ne tenaberɛ ɛ
anka mɛsiesie n anim asɛnnie na mɛbisabisa no nsɛm ara yie
anka mɛhunu nsɛm a ɔde bɛbua me na mahunu deɛ ɔbɛka akyerɛ me no mu
tumi dodoɔ na ɔde ne me bɛham anaa dabi aso nko na ɔbɛyɛ ama me
ɛhɔ na ɔteefoɔ ne no bɛyiyi no na mafiri me temmufoɔ nsam korakora
hwɛ mekɔ m anim nso ɔnni hɔ ne m akyi nso menhu no
na ɔyɛ n adeɛ benkum a m ani mmɔ no so ɔmane nifa a menhu no
na ɔnim kwan a mefa soɔ ɔsɔ me hwɛ a mɛfiri mu sɛ sika mapa a wɔde afa ogya mu
n anammɔn mu na me nan tintimiiɛ mahwɛ ne kwan na mammane
n anomu mmara mamfiri ho makora n anomu nsɛm sene deɛ ɛhia me
nso ɔno deɛ ɔnsakyera da na hwan na ɔbɛsane no na deɛ ɔpɛ na ɔyɛ
deɛ wahyɛ ama me na ɔbɛma no aba na adeɛ a ɛte seyie pii na ɛwɔ ne tirim
enti ehu ka me n anim medwene me tirim na me ho popo wɔ ne ho
na onyankopɔn ama m akoma abubu na otumfoɔ ayi me hu
ɛfiri sɛ manyera esum no mu na wankata esum kabii no so m anim
adɛn nti na otumfoɔ nhyɛ berɛ ntua abɔnefoɔ ka na wɔn a wɔni no no nhunu saa berɛ no
ebinom deɛ wɔtwe ɛhyeɛ wɔfom mmoakuo fa yɛne wɔn
wɔka nwisiaa afunumu kɔ wɔgye akunafoɔ nantwie awowa
wɔsum ahiafoɔ firi ɔkwan so asase so amanehunufoɔ bom hunta
hwɛ sɛ anwea pradada so mfunumu firi adie no saa ara na wɔkɔ wɔn dwumadie so kɔpɛ aduane ɛserɛ so na wɔnya aduane ma mmɔfra
mfuo so na wɔtwa mmoa aduane na wɔdi ɔbɔnefoɔ bobe turo mu mpɛpɛ
wɔde adagya na ɛda wɔnni ntoma na wɔnni nkataho awɔ mu
mmepɔ so sutorɔ fɔ wɔn na ɛnam sɛ wɔnni dwanekɔbea nti wɔyɛ ɔbotan atuu
wɔte agyanka firi nufoɔ ano na wɔgye mmɔborɔni hɔ awowa
wɔma wɔnenam adagya a wɔnni ntoma na wɔde ɛkɔm soasoa ayuo afiafi
wɔkyi ngo wɔn afasuo mu wɔtiatia nsa kyi amena so nso wɔdi sukɔm
nkuro mu nso na mmarima apinisie fire na wɔn a wɔapira wɔn akra su frɛ nanso onyankopɔn mfa n ani nkari amumuyɛsɛm no
ebinom ayɛ hann anim atuatefoɔ wɔnhwɛ n akwan na wɔntena n atempɔn mu
nhema na owudini sɔreɛ ɔkum ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani na anadwo ɔyɛ sɛ owifoɔ
na ɔwaresɛefoɔ ani twɛn sum berɛ ɔka sɛ ani biara renhu me na ɔde nkataho kata n anim
esum mu na wɔhwirehwire adan mu wɔto wɔn ho pono mu awia wɔnnim hann
na wɔn nyinaa esum kabii yɛ wɔn sɛ anɔpa ɛfiri sɛ wɔne esum kabii mu ahuyideɛ yɛ nnamfo
ne ho yɛ hare wɔ nsuo ani wɔadome ne kyɛfa asase so ɔnnane n ani nkɔ bobe nturo kwan so
ɔhyeɛ ne ahuhuro na ɛnane sukyerɛmma nsuo saa ara nso na asamando pra wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne kɔ
ɔyafunu a ɛwoo no no werɛ firi no mmoaa fefe no wɔnkae no koraa bio na wɔbɛbubu amumuyɛ sɛ dua
ɔdidii obonini a ɔnwoɔ mpo ho na wanyɛ ɔbaa kunafoɔ yie
nanso onyankopɔn de ne tumi yi atumfoɔ firi hɔ wɔtumi nya asetena pa deɛ nanso wɔnni nkwa ho anidasoɔ biara
ɔma wɔtena hɔ dwoodwoo na wɔde wɔn ho to ɛno so nanso na n ani hwɛ wɔn akwan
wɔduru deɛ ɛkorɔn nso kakraa bi pɛ na wɔnni hɔ wɔgyaa mu na wɔsie wɔn sɛ nnipa nyinaa na wɔtwitwa wɔn sɛ ayuo mmɛtem
sɛ ɛnte saa a hwan na ɔbɛyi me ɔtorofoɔ na wakyerɛ sɛ m asɛm no nni mu
ɛnna suhini bildad buaa sɛ
tumidie ne ehu wɔ onyankopɔn hɔ ɔno na ɔma ɔmannwoeɛ ba wɔ ne sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ
n asafo ano wɔ abuyɛ anaa na hwan na ne hann renhyerɛn ne soɔ
ɔdasani bɛtene nyankopɔn anim sɛn na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na deɛ ɔbaa awo no no ho bɛteɛ
hwɛ ɔsrane mpo ɛmpae hyɛnn wɔ n anim na nsoromma nso ho nte wɔ n ani so
na nkantom ɔdasani nsammaa yi ne onipa ba aboaa yi
na hiob gyee so sɛ
woaboa deɛ ɔnni tumi sɛn ɛdeɛn na woayɛ de agye basa a ɛnni ahoɔden
afotuo bɛn na woatu deɛ ɔnni nyansa na woaka nimdeɛsɛm pa a ɛdɔɔso anaa
hwan na woaka nsɛm akyerɛ no na hwan ahome na afiri wo mu yi
nsamanfoɔ ho popo nsuo ne wɔn a wɔte mu no ase
asamando da adagya n anim na nkatasoɔ biara nni hɔ mma ɔsɛeɛ amena
ɔno na ɔtrɛ ɔsoro a ɛbirie no mu ahunumu na ɔde asase sɛne deɛ biribi nnie
ɔkyekyere nsuo hyɛ mununkum mu na mununkum no mpae wɔ aseɛ
ɔbram n ahennwa anim de ne mununkum katakata ho
ɔtwa nsuo ani hyeɛ de kɔsi deɛ hann ne sum awieeɛ hyia hɔ
ɔsoro nnyinasoɔ hinhim na wɔn ho dwiri wɔn n ateatea ano
ɔde ne tumi nu ɛpo mu na ɔde ne nhunumu brɛ ɛpobɔpɔn ɛpobɔpɔn wɔfrɛ ɛpobɔpɔn yi wɔ hebri kasa mu sɛ rahab ase
ne honhom ano na ɔsoro teɛ ne nsa na ɛhwire ɔwɔ a ne ho yɛ herɛ no mu
hwɛ yeinom ne n akwan ano ano na ɛho asomusɛm bi nko na yɛteɛ na ne mmaninyɛ prannaa a ɛbom no hwan na ɔbɛhunu mu
na hiob kɔɔ so maa n abebusɛm so sɛ
sɛ onyankopɔn a wayi me bem korɔ ne otumfoɔ a ɔhyɛ me kra awerɛhoɔ no te aseɛ yi
na m ahome nyinaa da so wɔ me mu na nyankopɔn ahome da so wɔ me hwene mu yi
ampa ara m ano renka amumuyɛsɛm na me tɛkyerɛma renka nnaadaasɛm
ɛmpare me sɛ mɛbu mo bem meremma wɔnyi me mudie mfiri me ho de bɛkɔ akɔsi sɛ mɛgyaa mu
mɛkura me tenenee mu denden na merennyaa mu m akoma remmu me fɔ me nna biara ho
me tamfo nyɛ sɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ na deɛ ɔma ne ho so tia me no nyɛ sɛ omumuyɛfoɔ
na ɛdeɛn ne ɔbɔnefoɔ anidasoɔ berɛ a wɔtwa ne nkwa soɔ berɛ a onyankopɔn twe ne kra korɔ no
onyankopɔn bɛte ne sufrɛ berɛ a ahohiahia bɛba ne soɔ no anaa
anaasɛ n ani bɛgye otumfoɔ ho ɔbɛfrɛ onyankopɔn berɛ nyinaa mu anaa
mɛkyerɛ mo nyankopɔn nsa ho asɛm deɛ ɛwɔ otumfoɔ hɔ no merensi so
hwɛ mo deɛ mo nyinaa moahunu na adɛn na moda so di ahuhusɛm yi
yei ne onipa ɔbɔnefoɔ kyɛfa a ɔnya no onyankopɔn hɔ ne nhyɛsofoɔ agyapadeɛ a wɔnya no otumfoɔ nsam
sɛ ne mma dɔɔso a wɔdɔɔso ma afena na wɔn a wɔfiri ne mu no aduane remmee wɔn
ne nnipa a wɔbɛka no owuyadeɛ mu na wɔbɛsie wɔn na n akunafoɔ rensu
sɛ ɔboa dwetɛ ano sɛ mfuturo na ɔsiesie ntadeɛ sɛ dɔteɛ a
ɔsiesie deɛ nanso ɔteneneeni na ɔbɛhyɛ na dwetɛ no deɛ ɔdi bem na ɔbɛkyɛ mu
ɔsi ne dan sɛ abubummabaa na ɛte sɛ sese a ɔwɛmfoɔ yɛ
ɔrekɔda na ɔyɛ ɔdefoɔ nso ɔrenna so nyɛ saa bio ɔbɛbue n ani na ɔnni hɔ bio
ahuyideɛ fa no sɛ nsuo anadwo na ahum wia no korɔ
apueeɛ mframa soa no kɔ na ɛhwim no firi ne tenabea
na ɔto gu ne so na ɔnni ne ho adɔna dwane ara na ɔrepɛ adwane afiri ne nsam
wɔbɛbobɔ nsam agu ne so na wɔabɔ ne so hwerɛma de no afiri ne tenabea akɔ
aane dwetɛ wɔ ne nkommena na afa wɔ hɔ ma sika a wɔhorɔ
dadeɛ nso wɔtu no fam na wɔnane aboɔ yɛ kɔbere
onipa ma esum to twa na ɔhwehwɛ kɔduru akyirikyiri pɛ sum kabii ne sunsum mu aboɔ
ɔtu nkoron deɛ obi nteɛ hɔ anammɔn a ɛtwam werɛ firi no ɔsensɛne hɔ ɔdi ahim deɛ ɔdasani biara nnie hɔ
asase wɔ hɔ yi aduane firi mu ba na n ase nso ɔdane ani sɛ ogya
hoaboɔ dabea ne n aboɔ no mu na sikafuturo nso wɔ hɔ
ɛyɛ ɔkwan a ɔkɔdeɛ nnim na akorɔma ani nhunuu da
anworanwora mmoa ntiatiaa soɔ na gyatabire mfaa hɔ
ɔtene ne nsa ka ɔbohemmaa ɔbutu mmepɔ wɔ ne nhini mu
ɔtwitwa aka abotan mu na n ani hwɛ aboɔdenneɛ nyinaa
ɔsisi asuasu kwan na ansosɔ na adeɛ a ahunta no ɔyi ba hann mu
na nyansa deɛ ɛhe na wɔbɛhu no na ɛhe na nhunumu afa wɔ
ɔdasani nnim ne boɔ na wɔnhu no ateasefoɔ asase so
ebunu donkodonko ka sɛ ɛnni me mu na ɛpo ka sɛ ɛnni me hɔ
wɔmfa sika amapa nsi ananmu nnye na wɔnkari dwetɛ ntua ne tiri boɔ
wɔnkari no ofir sika so ntɔ wɔmfa apopobibireboɔ a ne boɔ yɛ den ne hoaboɔ ntɔ
wɔmfa sika ne ahwehwɛ nto ho na wɔmfa sika nnwinneɛ nsesa
wɔmmɔ nhwene panin ne aboɔ a ɛhyerɛn din na nyansa boɔ sene nhwene pa deɛ
etiopia asase so akrateboɔ ne no nsɛ na wɔmfa sika amapa nkyerɛ ne boɔ
ɛnneɛ na ɛhe na nyansa firi ba na ɛhe na nhunumu tenabea wɔ
wɔde ahunta ateasefoɔ nyinaa aniwa wɔakata so ɔsoro nnomaa anim
ɔyera amena ne owuo ka sɛ yɛde yɛn aso ate ne nka
onyankopɔn na ɔhunu ne kwan mu na ɔno na ɔnim ne tenabea
na ɔno na ɔhwɛ asase awieeɛ ɔsoro ase nyinaa nso ɔhunu
ɔhyɛɛ mframa duro too hɔ na ɔhyɛɛ nsuo sɛ ne nsusuiɛ teɛ no
berɛ a ɔhyɛɛ osuo ahyɛdeɛ na ɔyɛɛ ɔkwan maa n aprannaa asraman no
ɛno na ɔhunuiɛ na ɔyii no adie ɔde sii hɔ na ɔpeepee mu
na ɔka kyerɛɛ onipa sɛ hwɛ awurade ho suro ɛno ne nyansa na bɔne ho dwanneɛ ne nhunumu
na hiob kɔɔ so maa n abebusɛm so sɛ
o sɛ anka mereyɛ sɛdeɛ na meteɛ akane abosome no sɛ nna a onyankopɔn hwɛɛ me soɔ no ɛ
berɛ a ne kanea hyerɛn m atifi na mede ne hann menantee sum mu no
sɛdeɛ na meteɛ wɔ me twaberɛ nna mu berɛ a nyankopɔn ayɔnkofa wɔ me ntomadan soɔ no
berɛ a otumfoɔ ne me da so wɔ hɔ na me mmɔfra nso atwa me ho ahyia
berɛ a me nan ho fɔɔ nufosuo mu sradeɛ mu na abotan maa ngo asubɔnten senee me hɔ no
mefiri adi mekɔ kuro pono ano na mede m adwa mesi mpraeɛ so a
mmeranteɛ hu me na wɔhunta na nkɔkoraa sɔre gyinagyina
mmapɔmma gyae kasa na wɔde wɔn nsa butu wɔn ano
mmakoma nne taa dinn na wɔn tɛkyerɛma fam wɔn dodom
na aso te a ɛhyira me na ani hu me a ɛdi me adanseɛ
ɛfiri sɛ na meyi ɔmanehunufoɔ a ɔsu frɛ ɔboafoɔ ne awisiaa a ɔnni boafoɔ
deɛ ɔreyɛ ayera no nhyira ba me so na mema ɔbaa kunafoɔ nya abotɔyam
mefira tenenee na ɛfira me m atemmusɛm te sɛ atadeɛ yuu ne abotire
meyɛɛ aniwa maa onifirani na meyɛɛ ɛnan nso maa apakye
meyɛɛ agya maa ahiafoɔ na deɛ menni no no mpo asɛm mehwehwɛ mu maa no
na mebubuu omumuyɛfoɔ sebɔmmɔfoɔ na mehwim fomfa adeɛ mefirii ne se mu
na mekaa sɛ me pirebuo ara mu na mɛgyaa mu na mama me nna adɔɔso sɛ anwea
me nhini mu bɛbue ama nsuo na obosuo nso atena me mman so
m animuonyam yɛ foforɔ ma me na me tadua anya denyɛ foforɔ me nsam
me na wɔtie me na wɔtwɛn me na wɔyɛ komm tie m afotuo
me kasa akyi wɔnsane nkasa na me nsɛm sosɔ gu wɔn so
na wɔtwɛn me sɛdeɛ wɔtwɛn osutorɔ na wɔtrɛ wɔn anomu sɛdeɛ wɔde regye bereamporɔsuo
mesere mekyerɛ wɔn a anidasoɔ abɔ wɔn na m anim a ɛteɛ no wɔmma no ngu ase
meyii wɔn kwan memaa wɔn metenaa ase sɛ otitire na metenaa hɔ sɛ ɔhene asafo mu sɛdeɛ ɔkyekyere abooboodifoɔ werɛ
na afei wɔn a mekyɛne wɔn panin koraa sere me wɔn a mepo wɔn agyanom sɛ mede wɔn bɛhyɛ me nkraman a wɔhwɛ me nnwankuo so mu
wɔn nsam tumi nso bɛyɛ me dɛn wɔn a wɔn ahoɔden asa
ohia ne ɛkɔm nti wɔatwintwam wɔwewe nkyɛkyerɛ so deɛ ɛhɔ yɛ sakasaka kusuu ne basabasa
wɔtete nkyenhahan wɔ nnuaa so na ɛserɛ so nnuaa nhini ne wɔn aduane
wɔatu wɔn afiri nnipa mu wɔhuro wɔn sɛ owifoɔ
mmonhwa a ɛhɔ yɛ hu mu na wɔteteɛ ɛfam ne abotan mu ntokuro mu
nnua ntam na wɔbobom nsansono ase na wɔsam
agyegyentwie mma ne wɔn wɔn a wɔnni din mma nso wɔapam wɔn afiri asase so
na afei madane wɔn sankuo dwom na mayɛ wɔn sɛmɔdɛ
wɔkyiri me wɔma me ne wɔn ntam twe na wɔnkame sɛ wɔtoto ntasuo gu m ani soɔ
na ɛnam sɛ onyankopɔn asane me homa na wabrɛ me aseɛ nti wɔn nso ato ahohyɛsoɔ atwene wɔ m anim
me nifa so na ahuhufoɔ no asɔreɛ wɔsum me fidie na wɔdane wɔn sɛeɛ akwan ba me so
wɔdwiri me kwan wɔboa me sɛeɛ nso obiara biara nsianka wɔn
wɔba sɛ obuba a emu trɛ wɔnam huuyɛ no mu munimuni ba
ahuyideɛ adane hwɛ me so wɔpamo me bakomadie sɛ mframa na me yiedie asene kɔ sɛ mununkum
na afei me kra nane gu me mu amanehunu nna asosɔ me mu
anadwo hodwo me nnompe wɔ me mu na yea a ɛwe me no nnyae
emu den nko ara nti m atadeɛ asakyera ɛmia me sɛ me kamisaa kɔn
wato me atwene atɛkyɛ mu me ho ayɛ sɛ dɔteɛ ne nso
mesu mefrɛ wo na wonnye me so megyina hɔ na wohwɛ me haa
woadane ayɛ sɛ otirimuɔdenfoɔ ama me wode wo nsa a ɛyɛ den ne me di asie
woma me so ma metena mframa so kɔ na woma menane huuyɛ mu
na menim sɛ wode me bɛsane ama owuo ne efie a ateasefoɔ hyia mu no
nanso obi ntene ne nsa nhwehwɛ ɔgyeɛ nkunkumaboɔkuo mu na sɛ obi reyera a ɔnsu mfrɛ ɔboafoɔ anaa
mansu mamma deɛ ɔwɔ amaneɛ mu ohiani anyɛ me kra mmɔbɔ anaa
na metwɛn adepa nso bɔne na aba na m ani daa hann so na esum kabii aba
me yamuadeɛ huru na ɛnnyae amanehunu nna ato me
mabiri tumm na menenam nso ɛmfiri awia mesɔre badwa mu na meteam
madane ɛserɛ so akraman nua ne sohoribereɛ adamfo
me wedeɛ abiri rewae afiri me ho na ahuhuro nti me nnompe ahye
na me sankuo adane abooboo na me tɛntɛbɛn adane asufoɔ nne
apam na me ne m ani apam na adɛn na memfa m ani menkari ɔbaabunu
na anka ɛdeɛn ne nyankopɔn kyɛfa a ɛfiri soro ne otumfoɔ agyapadeɛ a ɛfiri sorɔnsorɔmmea
ɛnyɛ ɔsɛeɛ ne obusufoɔ adeɛ na akatua denden ne amumuyɛfoɔ kyɛfa anaa
ɛnyɛ ɔno na ɔhunu m akwan na ɔkan m anammɔn tutuo nyinaa
sɛ medii ahuhudeɛ akyi na me nan pɛɛ nnaadaa ho ntɛm a
ɔnkari me nsaniakwanmu mu na onyankopɔn nhunu me mudie no
sɛ me nan mane firii ɔkwan no so na m akoma dii m ani akyi na nkekaeɛ wɔ me nsam a
ɛnneɛ wɔmma mennua na obi nni na wɔntutu me nnɔbaeɛ ngu
sɛ wɔdaadaa m akoma ɔbaa bi ho na metɛɛ me yɔnko pono ano a
ɛnneɛ ma me yere nyam mma obi na ebinom nkom ne so
na ɛno na ɛyɛ aniwusɛm na ɛno ne asɛnnifoɔ anim amumuyɛ
na ɛno ne ogya a ɛhye kɔ ɔyera amena mu na anka ɛbɛtutu me nnɔbaeɛ nyinaa
sɛ mammu m akoa anaa m afenaa atemmuo hwee berɛ a wɔne me wɔ ɛham bi a
ɛnneɛ sɛ onyankopɔn sɔre a ɛdeɛn na mɛyɛ na sɛ ɔbisa a ɛdeɛn na mede bɛbua no
ɛnyɛ deɛ ɔyɛɛ me no na ɔyɛɛ no ɔyafunu mu na ɔbaakofoɔ na ɔsiesiee yɛn nyinaa ɛna yam
sɛ masianka mmɔborɔfoɔ afiri deɛ wɔhwehwɛ ho na mama akunafoɔ ani abu
na me nkutoo madi m aduane na awisiaa anni mu bi a
mmom ɛfiri ne mmɔfraase na meyɛnee no sɛ agya na ɛfiri ne na yam na mekyerɛɛ no kwan
sɛ mahunu obi a ntoma abɔ no nti ɔreyera na nkataho bi nni ohiani nsam
na sɛ n asenem anhyira me na wamfa me nnwan nwi anhyɛ ne ho hye
na sɛ mama me nsa so awisiaa so ɛfiri sɛ mehunuu me boa kuro pono mu a
ɛnneɛ me mmatiri nhwan mfiri ne dompe so na me nsa mmubu mfiri ne dompe so
ɛfiri sɛ mmusuo a ɛfiri onyankopɔn yii me hu na ne kɛseyɛ nti mantumi manyɛ hwee
sɛ mede sika mayɛ m ahotosoɔ na maka makyerɛ sika amapa sɛ m anidasoɔ ne no
na sɛ m ani gyee sɛ m ahodeɛ dɔɔso ne sɛ me nsa aka adeɛ bebree
na sɛ mehunuu owia hann sɛ ɛhyerɛn na ɔsrane nam ne haran mu
na ɛdaadaa m akoma kokoam na m ano fee me nsa ho de mae a
na anka mapa onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ soro no akyi ɛno nso ne ɔtemmufoɔ anim amumuyɛ bi
sɛ m ani gyee me tamfo amanehunu ho na me ho sanee me sɛ bɔne ato no
nso mamma m ano anyɛ bɔne sɛ mede nnome bɛsrɛ ne wuo
ampa ara me ntomadan mufoɔ anka sɛ hwan na hiob maa no nam a ammee no
ɔhɔhoɔ biara ansoɛ abɔntene so mebuee me pono mekyerɛɛ akwantufoɔ
sɛ mekataa me mmarato so sɛ adam na mede m amumuyɛ mesiee me kokom
ɛfiri sɛ mesuroo nkurɔfoɔ dodoɔ na abusuafoɔ ahohorabɔ yii me hu na ɛmaa meyɛɛ komm mamfiri me pono ano amfiri adi a
o sɛ anka merenya obi a ɔbɛtie me ɛ hwɛ m agyiraeɛ nie otumfoɔ mmua me o sɛ anka ɔbarima a ɔne me anya no retwerɛ asɛm a ɔne me wɔ no ɛ
anka ampa ara mede bɛto me mmati mede bɛbɔ me ti sɛ abotire
anka mɛkyerɛ no m anammɔntutuo dodoɔ mɛtwe apini no sɛ ɔhene
sɛ m asase team tia me na n akofie de nne korɔ su
na sɛ medii n aba na mamma sika na memaa ɔdenadeɛ hweree ne kra a
ɛnneɛ ma nkasɛɛ mmɛsi ayuo ananmu mfifi na nnɛnkyɛnse mmɛsi atokoɔ ananmu hiob nsɛm no asi
ɛnna mmarima baasa yi gyaee hiob bua ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ n ani so teneneeni
na busini elihu a ɔyɛ barakel ba a ɔfiri ram abusua mu bo fui hiob na ne bo fuu no ɛfiri sɛ ɔbu ne ho teneneeni sene onyankopɔn
na ne bo fuu ne mfɛfoɔ baasa no nso sɛ wɔnnya mmuaeɛ bi bio nanso wɔbuu hiob fɔ
na elihu twɛn maa hiob kasae ansa ɛfiri sɛ wɔsene no panin
na elihu hunuu sɛ mmuaeɛ biara nni mmarima baasa no anomu bio no ne bo fui
na busini elihu a ɔyɛ barakel ba buaa sɛ me deɛ meyɛ abɔfra na mo deɛ moyɛ nkɔkoraa enti na metɔɔ me bo aseɛ na mesuroo sɛ mɛka deɛ menim makyerɛ mo
mekaa sɛ wɔmma onyinkyerɛ nkasa aane na mfeɛ dodoɔ nkyerɛ nyansa
ampa honhom a ɛwɔ ɔdasani mu ne otumfoɔ ahome na ɛma no nhunumu
ɛnyɛ wɔn a wɔanyini pii na wɔnim nyansa na ɛnyɛ mpanin na wɔhunu atemmuo mu
enti na mese montie me me nso mɛkyerɛ deɛ menim
hwɛ matwɛn ama mo akasa awie mayɛ aso mama mo nhunumusɛm sɛ mobɛhwehwɛ anya nsɛm
na mewɛn m aso sɛ meretie mo na hwɛ obiara nni mo mu a n asɛm tɔɔ hiob aso mu na ɔtumi buaa ne nsɛm no
na monnka sɛ yɛahunu nyansa onyankopɔn na ɔnha no na ɛnyɛ onipa
ɛfiri sɛ ɛnyɛ me na ɔkaa ne nsɛm no kyerɛɛ me na me nso meremfa mo nsɛm no memmua no
wɔn abam abu wɔremmua bio na wɔn anomu nsɛm nso asa
na sɛ wɔnkasa bio na wɔgyina hɔ na wɔmmua bio nti mentwɛn anaa
me nso mɛbua me fam deɛ me nso mɛkyerɛ deɛ menim
na nsɛm ahyɛ me ma na honhom a ɛwɔ me mu no hyɛ me
hwɛ me yam te sɛ nsa a wɔntuu ano sɛ nsa kotokuo foforɔ a ɛrepɛ apaeɛ
mɛkasa na manya ahomeyɛ mɛbue m ano na mabua
ɛmpare me sɛ mɛhwɛ obi anim na madɛfɛdɛfɛ m ano mama onipa
na mennim m ano adɛfɛdɛfɛ anka ebia ɛbɛka ketewaa sɛɛ na me yɛfoɔ afa me akɔ
na afei hiob tie me kasa ɛ na yɛ aso ma me nsɛm nyinaa
hwɛ mabue m ano me tɛkyerɛma rekasa me dodom
m akomam teeyɛ ne me nsɛm m ano ka nimdeɛ kronkron
nyankopɔn honhom na ɛyɛɛ me na otumfoɔ no ahome na ɛmaa me nkwa
sɛ wobɛtumi a yi ano kyerɛ me siesie wo ho m anim sɔre gyina
hwɛ me nso meyɛ nyankopɔn deɛ sɛ wo ara anwommoɔ mu na wɔtii me nso firiiɛ
hwɛ me ho hu rentu w akoma na me nhyɛsoɔ renyɛ wo so duru
ampa woaka no m aso mu na nsɛm nne na metee sɛ wose
me deɛ me ho te mmarato nni me ho me ho yɛ tɔtorɔtɔɔ amumuyɛ biara nni me ho
hwɛ ɔhunu ntɔkwa nsɛm wɔ me ho ɔbu me sɛ ne tamfo
ɔde me nan hyɛ mpokyerɛ mu ɔkari m akwan nyinaa
hwɛ yei mu na wontene merebua wo na onyankopɔn so sene ɔdasani
adɛn nti na wo ne no ham sɛ ɔmmua ne nsɛm nyinaa ho
nso onyankopɔn kasa prɛko ne deɛ ɛtia mprenu nanso onipa nnwene ho
daeɛ mu anadwo adehunu mu nnahɔɔ a atɔ nnipa soɔ mu mpa so nnaeɛ mu
emu na ɔbue nnipa aso na ɔsɔ wɔn atenetene ano
sɛ ɔbɛsane onipa afiri ne nneyɛɛ ho na wayi ahantan ahunta onipa
na watwe ne kra afiri amena mu ne ne nkwa nso na antɔ afena ano
na wɔde yea twe n aso ne mpa so ne ne nnompe mu daa aperedie
na ne nkwa ma aduane fono no na ne kra po akɔnnɔduane
ne honam afɔn ama no ayɛ hununa na ne nnompe a anka wɔnhunu mpo ada adi
na ne kra bɛn ɔsɛeɛ amena na ne nkwa nso bɛn akumfoɔ
sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ dimafoɔ wɔ hɔ ma no apem no mu ɔbaako sɛ ɔrekyerɛ onipa deɛ ɛtene ma no a
ɛno na ɔhu no mmɔbɔ ka sɛ kɔgye no na wankɔ ɔsɛeɛ amena no mu na manya agyedeɛ a
ɛnneɛ ne honam yɛ sɔɔsɔɔ sɛ mmɔfra deɛ ɔsane kɔ ne mmeranteberɛ mu
ɔkoto onyankopɔn a n ani sɔ no na ɔhunu n anim anigyeɛ mu na ɔdane ɔdasani tenenee ma no
na ɔto dwom kyerɛ nnipa sɛ mayɛ bɔne na makyea deɛ ɛtene no nanso ɔne me anni no sɛdeɛ ɛfata me
wagye me kra na ankɔ ɔsɛeɛ amena mu na me nkwa rehunu hann no
hwɛ yeinom nyinaa na onyankopɔn yɛ mprenu ne mprɛnsa wɔ onipa ho
sɛ ɔbɛsane ne kra afiri ɔsɛeɛ amena ho na wanya hann nkwa hann no mu
yɛ aso hiob na tie me yɛ komm na menkasa
sɛ nsɛm bi wɔ hɔ a yi ano kyerɛ me kasa na wo bemdie bɛyɛ me fɛ
sɛ ɛnte saa a ɛnneɛ tie me ara yɛ komm na menkyerɛ wo nyansa
na elihu toaa so sɛ
anyansafoɔ montie me nsɛm na mo animdefoɔ monyɛ aso mma me
na aso na ɛsɔ nsɛm hwɛ na ano ka aduane hwɛ
yɛbɛsɔ atemmuo ahwɛ afa na yɛahunu deɛ ɛyɛ yɛn ntam
na hiob aka sɛ metene nanso onyankopɔn afa me bem kɔ
me bem mu ara na wɔbu me torofoɔ m agyan kuro mu ayɛ den nanso mmarato nni me mu
ɔbarima bɛn na ɔte sɛ hiob a ɔnom mmusubɔ sɛ nsuo
na ɔhyɛne amumuyɛfoɔ ayɔnkofa mu na ɔne nnipa abɔnefoɔ ananteɛ
na ɔka sɛ ɛnyɛ mfasoɔ mma onipa sɛ ɔne onyankopɔn bɔ
enti mo a mowɔ tire montie me ɛmpare onyankopɔn sɛ ɔbɛdi asɛmmɔne na otumfoɔ bɛdi amumuyɛsɛm
na mmom onipa nneyɛɛ so ka na ɔtua no na sɛdeɛ obi kwan teɛ no saa na ɔma no to no
ampa ara onyankopɔn nni asɛmmɔne na otumfoɔ nkyea atemmuo
hwan na ɔde asase hyɛɛ ne nsa na hwan na ɔsiesiee wiase nyinaa
sɛ ɔgye ne home fa na ɔtwe ne honhom ne n ahome ba ne nkyɛn a
anka honam nyinaa bɛgyaa mu prɛko na onipa bɛsane akɔ dɔteɛ mu
na sɛ wowɔ nhunumu a tie yei yɛ aso ma me nsɛm
deɛ ɔkyiri atɛntenenee bɛnya aman adi so anaa anaasɛ wobɛbu ɔteneneeni tumfoɔ no fɔ
deɛ ɔka kyerɛ ɔhene sɛ ohuhuni ne mmapɔmma sɛ abɔnefoɔ
deɛ ɔnhwɛ atitire anim na ɔmmu ɔdehyeɛ nsene mmɔborɔni ɛfiri sɛ ne nsa ano adwuma ne wɔn nyinaa
mpofirim na wɔwuo na adasuo mu na aman hinhim na wɔsene korɔ na wɔpra aberempɔn kɔ nso ɛnnam onipa nsa so
na n ani wɔ onipa akwan so na ɔhunu n anammɔntutuo nyinaa
esum nni hɔ na esum kabii nni hɔ na amumuyɛfoɔ de wɔn ho ahunta hɔ
na ɛnhia sɛ ɔhwɛ onipa ma no kyɛ ansa na wakɔ nyankopɔn nkyɛn atemmuo mu
ɔbubu aberempɔn a ɔnhwehwɛ wɔn asɛm mu na ɔde afoforɔ si wɔn ananmu
ɛno nti ɔhwɛ wɔn nneyɛɛ na ɔbutu wɔn anadwo ma wɔdwerɛ wɔn
ɔhwe wɔn sɛ abɔnefoɔ ma nnipa nyinaa hunu
ɛfiri sɛ wɔmane firii n akyiri kɔe na wɔannwene n akwan no biara ho
sɛ wɔbɛma mmɔborɔni sufrɛ aduru ne nkyɛn na wate amanehunufoɔ sufrɛ
na sɛ ɔno na ɔma no dwo a hwan na ɔbɛbu fɔ na ɔde n ani hunta a hwan na ɔbɛhu no ɔman mu so oo ɔbaakofoɔ so oo ɔyɛ no pɛ
na onipa kɔnkɔnsani anni hene na wɔansum ɔman fidie
na obi bɛka akyerɛ onyankopɔn sɛ mahunu amane merenyɛ amumuyɛ bio
deɛ mennya menhunuiɛ wo na kyerɛ me sɛ madi amumuyɛsɛm a merenni bio
na worepo ne nneyɛɛ yi ɔnhyɛ wo ananmu sɛdeɛ wopɛ anaa enti wo na ɛsɛ sɛ woyi na ɛnyɛ me na deɛ wonim no ka ɛ
nnipa a wɔwɔ tire bɛka akyerɛ me na ɔbarima nyansafoɔ bɛtie ama me
hiob deɛ ɛnyɛ nimdeɛ so na ɔkasa na ne nsɛm mu nni nhunumu
sɛ anka wɔresɔ hiob ahwɛ akɔsi awieeɛ ɛ ɛfiri sɛ ne mmuaeɛ te sɛ amumuyɛfoɔ mmuaeɛ
na ɔde mmusubɔ ka ne bɔne ho yɛn mu mpo ɔbɔ ne nsam na ɔma ne nsɛm a ɔne onyankopɔn de di asie no dɔɔso
na elihu kɔɔ so ara kaa sɛ
wobu no sɛ ɛtene anaa woka sɛ me tenenee sene nyankopɔn deɛ
sɛ woka sɛ ɛbɛyɛ me mfasoɔ bɛn na mfasoɔ bɛn na mɛnya asene sɛ anka meyɛɛ bɔne
me deɛ mede nsɛm bɛbua wo ne wo mfɛfoɔ a wɔka wo ho no
hwɛ ɔsoro na hunu na hwɛ mununkum a ɛkorɔn sene woɔ no
sɛ woyɛ bɔne a ɛdeɛn na wode yɛ no na sɛ wo mmarato dɔɔso a ɛdeɛn na woyɛ no
sɛ wotene a ɛdeɛn na wode ma no anaasɛ wo nsam ɛdeɛn na ɔgyeɛ
onipa a ɔte sɛ woɔ na w abɔnefosɛm pira no na onipa ba bi na wo tenenee bɛma no anya mfasoɔ
nhyɛsoɔ bebrebe nti na ɛma wɔteam wɔsu frɛ ɔboafoɔ nnipa akɛseɛ nsa ase
nanso obi nka sɛ ɛhe na onyankopɔn me yɛfoɔ no wɔ deɛ ɔma nnwom anadwo
deɛ ɔkyerɛ yɛn nimdeɛ sene asase so mmoa na ɔkyerɛ yɛn nyansa sene ɔsoro nnomaa no
ɛhɔ na wɔteam na ɔmmua abɔnefoɔ ahantan nti
ampa ara onyankopɔn rentie ahuhusɛm na otumfoɔ remmu
na nkantom sɛ wose wonhu no deɛ nanso asɛm no da n anim na wotwɛn no ara
na afei ɛnam sɛ ɔmmɛtwee aso n abufuo mu na ɔnni amumuyɛ akyiri pii nti
hiob bue n ano kwa na nimdeɛ a ɔnnie mu ɔma nsɛm dɔɔso
na elihu kɔɔ so sɛ
ma me kwan kakra na menkyerɛ wo na meda so wɔ nsɛm bi meka ma onyankopɔn
mɛfa me nimdeɛ afiri akyirikyiri na mede me yɛfoɔ no bem ama no
na ampa me nsɛm nyɛ atorɔ deɛ ɔdi mu nimdeɛ mu na ɔne wo wɔ hɔ yi
hwɛ onyankopɔn yɛ ɔkɛseɛ na ɔmmu obi animtia ɔyɛ ɔkɛseɛ nteaseɛ tumi mu
ɔmma ɔbɔnefoɔ nnya nkwa na ɔde amanehunufoɔ bem ma wɔn
ɔnyi n ani mfiri ɔteneneeni so na ɔma wɔne ahemfo tena adwa so daa na wɔma wɔn so
na sɛ wɔgu wɔn nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn na wɔde amaneɛ nhoma kye wɔn a
ɛnna ɔka wɔn nneyɛɛ kyerɛ wɔn ne wɔn mmarato sɛ wɔama wɔn ho soɔ
na ɔbue wɔn aso ma atenetene na ɔka sɛ wɔnsane mfiri abusudeɛ ho
sɛ wɔtie na wɔsom no a wɔwie wɔn nna di yiedie mu ne wɔn mfeɛ nso deɛ ɛyɛ wɔn dɛ mu
na sɛ wɔantie a wɔtɔ dadeɛ ano na wɔgyaa mu nimdeɛ a abɔ wɔn no mu
na akoma mu ansuronyamefoɔ kora abufuo sɛ ɔkyekyere wɔn a wɔnkoto nsrɛ
wɔn kra wu mmeranteberɛ mu na wɔn nkwa sɛe sɛ nnwamamfoɔ deɛ no
ɔyi ɔmanehunufoɔ n amaneɛ mu na ɔbue wɔn aso ahodwan no mu
anka ɔbɛgye wo nso afiri ahohiahia mu akɔ deɛ ɛhɔ trɛ a ahokyere nnie hɔ na sradeɛ ayɛ wo pono so aduane ma
nanso ɔbɔnefoɔ atemmuo ayɛ wo ma atemmuo ne atɛntenenee asɔ wo mu
na mma abufuo nnnyegye wo nnkɔ ahiyie mu na mma agyedeɛ no dodoɔ nnhima w ani
w ahonyadeɛ anaa wo tumi ahoɔdenneɛ nyinaa de wo bɛsi deɛ ahohiahia nnie hɔ anaa
mpere anadwo ho sɛ ɛmmɛpra aman mfiri wɔn afa
hwɛ yie nnane w ani nkɔ ahuhudeɛ so ɛfiri sɛ wopɛ ɛno mmom sene amanehunu
hwɛ onyankopɔn di ne tumi mu asɛnkɛseɛ hwan ne ɔkyerɛkyerɛfoɔ sɛ ɔno
hwan na ɔhyɛɛ no sɛdeɛ ɔnyɛ n adeɛ mfa na hwan na ɔbɛka sɛ woadi asɛmmɔne
kae sɛdeɛ wobɛkamfo ne nneyɛɛ a adasa ato ho dwom no
nnipa nyinaa hwɛ ara ɔdasani firi akyirikyiri hwɛ
hwɛ onyankopɔn so na yɛnni no ne mfeɛ dodoɔ nso mu nni hwehwɛbea
ɔno na ɔtwe nsuo ntoantoa a ɛsosɔ tɔ ne mununkum mu nsuo
na ɛfiri mununkum mu tɔ gu fam ɛtɔ pii gu nnipa so
obi bɛtumi ate mununkum mu trɛ ne ne ntomadan mu kurududuyɛ no ase anaa
hwɛ ɔtrɛ ne hann mu wɔ ne so na ɔkata ɛpo nhini so
na ɛno na ɔde di aman asɛm ɔde aduane bebree nso ma
ɔde hann katakata ne nsa ho na ɔhyɛ ma no kɔsi botaeɛ bi mu
ne mmobom ka ne ho asɛm mmoakuo mpo ka asɛm fa ahum a ɛreba ho
aane yei ho na m akoma tutuo na ɛpopo firi n afa
tie na montie ne nne huuyɛ ne mmobom a ɛfiri n anomu no
ɔgyaa mu ɔsoro ase nyinaa na ne hann kɔduru asase anoano
aprannaa bobom di akyire ɔde ne kɛseyɛ nne no bobom sɛ wɔte ne nne a ɔrensianka wɔn
onyankopɔn de ne nne prannaa bobom ma no yɛ nwanwa ɔyɛ adeɛ akɛseɛ a yɛnhunu mu
