fa w ahonyadeɛ hyɛ awurade animuonyam ne wo nnɔbaeɛ mu adikan nyinaa
ɛnna adedodoɔ bɛyɛ w asan amaama na wo nsa kyi amena mu nsa foforɔ bɛbu soɔ
me ba mpo awurade nkyerɛkyerɛ na mma n animka mmfono wo
na deɛ awurade dɔ no na ɔka n anim sɛdeɛ agya yɛ ne ba a ɔdɔ no no
nhyira ne onipa a ɔhunu nyansa ne onipa a ɔnya nteaseɛ
na emu adenya yɛ sene dwetɛ deɛ na ne mfasoɔ sene sika amapa
ne boɔ yɛ den sene mmota na afɛfɛdeɛ nyinaa wɔmfa nto ho
onyinkyerɛ wɔ ne nifa mu ne benkum kura adeɛ ne animuonyam
n akwan yɛ akwan a ɛyɛ fɛ na n asa nyinaa yɛ asomdwoeɛ
ɛyɛ nkwa dua ma wɔn a wɔsɔ ne mu na nhyira ne deɛ ɔkura mu
awurade de nyansa na ɛhyɛɛ asase aseɛ ɔde nteaseɛ de ɔsoro tim hɔ
ne nimdeɛ so na abunu mu nsuo paeeɛ na mununkum sosɔ obosuo
me ba fa nyansa mapa ne adwempa sie mma no nnnane mfiri w ani so
na ayɛ nkwa ama wo kra ne animuonyam ama wo kɔn
ɛno na wobɛnante wo kwan so dwoodwoo na wo nan ansunti
sɛ wokɔda a woremmɔ binim na woda a wo nna bɛyɛ dɛ
nsuro mpofirim huyie ne abɔnefoɔ sɛeɛ a ɛbɛba
na awurade bɛyɛ w ahodasodeɛ na ɔbɛkora wo nan afiri ɛkyerɛ mu
mfa yieyɛ nkame deɛ ɛsɛ no berɛ a ɛwɔ wo tumi mu sɛ wobɛyɛ no
nka nkyerɛ wo yɔnko sɛ kɔ na bra ne ɔkyena mede bɛma berɛ a ɛwɔ wo hɔ
mpam wo yɔnko ho apammɔne berɛ a ɔne wo te hɔ dwoodwoo no
ɛne obi nnni ntɔkwasɛm kwa berɛ a ɔnyɛɛ wo bɔne biara no
ntwe otirimuɔdenfoɔ ho ninkunu nanso nyi n akwan mu biara
na ɔkɔnkɔnsani yɛ awurade akyiwadeɛ na teefoɔ na ɔne wɔn ka atirimusɛm
awurade nnome wɔ ɔbɔnefoɔ fie na ɔhyira ateneneefoɔ tenabea
aane ɔdi afɛdifoɔ ho fɛw na ɔdom ahobrɛasefoɔ
anyansafoɔ bɛnya animuonyam adi na nkwaseafoɔ deɛ wɔbɛsoa ahohora
mma montie agya akwankyerɛ na monyɛ aso na moanya nhunumu
na adenim pa na mekyerɛ mo monnnya me mmara
na na ɛberɛ a meyɛ abadoma no ɔbabanin ne ɔba korɔ ma me na ne m agya no
na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ me na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ ma w akoma nsɔ me nsɛm mu di me mmara nsɛm so na nya nkwa
nya nyansa nya nhunumu mma wo werɛ mmfi na mmane mfiri m anomu kasa ho
nnya no na ɛbɛhwɛ wo so dɔ no na ɛbɛkora wo
nyansa ne ade titire enti nya nyansa na fa w adenya nyinaa nya nhunumu
bu no na ɛbɛma wo so sɛ woyɛ no atuu a ɛbɛhyɛ wo animuonyam
ɛbɛyɛ wo ti animuonyam abotire aane abotire fɛfɛ na ɛde bɛhyɛ woɔ
me ba tie na fa me nsɛm na wo nkwa mfeɛ adɔɔso
makyerɛ wo nyansa kwan magya wo atempɔn tee so
wo nanteɛ mu w anammɔn renkye wo na sɛ wotu mmirika a worensunti
sɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ mu dendeenden nnyaa mu kora no na ɛne wo nkwa
nkɔ abɔnefoɔ kwan mu na mfa nnipa bɔne kwan so
kwati no nsene mfa so mane firi ho na siane ho kɔ
wɔn deɛ wɔnna gye sɛ wɔayɛ bɔne ansa na wɔntumi nna gye sɛ wɔahwe obi ase ansa
na wɔdi abɔnefosɛm aduane na amimdie nsa na wɔnom
na ateneneefoɔ kwan te sɛ owia hann ɛkɔ so hyerɛn kɔduru awia ketee
abɔnefoɔ kwan te sɛ esum kabii wɔnnim deɛ wɔhunta
me ba tie me nsɛm wɛn w aso ma me kasa
mma no mmfiri w ani so fa sie w akomam tɔnn
na ɛyɛ nkwa ma wɔn a wɔhunu ne nkwahosan ma ne honam nyinaa
kora w akoma sene deɛ wode sie nyinaa na emu na nkwa adifire fire
yi ano kontonkyi firi wo ho na ma nkontompo ano nkɔ akyirikyiri
ma w ani nhwɛ tee na w anisuatɛtɛ ntene nhwɛ w anim
taataa w anammɔn pɛpɛɛpɛ na ma w akwan nyinaa ntim
mmane nifa anaa benkum twe wo nan firi bɔne mu
me ba tie me nyansa brɛ w aso ase ma me nteaseɛ
na woahwɛ adwempa so na w ano akora nimdeɛ
na ɔbaa sansani ano kyi ɛwoɔ sosɔ na n anomu yɛ toro sene ngo
na n akyiri yɛ nwono sɛ ɔnwono ɛyɛ nnam te sɛ nkrantɛ anofanu
ne nan siane kɔ owuo mu asamando na n anammɔn tutu korɔ
nkwa kwan deɛ ɔnkɔ ara da n anammɔn kyinkyini kɔ deɛ ɔnnim hɔ
na afei me mma montie me na monnyi mo ho mmfiri m anomu nsɛm ho
ma wo kwan mfiri ne ho nkɔ akyiri na mmɛn ne fie pono ano
na woamfa w anidie amma ebinom ne wo mfeɛ amma otirimuɔdenfoɔ
na ahɔhoɔ anni w adeɛ ammee na w adwumadeɛ antena obi hunu fie
na wo nna a ɛdi akyire no woampenepene sɛ wo nipadua ne wo honam asa
na woanka sɛ ao sɛ metanee atenetene na m akoma kyirii animka nie
na mantie m akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ na mammrɛ m aso ase mamma me nyansakyerɛfoɔ
ɛkaa kumaa sɛ ɛsii me bɔne koraa asafo ne adwabɔ mu
nom w abura mu nsuo ne nsuo a ɛsene firi wo nsutire mu
wo nsuo aniwa bɛbu so afiri adi ayɛ mmɔntene so asutene
ɛbɛyɛ wo nko ara wo dea na ɛnyɛ wo ne ahɔhoɔ biara dea
ma w abura nyɛ nhyira na wo ne wo mmeranteberɛ mu yerɛ ani nnye
na ɔte sɛ ɔtwe bereɛ dɔfo ne animuonyam wansane no ma ne mpokua nsɔ w ani daa na tɔ ne dɔ mu ntintan daa nyinaa
me ba adɛn na wotɔ ɔbaa nanani ho ntintan na wosɔ ɔbaa hɔhoɔ kokom
na onipa akwan da awurade anim na ɔtaataa n anammɔn nyinaa
ɔbɔnefoɔ amumuyɛ sɔ ne mu na ne bɔne nhoma kye no
ɔkwati atenetene nti ɔbɛwu na n agyegyentwisɛm dodoɔ nti ɔbɛyera
me ba sɛ wogyina wo yɔnko akyi sɛ wodi ɔhɔhoɔ agyinamu
sɛ wɔnam w anomu asɛm so akye wo a
yɛ yei mmom me ba na yi wo ho ɛfiri sɛ woatɔ wo yɔnko nsam kɔ kɔkoto na srɛ wo yɔnko no
mma nna nnkɔ w ani so na mma w anisuatɛtɛ nntɔ nko
yi wo ho sɛ adowa firi ɔbɔmmɔfoɔ nsam sɛ anomaa firi fidisumfoɔ nsam
ɔkwadwofoɔ kɔ tɛtea nkyɛn hwɛ n akwan na hunu nyansa
ɔno na ɔnni otitire ɔpanin anaa sodifoɔ bie
nanso ɔsiesie n aduane ahuhuberɛ na ɔboaboa n adidideɛ ano twaberɛ mu
wobɛda akɔsi da bɛn ɔkwadwofoɔ berɛ bɛn na wobɛsɔreɛ afiri wo nna mu
nna kakra nkotɔ kakra nsa a mɛpono mada kakra
ɛnna wo hia bɛto wo sɛ ɔkwanmukafoɔ ne w ahokyere sɛ ɛkyɛmkurafoɔ
onipa huhuo ne ɔbarima busuyɛfoɔ ɔde ano kontonkyi nenam
ɔbubu n ani ɔde ne nan kasa ɔde ne nsateaa kyerɛkyerɛ adeɛ
akontonkyisɛm wɔ n akomam ɔpam ne tirim apammɔne daa takrawɔgyam na ɔhyɛ
enti mpofirim na ne sɛeɛ bɛba wɔbɛbubu no amonom a wɔntumi nsa
adeɛ nsia yi na awurade tane aane na adeɛ nson na ɛyɛ ne kra akyiwadeɛ
ani a ɛtra ntɔn atorɔ tɛkyerɛma ne nsa a ɛhwie mogya a ɛdi bem guo
akoma a ɛdwene mmusuo adwene nan a ɛyɛ herɛ tu mmirika kɔ bɔne mu
ɔdansekurumfoɔ a ɔhu atorosɛm ne deɛ ɔhyɛ anuanom ntam takrawɔgyam
me ba bu w agya mmara nsɛm na nto wo na nkyerɛkyerɛ ntwene
fa kyekyere w akoma ho daa nyinaa na fa bebare wo kɔn ho hyia
wonam a ma no nkɔgya wo woda a ɛnhwɛ wo so na wonyane a ɛnyɛ wo sɛmɔdɛbɔ
na mmara nsɛm no yɛ kanea na nkyerɛkyerɛ no yɛ hann na atenetene nkaanim yɛ nkwa kwan
na ahwɛ wo so afiri ɔbaa bɔne ho afiri ɔbaa hɔhoɔ tɛkyerɛma dɔkɔdɔkɔ ho
mma w ani mmmere n ahoɔfɛ w akomam na mma no mmfa n anisuatɛtɛ nnkye wo
na ɛsiane ɔbaa dwamamfoɔ nti wɔgyee ɔbarima paanoosini na obi yere deɛ wɔgyee no ne nkwa a ne boɔ yɛ den no
onipa de ogya bɛhyɛ ne kokom a ne ntadeɛ renhyeɛ
obi bɛfa nsramma so a ne nan renhyeɛ
saa na deɛ ɔkɔ ne yɔnko yere nkyɛn teɛ na obiara a ɔkɔ ne yɔnko yere nkyɛn no renni bem
sɛ ɛkɔm de owifoɔ na ɔwia adeɛ sɛ ɔredi amee a wɔmmu no animtia
nanso sɛ wɔhu no a ɔbɔ ho mprɛnson ɔde n afideɛ nyinaa bɛma
deɛ ɔsɛe awadeɛ no nni ti deɛ ɔyɛ saa no de sɛe ne kra
mmaa ne animguaseɛ na ɔbɛnya na n ahohora no wɔmpepa
na ninkunu twetwe ɔbarima abufuhyeɛ na aweretɔ da no ɔremfa nkyɛ
ɔremmu mpata biara na woma akyɛdeɛ dɔɔso mpo a ɔrempene
me ba di me nsɛm so na fa me mmara nsɛm sie
di me mmara nsɛm so na nya nkwa na bu me mmara sɛ w aniwa kurutuawisi
fa kyekyere wo nsateaa so twerɛ no w akoma pono so
ka kyerɛ nyansa sɛ me nuabaa ne wo na frɛ nhunumu sɛ w adamfo
na ahwɛ wo so afiri ɔbaa sansani ho afiri ɔbaa sansani a ɔka adɔkɔdɔkɔsɛm ho
na mefiri me dan mpomma mu m aniahunuankansa mu mehwɛe
na mehwɛɛ ntetekwaafoɔ mu mehunuu mmɔfra no mu aberantewaa bi a ɔnni tire
ɔperee abɔntene bɛn ne ntwea na ɔsene faa ne fie kwan
ɛberɛ a adeɛ resa anwummerɛ anadwo kɔnkɔn ne sum mu
na hwɛ ɔbaa bi hyiaa no ɔfira adwamamfoɔ ntoma n akoma asene
wagyigya na n aso asoro ne nan ntena ne fie
seesei ɔwɔ mmorɔno so seesei yi ɔwɔ edwa so na ɔtetɛ ntwea nyinaa so
ɛnna ɔsɔɔ no mu na ɔfee n ano na ɔsenee n ani ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ
asomdwoeɛ afɔrebɔ da me so ɛnnɛ na mama m aboadeɛ
enti na mefiri mebɛhyiaa woɔ yi mebɛhwehwɛɛ w anim na mahu woɔ yi
mede mmomo makata me mpa so misraim nkyeremu
mede kurobo ne pɛprɛ ne duapapo mapete me nnaeɛ so
bra ma ɔdɔ mmee yɛn nkɔsi anɔpa ma yɛmfa akɔnnɔdeɛ nsɛpɛ yɛn ho
na efiewura nni fie watu kwan kɔ akyirikyiri
wafa fotoɔ ne sika akura srane korokumatwa da mu ansa na ɔbɛba fie
ɔde bradɛ pii too no ɔde n ano fremfrem nyaa no de no kɔe
ɔdii n akyi awerɛfirem sɛ nantwie a wɔrekɔku no sɛ mpokyerɛ a wɔde twe ogyimifoɔ aso
kɔsii sɛ agyan hwiree ne mmerɛboɔ mu te sɛ anomaa de ahoɔherɛ kɔ fidie mu na ɔnnim sɛ ne nkwa na ɛda mu
na afei me mma montie me na monyɛ aso mma m anomu nsɛm
mma w akoma mmmane nnkɔ n atempɔn so mfom nkɔ n akwan so
na wapirapira nnipa pii agugu hɔ na wɔn a wakunkum wɔn dɔɔso
ne fie ne asamando kwan ɛsiane kɔ owuo mpia mu
ɛno ɛnyɛ nyansa na ɛteam na nteaseɛ ma ne nne soɔ
sorɔnsorɔn atifi ɔkwan so nkwanta so na ɛgyina
na ɔteam aponkɛseɛ ho kurotia aboboano sɛ
mo mmarima na meteam mefrɛ mo na me nne gyegye ma nnipa mma
mo ntetekwaa momma mo ani nte na mo nkwaseafoɔ monnya nhunumu akoma
montie na merebɛka nsɛm a emu da hɔ na m anomu bue de nsɛm a ɛtene ba
na nokorɛ firi m anomu na m ano akyiwadeɛ ne abɔnefosɛm
m anomu nsɛm nyinaa nam tenenee mu adeɛ a akyinkyim anaasɛ ɛkyea nni mu
ne nyinaa mu da hɔ ma nhunumufoɔ na ɛtene ma wɔn a wɔahunu nimdeɛ
momfa m atenetene na ɛnyɛ dwetɛ na momfa nimdeɛ na monnya sika a wɔayiyi mu
na nyansa yɛ sene mmota na afɛfɛdeɛ nyinaa wɔmfa nto ho
me nyansa me ne aniteɛ na ɛteɛ na adwempa nimdeɛ na mehunu
awurade suro ne bɔne tane ahokyerɛ ahantan ɔkwammɔne ne akontonkyisɛm ano na mekyire
afotuo ne nyansahunu wɔ me mene nhunumu mmaninyɛ wɔ me
me so na ahemfo nam di hene na atitire hyɛ mmara tenenee
me so na mpanimfoɔ nam di panin ne aberempɔn ne asase so atemmufoɔ nyinaa
me deɛ medɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ me na wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me ntɛm hu me
ahonyadeɛ ne animuonyam wɔ me hɔ ahodeɛ a ɛkyɛre ne tenenee
m aba yɛ sene sika ne sika amapa na me nnɔbaeɛ sene dwetɛ a wɔayiyi mu
tenenee tempɔn mu na menam atemmuo akwan so pɛ
sɛ merema m adɔfo adi adeɛ na mahyɛ wɔn adekorabea amaama
awurade bɔɔ me de firii n adwuma ase ne nnwuma a ɛfiri teteete no mu adikan
ɔde me sii hɔ firi tete nteredee firi mfitiaseɛ ansa na asase reba
abunu nni hɔ no na wɔawo me nsutire a ɛba nsuo pii nni hɔ no
wɔnnya mfaa mmepɔ nsisii hɔ na nkokoɔ nnya mmaeɛ no na wɔawo me
ɔnnya nyɛɛ asase ne wiram ne wiase mfuturo no
ɔsiesiee ɔsoro no na mewɔ hɔ berɛ a ɔtwaa abunu ani kɔntɔnkrɔn no
ɔde mununkum sensɛnee soro pintinn na ebunu mu nsuo aniwa paee denden
ɔtwaa ɛpo hyeɛ na nsuo antra na ɔde asase fapem too hɔ no
na mewɔ ne nkyɛn sɛ ne dwumfoɔ panin na meyɛ n adɔdeɛ daa daa na m ani gye n anim berɛ nyinaa mu
na m ani gye ne wiase asase so na m ani ka wɔ nnipa mma mu
na afei mma montie me na nhyira ne wɔn a wɔdi m akwan soɔ
montie atenetene na monhunu nyansa na monnte atua
nhyira ne onipa a ɔtie me na ɔwɛn m apono ano daa daa na ɔhwɛ m aboboano aponnwa soɔ
na deɛ ɔhu me no hunu nkwa na ɔnya awurade hɔ anisɔ
na deɛ ɔfom me no di ne kra aborɔ wɔn a wɔtane me nyinaa dɔ owuo
nyansa asi ne dan wasene n adum nson
wakum ne mmoa wafra ne nsa na wasiesie ne pono nso
wasoma ne mmaawa ɔkɔteam kuro mu sorɔnsorɔmmea so sɛ
deɛ ɔyɛ atetekwaa mmane ha na deɛ ɔnni tire no ɔse no sɛ
mommra mmɛdi m aduane no bi na monnom me nsa a mafra no bi
monnyaa ntetekwaayɛ na monnya nkwa na monnante nhunumu kwan so
deɛ ɔtenetene ɔfɛdifoɔ no soa aniwuo na deɛ ɔka ɔbɔnefoɔ anim no nya nkekaeɛ
nka ɔfɛdifoɔ anim na wantane wo ka onyansafoɔ anim na ɔbɛdɔ wo
tu onyansafoɔ fo na ɔbɛkɔ so ahunu nyansa ma ɔteneneeni nhunu de na ɔbɛkɔ so n adenim mu
ampa ara nyansa mfitiaseɛ ne awurade suro na ɔkronkronni no ho nimdeɛ ne nhunumu
na me nti na wo nna bɛdɔɔso na wɔde nkwa mfeɛ bɛka wo ho
sɛ wohunu nyansa a wohunu fa na sɛ wodi fɛw a wo nko na wobɛsoa
ɔbaa kwasea yɛ ɔkasafoɔ tibɔnkɔso a ɔnnim hwee
ɔtena ne fie aboboano kuro mu sorɔnsorɔn hɔ adwa so
sɛ ɔrefrɛ wɔn a wɔresene ɔkwan soɔ wɔnam wɔn nkwammɔeɛ so tee no sɛ
deɛ ɔyɛ atetekwaa mmane ha na deɛ ɔnni tire nso ɔse no sɛ
nsuo a wɔwia yɛ fremfrem na ahuntaduane yɛ dɛ
nso onii no nnim sɛ nsamanfoɔ wɔ hɔ asamando abunu mu na wɔn a wahyia wɔn no wɔ
salomo mmebusɛm ɔba nyansafoɔ ma n agya ani gye na ɔba kwasea deɛ ɔhyɛ ne na awerɛhoɔ
ɔbɔnefoɔ akoradeɛ nyɛ mfasoɔ biara na tenenee gye onipa firi owuo mu
awurade mma ɛkɔm nne ɔteneneeni kra na abɔnefoɔ adepɛ deɛ ɔka gu
ohia bɛhia deɛ ɔtwentwɛn ne nsa aseɛ na nsiyɛfoɔ nsa ma wɔnya wɔn ho
deɛ ɔboaboa ano ahuhuberɛ no yɛ ɔba nyansafoɔ na deɛ ɔtɔ nko twaberɛ no yɛ ɔba a ɔhyɛ aniwuo
nhyira da ɔteneneeni atifi na akakabensɛm kata abɔnefoɔ ano
ɔteneneeni nkaeɛ yɛ nhyira na abɔnefoɔ din bɛporɔ
akoma mu nyansafoɔ gye mmara nsɛm na ogyimifoɔ kurokurofoɔ bɛhwe ase
deɛ ɔnam pɛyɛ mu no nam dwoodwoo na deɛ ɔkyea n akwan no wɔbɛhu no
deɛ ɔbu ani no yi awerɛhoɔ na ogyimifoɔ kurokurofoɔ bɛhwe ase
ɔteneneeni ano yɛ nkwa nsutire na akakabensɛm kata abɔnefoɔ ano
ɔtane hwanyan ntɔkwa na ɔdɔ kata mfomsoɔ nyinaa so
nhunumufoɔ anomu na wɔhunu nyansa na abaa fata deɛ ɔnni tire akyi
anyansafoɔ kora nimdeɛ na ogyimifoɔ ano yɛ abuo a ɛbɛn
ɔdefoɔ ahonyadeɛ ne ne kuro a ɛyɛ den mmɔborɔfoɔ abuo a ɛbu wɔn ne wɔn hia
ɔteneneeni adeyɛ ma nkwa ɔbɔnefoɔ nnɔbaeɛ deɛ ɔde yɛ bɔne
deɛ ɔbu atenetene fa nkwa kwan so na deɛ ɔpo animka no fom kwan
deɛ ɔkata nitan soɔ no wɔ atorɔ ano na deɛ ɔtwirie no yɛ ɔkwasea
mfomsoɔ mpa ɔkasa dodoɔ mu na deɛ ɔsianka n ano yɛ onimdefoɔ
ɔteneneeni tɛkyerɛma yɛ dwetɛ a wɔayiyi mu abɔnefoɔ akoma deɛ ɛmfra
ɔteneneeni ano yɛne nnipa pii na agyimifoɔ deɛ etire a wɔnnie nti wɔwuwu
awurade nhyira na ɛyɛ ɔdefoɔ na ɔmfa awerɛhoɔ nka ho
amumuyɛ yɛ ɔkwasea sɛ agorɔ na nyansa yɛ onipa a ɔwɔ nhunumu fɛ
ɔbɔnefoɔ adeɛ a ɔsuro ara na ɛbɛba ne soɔ na ateneneefoɔ adeɛ a wɔpɛ no wɔbɛma wɔn
sɛ ahum tu twam a na ɔbɔnefoɔ nni hɔ bio na ɔteneneeni yɛ daa nnyinasoɔ
sɛ nsa kekakeka yɛ ɛse na wisie yɛ aniwa no sɛ onihafoɔ yɛ wɔn a wɔsoma no ne no
awurade suro to nna so na abɔnefoɔ mfeɛ deɛ wɔbɛtwa so
teneneefoɔ anidasoɔ bɛyɛ anigyeɛ na deɛ abɔnefoɔ hwɛ no kwan no bɛyera
awurade akwan yɛ ahoɔden ma pɛyɛfoɔ na ɛyɛ ɔsɛeɛ ma amumuyɛfoɔ
ɔteneneeni remfiri n ananmu da biara da na abɔnefoɔ deɛ wɔrentena asase so
ɔteneneeni ano yi nyansa adi na tɛkyerɛma kontonkyi deɛ wɔbɛtwa
ɔteneneeni ano nim adeɛ a ɛsɔ ani na abɔnefoɔ ano di akontonkyisɛm
nsisie nsania yɛ awurade akyiwadeɛ na abrammo a ɛtene no yɛ no anisɔ
ahantan ba a na aniwuo ba na ahobrɛasefoɔ na nyansa ne wɔn teɛ
teefoɔ pɛyɛ bɛgya wɔn na nkontompofoɔ nnaadaa bɛsɛe wɔn
adedodoɔ nyɛ mma hwee abufuo da na tenenee gye onipa firi owuo mu
pɛyɛfoɔ tenenee bɛtene ne kwan na ɔbɔnefoɔ deɛ ɔbɛhwe ase n abɔnefosɛm mu
teefoɔ tenenee bɛgye wɔn na nkontompofoɔ deɛ mmusubɔ mu na wɔbɛkye wɔn
onipa bɔne wu a n anidasoɔ yera na amumuyɛfoɔ kwanhwɛ yera
wɔbɛyi ɔteneneeni afiri ahohiahia mu na ɔbɔnefoɔ abɛsi n ananmu ahunu amane
ɔdebɔneyɛni de n ano sɛe ne yɔnko na teneneefoɔ nimdeɛ na wɔde bɛyi wɔn
teneneefoɔ di yie a ɔman ho sane wɔn na abɔnefoɔ sɛe a wɔhuro
ɛnam teefoɔ nhyira so na wɔma kuro soɔ na ɛnam abɔnefoɔ anomu nsɛm so na wɔbɔ no
deɛ ɔyi ne yɔnko ahi nni ti na nhunumu nipa mua n ano
nsekuni nenam yi ahuntasɛm adi na nokorɛ honhom kata asɛm so
deɛ akwankyerɛ nnie no ɔman hwe ase na ɔmannwoeɛ wɔ agyinatufoɔ dodoɔ mu
deɛ ɔdi hɔhoɔ agyinamu no ɛbɛwie no bɔne na deɛ ɔtane agyinamudeɛ no aso mu dwo no
ɔbaa a n anim teɛ nya animuonyam na ɔhoɔdenfoɔ deɛ ɔnya ahonyadeɛ kwa
ɔyamyiefoɔ yɛ ne kra yie na otirimuɔdenfoɔ ha ɔno ara ne honam
ɔbɔnefoɔ yɛ adwuma hunu na deɛ ɔgu tenenee no nya nokorɛ akatua
deɛ ɔtim tenenee mu no kɔ nkwa mu na deɛ ɔti bɔne no nya owuo
awurade akyiwadeɛ ne akoma kontonkyifoɔ na wɔn a wɔn kwan yɛ pɛ sɔ n ani
ampa ara ɔbɔnefoɔ renni bem na teneneefoɔ asefoɔ deɛ wɔbɛgye wɔn
sɛ sika adwinneɛ teɛ wɔ prako hwene mu no sɛ ɔbaabereɛ a wapo deɛ ɛfata teɛ ne no
teneneefoɔ adeɛ a wɔpɛ yɛ papa nko ara na abɔnefoɔ deɛ anidasoɔ dane wɔn abufuo
obi wɔ hɔ a ɔpete nanso ɔkɔ so dɔre ara na obi di adɔna tra so nanso ɛhia no ara
nhyira kra bɛdɔre sradeɛ na deɛ ɔma ebinom meeɛ nso bɛmee
deɛ ɔkora aburoo no nkurɔfoɔ dome no na nhyira ba deɛ ɔtɔn no so
deɛ ɔpɛ papa akyiri kwan no hwehwɛ anisɔ na deɛ ɔdi bɔne akyire no ɛba ne so
deɛ ɔde ne ho to n ahonyadeɛ soɔ no bɛhwe ase na ateneneefoɔ bɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm sɛ ahahan
deɛ ɔha ne fie bɛdi mframa na ogyimifoɔ bɛyɛ akoma mu nyansafoɔ akoa
ɔteneneeni aba yɛ nkwa dua na onyansafoɔ deɛ ɔnya akra tete atwerɛ a wɔgye to mu binom ka no sɛ na mmaratofoɔ sɛe akra
hwɛ sɛ wɔtua ɔteneneeni ka asase so a na nkantom ɔbɔnefoɔ ne omumuyɛfoɔ
deɛ ɔdɔ atenetene dɔ nimdeɛ na deɛ ɔtane animka di mmoasɛm
onipa pa nya awurade anim anisɔ na onipa busuyɛfoɔ deɛ ɔbu no fɔ
onipa remfa abɔnefosɛm so ntim na ateneneefoɔ nhini rempusu
ɔyepa yɛ ne kunu abotire na deɛ ɔka aniwusɛm te sɛ nnompe mu porɔ
teneneeni adwene tene na abɔnefoɔ agyinatuo deɛ ɛyɛ nkontompo
abɔnefoɔ nsɛm yɛ mogyatɛ na teefoɔ ano bɛyi wɔn
wɔbutu abɔnefoɔ na wɔnni hɔ na ateneneefoɔ fie deɛ ɛbɛgyina
onipa nimdeɛ so na wɔyi no ayɛ na deɛ wakyea n akoma no anim bɛgu ase
deɛ wɔmmu no nanso ɔwɔ akoa no yɛ sene deɛ ɔhyehyɛ ne ho na n aduane bɔ no
ɔteneneeni bu n afieboa kra na abɔnefoɔ ayamyɛ yɛ atirimuɔden
deɛ ɔdɔ n asase no didi mee na deɛ ɔdi nsɛnhunu akyire nni ti
ɔbɔnefoɔ pɛ deɛ nnipa bɔne anya na ateneneefoɔ nhini bɛso aba
ano mfomsoɔ yɛ fidie ma ɔbɔnefoɔ na ɔteneneeni bɛfiri ahohiahia mu
onipa anomu aba na ɔde bɛdi papa ameeɛ na onipa nsa ano adeɛ na wɔbɛdane ama no
ogyimifoɔ kwan tene n ani so na deɛ ɔtie afotuo yɛ onyansafoɔ
ogyimifoɔ abohuro da adi ntɛm na ɔbadwemma deɛ ɔkata aniwuo so
deɛ ɔka nokorɛ no ka deɛ ɛtene na ɔdansekurumfoɔ deɛ ɔtwa nkontompo
ɛwɔ deɛ ɔworo kasa sɛ nkrantɛ nwowɔeɛ na onyansafoɔ tɛkyerɛma sa yadeɛ
nokorɛ ano tim hɔ daa na tɛkyerɛma torofoɔ deɛ wɔnkyɛre koraa
nnaadaa wɔ wɔn a wɔdwene bɔne akoma mu na asomdwoeɛ ho afotufoɔ nya anigyeɛ
mmusuo biara rento ɔteneneeni na amaneɛ bɛhyɛ abɔnefoɔ ma
awurade akyiwadeɛ ne atorɔ ano na wɔn a wɔdi nokorɛ sɔ n ani
onipa niteɛfoɔ kora nimdeɛ na nkwaseafoɔ akoma pae agyimisɛm mu
nsiyɛfoɔ nsa bɛdi panin na aniha nsa bɛyi toɔ
onipa akoma mu awerɛhoɔ boto no na asɛmpa ma akoma tɔ yam
ɔteneneeni kyerɛ ne yɔnko kwan na abɔnefoɔ kwan ma wɔfom
onihafoɔ nsa nka ne hanam na nsiyɛfoɔ deɛ ɔnya onipa adeɛ a ne boɔ yɛ den
tenenee kwan so na nkwa wɔ na kwatikwan deɛ ɛkɔ owuo mu
ɔba nyansafoɔ tie agya atenetene na ɔfɛdifoɔ deɛ ɔntie ntwianimu
onipa anomu aba so na ɔdi nnepa na deɛ nkontompofoɔ kra pɛ ne mmusuo
deɛ ɔkora n ano hwɛ ne kra so na deɛ ɔtrɛ n anomu no nya ɔsɛeɛ
onihafoɔ kra kɔn dɔ na ɔnnya na nsiyɛfoɔ kra deɛ ɔbɛdɔre sradeɛ
ɔteneneeni tane atorosɛm na abɔnefoɔ yɛ aniwudeɛ ne ahohoradeɛ
tenenee kora deɛ ne kwan yɛ pɛ na abɔnefosɛm butu ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ
obi yɛ ne ho defoɔ nso na ɔnni hwee obi nso yɛ ne ho hiani nso na ɔwɔ adeɛ pii
obi kra agyedeɛ ne n ahonyadeɛ na ohiani deɛ ɔnte ntwianim
teneneefoɔ hann dɛre anigyeɛ na abɔnefoɔ kanea deɛ ɛbɛdum
ahantan de ntɔkwa nko na ɛba na wɔn a wɔtie afotuo deɛ nyansa ne wɔn te
ahonyadeɛ a ɛfiri ahuhudeɛ mu sua na deɛ ɔde ne nsa ano boaboa ano no ma no dɔ
anidasoɔ a ɛkyɛre muba ma akoma yare na anigyinadeɛ a ɛba mu yɛ nkwa dua
deɛ ɔbu asɛm animtia de ɔsɛeɛ ba ne ho so na deɛ ɔsuro mmara no deɛ ɔbɛnya akatua
onyansafoɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛ nkwa asutire sɛ onipa de bɛfiri owuo fidie mu
nimdeɛ pa ma onipa anim ba nyam na nkontompofoɔ kwan deɛ ɛyɛ aboabo
onitefoɔ yɛ n adeɛ nyinaa nimdeɛ mu na ɔkwasea deɛ ɔtrɛtrɛ n agyimisɛm mu
ɔbɔfoɔ bɔne hwe amaneɛ mu na ɔsomafoɔ nokwafoɔ deɛ ɔsa yadeɛ
ohia ne aniwuo ka deɛ ɔpo atenetene na deɛ ɔbu animka no nya animuonyam
akɔnnɔdeɛ a nsa aka yɛ ɔkra dɛ na bɔne mu fire yɛ nkwaseafoɔ akyiwadeɛ
ɛne anyansafoɔ mmɔ na dane onyansani na deɛ ɔne nkwaseafoɔ bɔ no hunu amane
bɔne ti nnebɔneyɛfoɔ na ateneneefoɔ deɛ ɔde papa tua wɔn ka
onipa pa gya n adeɛ ma mma mma na ɔdebɔneyɛni ahonyadeɛ deɛ wɔtia ma ɔteneneeni
ahiafoɔ mfuo ma aduane pii ba nanso atɛntenenee nni hɔ a wɔpra kɔ
deɛ ɔkora n abaa tane ne ba na deɛ ɔdɔ no no tene no ntɛm so
ɔteneneeni bɛdidi ama ne kra amee na abɔnefoɔ yafunu bɛda mpan
ɔbaa nyansafoɔ si ne dan na ɔbaa kwasea de ne nsa dwiri
deɛ ɔnante ne teeyɛ mu no suro awurade na deɛ ɔkyea n akwan no bu no animtia
ogyimifoɔ anomu na n ahokyerɛ abaa wɔ na anyansafoɔ ano kora wɔn
deɛ anantwie nnie hɔ no adidideɛ nso nni hɔ na nnɔbaeɛ pii wɔ nantwinini ahoɔden mu
ɔdanseni nokwafoɔ renni atorɔ na ɔdansekurumfoɔ ka atorosɛm
ɔfɛdifoɔ hwehwɛ nyansa nso ɔnnya na nimdeɛ nyɛ nhunumufoɔ nyana
firi ɔba kwasea nkyɛn kɔ na worenhunu nimdeɛ ano
onitefoɔ nyansa ne sɛ ɔhunu ne kwan mu na nkwaseafoɔ agyimisɛm yɛ nnaadaa
agyimifoɔ asodie ho afɔdeɛ yɛ ɔkwa na teefoɔ mu na anisɔ wɔ
akoma nim ne kra awerɛhoɔ na n anigyeɛ nso ɔhɔhoɔ mfa ne ho mfra mu
abɔnefoɔ fie bɛbutu na teefoɔ ntomadan bɛfefɛ
ɛwɔ ɔkwan bi a ɛtene onipa ani soɔ na n awieeɛ yɛ owuo kwan
sereɛ mu mpo akoma hunu yea na anigyeɛ no awieeɛ yɛ awerɛhoɔ
akoma mu kyirisanefoɔ akwan bɛmee no na onipa pa nso adeɛ bɛmee no
atetekwaa gye nsɛm nyinaa di na onitefoɔ hwɛ ne nanteɛ mu yie
onyansafoɔ suro na ɔsane firi bɔne ho na ɔkwasea de n ahodasoɔ fa mu
deɛ ne bo nkyɛre fuo di agyimisɛm na onipa a ɔpam apammɔne wɔtane no
ntetekwaa adeɛ a wɔdie ne agyimisɛm na anitefoɔ de nimdeɛ hyehyɛ wɔn ho
abɔnefoɔ bɛbrɛ wɔn ho ase apapafoɔ anim na abɔnefoɔ akoto ateneneefoɔ mmoboano
ohiani deɛ ne yɔnko mpo tane no na ɔdefoɔ adɔfo dɔɔso
deɛ ɔbu ne yɔnko animtia yɛ bɔne na nhyira ne deɛ ɔhunu amanehunufoɔ mmɔbɔ
wɔn a wɔbɔre asɛmmɔne mfom anaa na adom ne nokorɛ wɔ wɔn a wɔbɔre asɛmpa
ɔbrɛ nyinaa mu wɔ nnɔbaeɛ na anosɛm deɛ ohia ara nko
anyansafoɔ abotire ne wɔn ahodeɛ na nkwaseafoɔ deɛ wɔn agyimisɛm yɛ agyimisɛm ara nko
ɔdanseni nokwafoɔ gye nnipa nkwa na deɛ ɔdi atorɔ deɛ ɔtwa nkontompo
awurade suro mu wɔ ahodasoɔ a emu yɛ den na ɔbɛyɛ dwanekɔbea ama ne mma
awurade suro yɛ nkwa nsutire na wɔde kwati owuo fidie
ɔman dodoɔyɛ mu na ɔhene kɛseyɛ wɔ na nkurɔfoɔ sa a ɛma otitire yɛ mmɔbɔ pa ara
deɛ n abufuo yɛ nyaa no wɔ nteaseɛ pii na honhom mu katerekaterefoɔ ma agyimisɛm so
akoma mu dwoɔ yɛ honam nkwa na nitan yɛ nnompe mu porɔ
deɛ ɔhyɛ mmɔborɔni soɔ no gu ne yɛfoɔ anim ase na deɛ ɔhunu ohiani mmɔbɔ no ɔhyɛ no animuonyam
wɔsum ɔbɔnefoɔ twene ne bɔneyɛ mu na ɔteneneeni wɔ ne wuo mu anidasoɔ
nyansa te nhunumufoɔ tiri mu na deɛ ɛwɔ nkwaseafoɔ mu bɛda adi
tenenee nneyɛɛ ma ɔman so na bɔne deɛ ɛyɛ ɔman biara animguaseɛ
ɔhene ani sɔ akoa nimdefoɔ na ne bo fu deɛ ɔyɛ aniwudeɛ
mmuaeɛ bɔkɔɔ sianka anibereɛ na asɛmdenden hwanyan abufuo mu
anyansafoɔ tɛkyerɛma ma nimdeɛ yɛ dɛ na nkwaseafoɔ ano woro agyimisɛm
awurade ani wɔ mmaa nyinaa rehwɛ abɔnefoɔ ne apapafoɔ
tɛkyerɛmabereɛ yɛ nkwa dua na emu kyea yɛ honhom mu mmubuiɛ
ogyimifoɔ bu n agya atenetene animtia na deɛ ɔbu nkaanim no ani bɛte
ɔteneneeni fie wɔ ahodeɛ pii na ɔbɔnefoɔ nnɔbaeɛ mu wɔ anitane
anyansafoɔ ano pete nimdeɛ na nkwaseafoɔ akoma deɛ ɛntim
abɔnefoɔ afɔdeɛ yɛ awurade akyiwadeɛ na teefoɔ mpaebɔ deɛ ɛyɛ n anisɔdeɛ
ɔbɔnefoɔ kwan yɛ awurade akyiwadeɛ na deɛ ɔdi tenenee akyi na ɔdɔ no
ntea a emu yɛ den wɔ hɔ ma deɛ ɔpo ɔkwan no na deɛ ɔkyiri animka no bɛwu
asamando ne ɔsɛeɛ amena wɔ awurade anim na nkantom nnipa mma akoma
ɔfɛdifoɔ nnɔ deɛ ɔka n anim ɔnkɔ anyansafoɔ nkyɛn
anigyeɛ akoma ma anim te na akoma mu awerɛhoɔ bubu honhom
nhunumufoɔ akoma hwehwɛ nimdeɛ na nkwaseafoɔ ano di agyimisɛm
ɔmanehunufoɔ nna nyinaa yɛ bɔne na akoma pa te sɛ daa apontoɔ
awurade suro mu ade ketewa yɛ sene ahodeɛ pii a ɔhaw bata ho
ɛfan aduane a ɔdɔ wɔ mu yɛ sene nantwie a wadɔ na ɔtane wɔ mu
obufufafoɔ hwanyan ntɔkwa mu na abodwokyɛrefoɔ pata akayɛ
onihafoɔ kwan te sɛ nkasɛɛ ban na teefoɔ kwan yɛ petee
ɔba nyansafoɔ ma n agya ani gye na onipa kwasea deɛ ɔbu ne na animtia
agyimisɛm yɛ anigyeɛ ma deɛ ɔnni tire na nhunumu nipa tene ne nanteɛ
wɔkwati agyinakorɔ a tirimbɔ yɛ ɔkwa na agyinatufoɔ pii mu na ɛbɛgyina
onipa anomu mmuaeɛ yɛ anigyeɛ ma no na asɛm a wɔka no ne berɛ mu sɛdeɛ ɛsi yɛ
nkwa kwan kɔ ɔsoro ma onimdefoɔ na wakwati asamando a ɛwɔ aseɛ no
awurade dwiri ahantanfoɔ fie na ɔma okunafoɔ hyeɛ tim
ɔbɔne adwene yɛ awurade akyiwadeɛ na nsɛm a ɛyɛ dɛ ho te
amim mu mfasopɛfoɔ sɛe ne fie na deɛ ɔkyiri akyɛdeɛ bɛtena ase
ɔteneneeni akoma dwene mmuaeɛ ho na abɔnefoɔ ano woro nsɛmmɔne
awurade ne abɔnefoɔ ntam ware na ateneneefoɔ mpaebɔ deɛ ɔtie
aniwa so teɛ ma akoma tɔ yam atesɛm pa deɛ ɛma nnompe mu dɔre sradeɛ
aso a ɛtie nkwa animka no ɛbɛtena anyansafoɔ mu
deɛ ɔgyaa atenetene mu po ne kra na deɛ ɔtie animka no nya akoma
awurade suro ne nyansa atenetene na ahobrɛaseɛ di animuonyam anim
akoma mu nhyehyɛɛ yɛ onipa dea na tɛkyerɛma mmuaeɛ firi awurade
onipa akwan nyinaa so te n ani so na ahonhom karifoɔ ne awurade
fa wo nnwuma hyɛ awurade nsa na wo nhyehyɛɛ bɛtim
awurade yɛ ade nyinaa ma botaeɛ bi nti ɔbɔnefoɔ mpo ma da bɔne
obiara a ɔyɛ akoma mu dwɛɛ yɛ awurade akyiwadeɛ ampa ara ne ho renyɛ tɔtorɔtɔɔ
wɔde adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ kata amumuyɛ so na wɔde awurade suro kwati bɔne
sɛ onipa akwan sɔ awurade ani a ɔma n atamfo mpo ne no ntam ba asomdwoeɛ
tenenee mu ade ketewa yɛ sene nnɔbaeɛ pii a ɛmfiri tenenee mu
onipa akoma na ɛdwene ne kwan ho na awurade na ɔsisi n anammɔn
nkɔmhyɛ wɔ ɔhene anomu atemmuo mu nso n ano mfom
abrammoɔ ne nsania tee yɛ awurade dea fotoɔ mu aboɔ nyinaa yɛ ne nnwuma
ahemfo akyiwadeɛ ne abɔnefosɛm die na tenenee mu na akonnwa tim
ahemfo anisɔdeɛ ne ano tenenee na deɛ ɔka deɛ ɛtene no wɔdɔ no
ɔhene anibereɛ yɛ owuo abɔfoɔ na ɔba nyansafoɔ pata no
ɔhene animteɛ mu na nkwa wɔ na n anisɔ te sɛ bereamporɔberɛ mu mununkum
sɛdeɛ nyansanya yɛ sene sika fa ne nhunumunya sɛ wɔyi sene dwetɛ
teefoɔ tempɔn ne bɔne kwatie deɛ ɔhwɛ ne kwan kora ne kra
ahantan di ɔsɛeɛ anim na dwɛɛ honhom di asehweɛ kan
ɛyɛ sɛ wo ne mmɔborɔfoɔ nya ahobrɛaseɛ honhom sene sɛ wo ne ahokyerɛfoɔ bɛkyɛ asadeɛ
deɛ ɔdwene asɛm soɔ no hunu papa na nhyira ne deɛ ɔde ne ho to awurade soɔ
wɔfrɛ akoma mu nyansafoɔ sɛ nhunumufoɔ na ano dɛdɛ ma adenim dɔ
nimdeɛ yɛ nkwa nsutire ma deɛ ɔwɔ na agyimifoɔ deɛ wɔn asotwe ne wɔn agyimisɛm
onyansafoɔ akoma kyerɛ n ano nimdeɛ na ɛma adenim dɔ wɔ n anomu
nsɛm a ɛyɛ dɛ yɛ ɛwoɔkyɛm ɔkra adɔkɔdɔkɔwadeɛ ne nnompe nkwahosan
ɛwɔ ɔkwan bi a ɛtene wɔ onipa ani soɔ na mmom n awieeɛ yɛ owuo kwan
odwumayɛni kɔm yɛ adwuma ma no ɛfiri sɛ n ano piapia no
obusuyɛfoɔ bɔre bɔne na n ano te sɛ ogya a ɛhyehyeɛ
onipa kontonkyi hyɛ takrawɔgyam na asomsɛmkani tete nnamfo ntam
omimdifoɔ sisi ne yɔnko na ɔde no fa kwan a ɛnyɛ so
ɔmua n ani dwene akontonkyisɛm ho ɔwe n ano wie bɔneyɛ
abotire a ɛyɛ fɛ ne ɛdwono wɔhu no tenenee kwan so
deɛ ne bo kyɛre fuo no yɛ sene dɔmmarima na deɛ ɔdi ne honhom soɔ no sene deɛ ɔko fa kuro
srɛ so na wɔtwe tonto na atemmuo nyinaa firi awurade
kɔntɔmoa wesee a asomdwoeɛ wɔ mu yɛ sene efie a afɔrebɔdeɛ a wɔko ho ayɛ no ma
akoa nimdefoɔ bɛdi ɔba a ɔyɛ aniwudeɛ so na ɔbɛnya agyapadeɛ mu kyɛfa wɔ anuanom mu
kyɛmferɛ wɔ hɔ ma dwetɛ na fononoo wɔ hɔ ma sika na deɛ ɔsɔ akoma hwɛ ne awurade
ɔdebɔneyɛni tie ahuhudeɛ ano ɔtorofoɔ yɛ aso ma mmusubɔ tɛkyerɛma
deɛ ɔyi ohiani ahi gu ne yɛfoɔ anim ase deɛ n ani gye amaneɛ ho no ne ho renyɛ tɔtorɔtɔɔ
nkɔkoraa abotire ne mma mma na mma animuonyam ne wɔn agyanom
kasantrasoɔ mfata ogyegyentwie na nkantom sɛ atorɔ ano bɛfata ɔdehyeɛ
ayɛyɛ te sɛ aboɔden boɔ wɔ deɛ ɔnya no ani so baabiara a ɛfa no ɛma no yɛ yie
deɛ ɔkata mfomsoɔ soɔ no hwehwɛ ɔdɔ na deɛ ɔti asɛm mu no tete nnamfo ntam
nkaanim hyɛne nhunumufoɔ mu kyɛne sɛ wɔbɔ ɔkwasea mmaa ɔha
atuateɛ nko na ɔbɔne rehwehwɛ na wɔbɛsoma ɔbɔfoɔ tirimuɔdenfoɔ akɔ ne so
ma osisire a wɔafa ne mma nhyia wo mmom na ɛnyɛ ɔkwasea n agyimisɛm mu
deɛ ɔde bɔne hyɛ papa ananmu no bɔne rempa ne fie da
ntɔkwa mfitiaseɛ te sɛ nsuo ano tue enti ɔham mu nnya nyɛɛ den no gyae
deɛ ɔbu ɔbɔnefoɔ bem ne deɛ ɔbu ɔteneneeni fɔ no awurade akyiwadeɛ ne wɔn baanu nyinaa
adɛn nti na sika wɔ ɔkwasea nsam sɛ ɔde bɛtɔ nyansa berɛ a ɔnni tire
adamfo dɔ berɛ nyinaa mu na onua wɔwoo no maa ahohiahia
onipa a ɔnni tire na ɔdi akagyinamu na ɔdi ne ɔhɔhoɔ agyinamu
deɛ ɔpɛ ntɔkwa no pɛ mmarato deɛ ɔma ne dan ano korɔn mmorosoɔ no hwehwɛ n ankasa ne pira
akoma mu kontonkyifoɔ nhunu papa na tɛkyerɛma danedanefoɔ hwe bɔne mu
deɛ ɔwo ɔkwasea no ɔwo nya awerɛhoɔ na anigyeɛ biara nni hɔ mma ogyegyentwie agya
anigyeɛ akoma yɛ aduro pa na honhom a ɛdi yea no deɛ ɛwe nnompe mu
ɔbɔnefoɔ gye ayɛyɛdeɛ firi kokoam sɛ ɔrebɛdane atemmuo akwan ani
nyansa wɔ nhunumufoɔ anim na ɔkwasea deɛ n ani da asase ano nohoa
ɔba kwasea yɛ n agya awerɛhoɔ ne ne na a ɔwoo no bɔnwono
sɛ wɔgye ɔteneneeni hɔ mmaratodeɛ a ɛnyɛ na sɛ wɔhwe adɛɛfoɔ a ɛnyɛ koraa
deɛ ɔdodo ne nsɛm ho hunu nimdeɛ na deɛ ne honhom dwoɔ yɛ nhunumu nipa
ogyimifoɔ mpo ɔmua n ano a wɔbu no nyansafoɔ aane deɛ ɔka n ano tom no ɔyɛ nhunumuni
deɛ wate ne ho no hwehwɛ anoyie daa na adepa biara yɛ no ahi
ɔkwasea nni nhunumu ho anika na mmom sɛ ɔbɛyi n akoma adie
ɔbɔnefoɔ ba a animtiabuo nso ba na adapaa ne ahohora na ɛnam
nsuo a emu dɔ ne ɔbarima anomu nsɛm asutene a ɛba yie ne nyansa abura
ɛnyɛ sɛ wɔhwɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ anim na wɔdane ɔteneneeni asɛm ani atemmuo mu
ɔkwasea ano ma ntɔkwa ba na n afono frɛfrɛ asotorɔ
ɔkwasea ano ne ne sɛeɛ na n anofafa ne ne kra fidie
asomkasani nsɛm te sɛ mfremfremadeɛ na ɛsiane kɔ ɔyafunu mpia mu
deɛ ɔtoto n adwuma aseɛ nso ɔdesɛefoɔ nua ne no
aban denden ne awurade din ɛno mu na ɔteneneeni dwane korɔ na wɔkora no
ɔdefoɔ ahonyadeɛ ne ne kuro a ɛyɛ den na ɛte sɛ ɔfasuo a ɛkorɔn n adwene mu
deɛ ɛdi ɔsɛeɛ anim ne sɛ ɔbarima akoma a ɛma ne ho soɔ na deɛ ɛdi animuonyam anim ne ahobrɛaseɛ
deɛ ɔbua asɛm ansa na ɔteɛ no ɛyɛ agyimisɛm ne aniwuo ma no
onipa honhom tumi soa yadeɛ na honhom a ɛdi yea deɛ hwan na ɔbɛtumi asoa
nhunumufoɔ akoma nya nimdeɛ na anyansafoɔ aso hwehwɛ nimdeɛ akyiri kwan
onipa ayɛyɛdeɛ bɔ kwan ma no na ɛde no ba nnipa akɛseɛ anim
deɛ ɔbɔ ne nkuro kane yɛ sɛ ɔteneneeni kɔsi sɛ ne yɔnko ba bɛpeepee mu
ntonto pata ntɔkwa na ɛpae atumfoɔ ntam
onua a wɔafom no sene kuro denden na ntɔkwa te sɛ abankɛseɛ akyiri adaban
ɔbarima anomu aba ma ne yafunu mee n anomu nnɔbaeɛ mee no
owuo ne nkwa wɔ tɛkyerɛma tumi so na deɛ ɔdɔ no no bɛdi n aba
deɛ wanya yerɛ no wanya adepa na wanya awurade hɔ anisɔ
kyɛwpa na ohiani de kasa na ɔdefoɔ bua asɛmdenden
deɛ ɔfa nnamfo pii no de sɛe ɔno ara ne ho nanso adamfo bi wɔ hɔ a ɔfam ho sene onua
ohiani a ɔnam ne pɛyɛ mu yɛ sene deɛ ɔkyea n anomu nsɛm na ɔyɛ kwasea
ɔkra a nimdeɛ abɔ no nyɛ na deɛ ne nan ase yɛ herɛ no yɛ bɔne
onipa agyimisɛm kyinkyim ne kwan na n akoma huri tia awurade
ahonya ma obi nya nnamfo pii na mmɔborɔni ne ne yɔnko ntam tete
ɔdansekurumfoɔ ho renyɛ tɔtorɔtɔɔ na deɛ ɔhu atorosɛm no rennya adwaneyɛ
nnipa pii dɛfɛdɛfɛ ɔdɛɛfoɔ na nnipa nyinaa yɛ ɔyamyiefoɔ nnamfo
ohiani nuanom nyinaa tane no na nkantom sɛ ne nnamfonom ne ne ntam rentwe ɔde nsɛm ti wɔn a ɔnto wɔn
deɛ ɔnya nyansa no dɔ ne kra deɛ ɔbu nhunumu no ɔhunu papa
ɔdansekurumfoɔ ho renyɛ tɔtorɔtɔɔ na deɛ ɔhu atorosɛm no bɛyera
taamudie mfata ɔkwasea na mprɛ ahe na akoa bɛdi mpanimfoɔ soɔ
onipa nimdeɛ twentwɛn n abufuo ase na mfomsoɔ ho twa yɛ no animuonyam
ɔhene abufuo te sɛ gyata mmobom na n anisɔ te sɛ wira so bosuo
ɔba kwasea yɛ n agya mmusuo na ɔbaa ntɔkwako yɛ daa nsuo a ɛsosɔ
efie ne ahodeɛ yɛ agyanom awunnyadeɛ na ɔyere nimdefoɔ firi awurade
aniha yɛ nnahɔɔ na onipa kwadwofoɔ bɛdi kɔm
deɛ ɔkora mmara asɛm no kora ne kra na deɛ ɔnhwɛ n akwan yie no bɛwu
deɛ ɔhunu mmɔborɔni mmɔborɔ de fɛm awurade na deɛ ɔde ama no ɔbɛhyɛ no ananmu
anidasoɔ wɔ hɔ yi tea wo ba na mmɔ wo tirim sɛ wobɛku no
deɛ n abufuo so no bɛnya asotwe na sɛ wogyaa no a wobɛsane agyaa no bio
tie afotuo na gye atenetene na woahunu nyansa w akyirinna mu
adwene pii wɔ onipa akoma mu nanso awurade agyinatuo na ɛbɛgyina
onipa adɔeɛyɛ na ɛma wɔdɔ no na ohiani yɛ sene ɔtorofoɔ
awurade suro de obi kɔ nkwa mu deɛ ɔkura mu no bɛmee ada na bɔne biara renka no
ɔkwadwofoɔ de ne nsa to ayowa mu na ɔnsane mfa nkɔ n anomu mpo
bɔ ɔfɛdifoɔ na atetekwaa ani bɛte na ka nhunumufoɔ anim na wahunu nimdeɛ mu
deɛ ɔbɔ n agya atirimuɔden na ɔpamo ne na no yɛ aniwuo ne ahohora ba
me ba wogyae atenetene tie a wobɛfom afiri nimdeɛ nsɛm ho bio
ɔdansehuhuni di atemmuo ho fɛw na abɔnefoɔ ano mene mmusuo
wɔasiesie atemmuo ama afɛdifoɔ ne mmaabɔ ama nkwaseafoɔ akyi
nsa yɛ ɔfɛdifoɔ nsaden yɛ ntɔkwapɛni na obiara a ɔtɔ mu ntintan no nnim nyansa
ɔhene ho hu te sɛ gyata mmobom deɛ ɔyi no abufuo no yɛ ne kra bɔne
ɛyɛ ɔbarima animuonyam sɛ ɔtwe ne ho firi ɔham mu na agyimifoɔ deɛ wɔpɛ ntɔkwa
awɔ nti ɔkwadwofoɔ mfuntum twaberɛ mu ɔbɛhwehwɛ biribi nanso ɔrennya hwee
ɔbarima akoma mu agyinatuo te sɛ nsuo a emu dɔ nso deɛ ɔwɔ nhunumu bɛsa
nnipa bebree ka wɔn ara adɔeɛyɛ na ɔbarima nokwafoɔ deɛ hwan na ɔbɛhu no
ɔteneneeni a ɔnam ne pɛyɛ mu wɔbɛhyira ne mma wɔ n akyi
ɔhene a ɔte asennie adwa soɔ de n aniwa huhu bɔne nyinaa so
hwan na ɔbɛka sɛ mate no m akoma mu me ho afi afiri me bɔne ho
abrammoɔ ahodoɔ susukodoɔ ahodoɔ ne mmienu nyinaa yɛ awurade akyiwadeɛ
abɔfra mpo wɔde ne nneyɛɛ na ɛhu no sɛ n adeyɛ bɛyɛ yie na atene
aso a ɛteɛ ne aniwa a ɛhunu awurade na ɔyɛɛ ne mmienu nyinaa
mpɛ nna na woanni hia bue w ani na aduane bɛmee wo
ɛnyɛ ɛnyɛ sɛ ɔdetɔfoɔ seɛ ne no na ɔdane ne ho kɔ a na ɔrehoahoa ne ho
sika wɔ hɔ na nhwene pa pii wɔ hɔ na kasa a nimdeɛ wɔ mu no te sɛ adwinneɛ a ne boɔ yɛ den
deɛ ɔdi ɔhɔhoɔ agyinamu no fa ne ntoma na deɛ ɔdi ɔnanani akagyinamu no gye no awowa
aduane a wɔnam nnaadaa so nya yɛ obi dɛ nanso akyire yi no mmoseaa yɛ n anomu ma
wɔde agyinatuo na ɛma tirimbɔ gyina na fa atɛmpa kyekyere ɔsa
deɛ ɔkyini di nsekuro no yi ahuntasɛm adi enti mfa wo ho mmɔ deɛ ɔtrɛ n anomu
deɛ ɔdome n agya ne ne na no ne kanea bɛdum esum kabii mu
agyapadeɛ a wɔde ntɛmpɛ nya no mfitiaseɛ no akyire renwie nhyira
nka sɛ mɛhyɛ bɔne ananmu twɛn awurade na ɔbɛboa wo
awurade akyiwadeɛ ne abrammoɔ ahodoɔ na nsisie nsania nso nyɛ
onipa anammɔntutuo firi awurade na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na ɔbɛhunu n akwan mu
ɛyɛ fidie ma onipa sɛ ɔbɛpɛ ntɛm aka sɛ ɛyɛ ade kronkron na ɔbɛhyɛ bɔ ansa na wabisabisa mu
ɔhene nyansafoɔ hu abɔnefoɔ so na ɔde teaseɛnam nan fa wɔn so
awurade kanea ne onipa ahome ɛhwehwɛ yam mpia mu hwɛ
adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ hwɛ ɔhene so na adɔeɛ so na n adwa tim
mmeranteɛ animuonyam ne wɔn ahoɔden na nkɔkoraa ahoɔfɛ ne ɛdwono
mmaa a ɛpira twi ɔbɔne ho na ɛhweɛ hyɛne yam mpia mu
ɔhene akoma te sɛ asutene awurade nsam baabiara a ɔpɛ no na ɔdane korɔ
onipa kwan biara tene n ani so nanso akoma karifoɔ ne awurade
asɛnteneneedie ne atɛntenenee sɔ awurade ani sene afɔrebɔ
ani a ɛtra ntɔn ne akoma a ɛhoran mekyerɛ abɔnefoɔ kwan no deɛ ɛyɛ bɔne
nsiyɛfoɔ adwene de adedodoɔ ara na ɛba na obiara a ɔpere ho no ɛde kɔ ohia nko mu
ademudeɛ a wɔde atorɔ tɛkyerɛma anya yɛ ahuhuo a ahu korɔ wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ no hwehwɛ owuo
abɔnefoɔ akakabensɛm de wɔn kɔ ɛfiri sɛ wɔpo atemmuo
ɔbarima a ɛso da ne soɔ kwan kyea na deɛ ne ho teɛ adwuma yɛ tee
ɛdan atifi kokoam tena yɛ sene sɛ wo ne ɔbaa tɔkwapɛfoɔ bɛtena ɛdan mu
ɔbɔnefoɔ kra kɔn dɔ bɔne ne yɔnko anim nyɛ nyam n ani so
sɛ wɔtea fɛdifoɔ a atetekwaa hunu nyansa na onyansafoɔ yiedie mu na ɔnya nimdeɛ
ɔteneneeni gyene n ani hwɛ abɔnefoɔ fie sɛdeɛ wɔka abɔnefoɔ guo sɛe wɔn
deɛ ɔsi n aso firi mmɔborɔfoɔ su ho no ɔno nso bɛsu afrɛ na wɔrennye no so
kokoam adekyɛ pata abufuo na kokom adanmudeɛ dwodwo abufuhyeɛ
ɛyɛ ɔteneneeni anigyeɛ sɛ ɔbɛdi asɛntenenee na ɛyɛ hu ma amumuyɛfoɔ
onipa a ɔfom firi nimdeɛ kwan soɔ no bɛtena nsamanfoɔ asafo mu
deɛ ɔdɔ anigyeɛ bɛdi hia deɛ ɔdɔ nsa ne ngo rennya adeɛ
ɔbɔnefoɔ bɛyɛ ɔteneneeni agyedeɛ na nkontomponi bɛsi teefoɔ ananmu
anwea pradada asase so tena yɛ sene ɛyerɛ nwiinwiifoɔ a ne bo nnwo no nkyɛn tena
ademudeɛ a ɛsom boɔ ne ngo wɔ onyansafoɔ tenabea na ɔkwasea deɛ ɔsɛe no
deɛ ɔdi tenenee ne adɔeɛ akyire no ɔbɛnya nkwa tenenee ne animuonyam
onyansafoɔ foro nnɔmmarima kuro na ɔsum ahoɔden a wɔde wɔn ho too soɔ no twene
deɛ ɔkora n ano ne ne tɛkyerɛma no ɔkora ne kra firi ahohia mu
ɔhantanni a wahuhuro ne din de ɔfɛdifoɔ ɔdi n asɛm ahantan ntrasoɔ mu
ɔkwadwofoɔ akɔnnɔ ku no ɛfiri sɛ ne nsa nsɔ adeɛ mu
obi wɔ hɔ a n ani bere adeɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ daa nyinaa na ɔteneneeni deɛ ɔma na ɔnnodo ho
abɔnefoɔ afɔrebɔ yɛ akyiwadeɛ na nkantom sɛ ɔde bɛfa adwemmɔne mu aba
adansefoɔ atorofoɔ bɛyera na onipa a ɔtie asɛm ɔkasa daa
onipa bɔnefoɔ kum n anim na ɔteefoɔ deɛ ɔtaataa n akwan
nyansa ne nhunumu ne afotuo biara nni hɔ a ɛne awurade bɛdi asie
wɔsiesie ɔpɔnkɔ ma ko da na nkonimdie deɛ ɛwɔ awurade nsam
din pa na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyie sene ahonyadeɛ pii na animuonyam yɛ sene dwetɛ ne sika
ɔdefoɔ ne ohiani hyia deɛ ɔyɛɛ wɔn nyinaa ne awurade
onitefoɔ hunu bɔne a ɛbɛba na ɔde ne ho hunta nanso adwenemharefoɔ deɛ wɔkɔhyɛ mu na wɔnya asotwe
deɛ ɛdi ahobrɛaseɛ ne awurade suro akyire ne ahonyadeɛ ne animuonyam ne nkwa
nkasɛɛ ne afidie wɔ okontonkyini kwan so nanso deɛ ɔkora ne kra ne wɔn ntam bɛtwe
kyerɛ abɔfra ɛkwan a ɔmfa soɔ na sɛ ɔnyini a ɔremfiri ho
ɔdefoɔ di ahiafoɔ so na ɔdefɛmni yɛ deɛ ɔde fɛm akoa
deɛ ɔdua amumuyɛ no bɛtwa mmusuo na n anibereɛ abaa bɛhi
oyamyiefoɔ nya nhyira na ɔde n aduane bi ma mmɔborɔni
pamo fɛdifoɔ na ntɔkwa bɛfiri adi na akasakasa ne nsopa to atwa
deɛ ɔdɔ akoma mu teɛ na n anomu kasa yɛ dɛ no n adamfo ne ɔhene
awurade ani kora onimdefoɔ na ɔbutu ɔkɔnkɔnsani asɛm
ɔkwadwofoɔ se gyata wɔ adihɔ wɔbɛku me mmorɔno so
mmaa asansafoɔ ano yɛ amena donkodonko deɛ awurade apo no no bɛhwe mu
agyimisɛm kyekyere abɔfra akoma ho atenetene abaa bɛma no afiri ne ho
deɛ ɔhyɛ mmɔborɔni soɔ de dɔre n adeɛ anaa ɔde n adeɛ ma ɔdefoɔ no hia na ɛbɛhia no
brɛ w aso ase tie anyansafoɔ kasa na fa w akoma to me nimdeɛ so
na ɛyɛ fɛ sɛ wode bɛsie wo yam na ne nyinaa abom afam w ano
deɛ ɛbɛyɛ na wode wo ho ato awurade soɔ no merema woahunu nnɛ wo ara
menkyerɛɛ wo nsɛnkunini aduasa afotuo ahodoɔ ne nimdeɛ mu
sɛ mɛma woahunu nokorɛ nsɛm asetim na wode nokwasɛm akɔbua wɔn a wɔsoma woɔ no anaa
mmɔ mmɔborɔni korɔno sɛ ɔyɛ mmɔborɔni nti na ntiatia amanehununi so kuro pono mu
na awurade bɛdi wɔn asɛm ama wɔn na wɔn a wɔfom wɔn fa no ɔbɛfom wɔn kra afa
ɛne obufufafoɔ mmfa yɔnkoɔ na ɛne ɔbarima niberefoɔ mmmɔ
na woansua n akwan na woannya fidie amma wo kra
nyɛ wɔn a wɔdi agyinamu no mu bi wɔn a wɔdi akagyinamu no
sɛ wonni biribi a wode bɛtua a adɛn nti na ɔnnye w ase kɛtɛ no
ntwe tete hyeɛ a w agyanom abɔ ato hɔ no
woahunu onipa a ɔyɛ nsi wɔ n adwuma ho ɔno na ɔbɛgyina ahemfo anim na ɔrennyina mpapahwekwaa anim
sɛ wotena ase ne ɔberempɔn rebɛdidi a susu deɛ ɛwɔ w anim no ho yie
na sɛ woyɛ odufudepɛfoɔ a ɛte sɛ wode sekan reto mene mu
mma wo kɔn nnnɔ n adɔkɔdɔkɔwadeɛ na ɛyɛ nnaadaa aduane
mmiri wo mogya ani mpɛ ahonyadeɛ gyae wo nhunumu yi akyiridie
wode w ani bɛsi deɛ ɛnni hɔ so anaa na ahonyadeɛ fu ntaban tu sɛ ɔkɔdeɛ a ɔtu kɔ soro
nni deɛ ɔwɔ ani bɔne aduane na mma wo kɔn nnnɔ n adɔkɔdɔkɔwadeɛ
na sɛdeɛ ɔdwene ne mu no sɛ ɔteɛ ne no ɔse wo sɛ didi na nom nanso n akoma nni wo ho
afono ma a woadie no wobɛfe na woayera wo nsɛm dɛdɛ no
nkasa ngu ɔkwasea aso mu na ɔbɛbu wo kasa mu nimdeɛ no animtia
ntwe tete hyeɛ na nhyɛne nwisiaa mfuo mu
na wɔn gyefoɔ no yɛ otumfoɔ ɔbɛdi wɔn asɛm ama wɔn atia wo
fa w akoma bra atentene ho na fa w aso bra nimdeɛ nsɛm ho
mfa atenetene nkame abɔfra na wode abaa hwe no a ɔrenwu
sɛ wode abaa hwe no a ɛno na wobɛgye ne kra afiri asamando
me ba sɛ w akoma hunu nyansa a me ara nso m akoma bɛtɔ me yam
na me kra ho bɛsɛpɛ no sɛ w ano reka deɛ ɛtene
mma w akoma mmpere wo nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ho na wo deɛ tena awurade suro mu daa nyinaa
na ampa ara akyire asɛm wɔ hɔ na wɔrentwa w anidasoɔ no ntwene
me ba wo deɛ tie na hunu nyansa na tene w akoma kɔ ɔkwan no so
mfra sadweamfoɔ wɔn a wɔsɛe wɔn honam no mu
na ɔsadweam ne potwaafoɔ bɛdi hia na nkotɔ de ntomago fira onipa
tie w agya ɔno na ɔwoo woɔ na wo na sɛ ɔbɔ aberewa a mmu no animtia
tɔ nokorɛ na ntɔn tɔ nyansa ne atenetene ne nhunumu nso
ahurisie na ɔteneneeni agya bɛdie na deɛ ɔwoo onyansafoɔ no ani gye ne ho
ma w agya ne wo na ani nnye na deɛ ɔwoo woɔ no nni ahurisie
me ba fa w akoma ma me na ma m akwan nsɔ w ani
na odwamamfoɔ yɛ amena donkodonko na ɔbaa sansani yɛ abura hihiaa
ɔtɛ nso sɛ ɔkwanmukani na ɔma nnipa mu nkɔnkɔnsafoɔ dɔɔso
hwan na ɔwɔ amaneɛ mu hwan na ɔwɔ awerɛhoɔ mu hwan na ɔwɔ ntɔkwako ne abooboodie hwan na ɔwɔ apirapira hunu ne ani a abereɛ
wɔn a wɔkyɛre nsa ho wɔn a wɔkɔka mfrasa hwɛ
nhwɛ nsa sɛ ɛbere kɔɔ no na ani twa kuruwa mu na ɛkɔ yɔɔ no
akyire yi no ɛka sɛ ɔwɔ na ɛwɔ borɔ sɛ ahuritia
w ani bɛhwɛ ananadeɛ na w akoma aka akontonkyisɛm
na woayɛ sɛ deɛ ɔda po mfimfini ne deɛ ɔda hyɛn nnua atifi
na woaka sɛ wɔde adeɛ bɔɔ me ante me wɔpem me mante menyane ara pɛ a mɛkɔ so mapɛ akyiri kwan ara
mma wo ho mmpere wo abɔnefoɔ ho na mma wo kɔn nnnɔ sɛ wo ne wɔn bɛtena
na wɔn akoma dwene ɔsɛeɛ ho na wɔn ano ka mmusuo
wɔde nyansa na ɛsi dan na wɔde nhunumu ma no gyina
na wɔnam nimdeɛ so de ahodeɛ aboɔdenneɛ afɛfɛdeɛ nyinaa hyɛ mpia mama
ɔbarima nyansafoɔ wɔ ahoɔden na ɔba nimdefoɔ ma ne tumi mu yɛ den
atɛmpa na fa kyekyere wo sa na nkonim wɔ agyinatufoɔ dodoɔ mu
nyansa korɔn papa ma ogyimifoɔ ɔmmue n ano kuro pono mu
deɛ ɔdwene bɔneyɛ ho no wɔfrɛ no ɔkɔtwebrɛfoɔ
agyimisɛm tirimbɔ yɛ bɔne na nnipa akyiwadeɛ ne ɔfɛdifoɔ
wo nsa mu go ahohiahia da mu a w ahoɔden sua
gye wɔn a wɔtwe wɔn kɔ owuo mu na sɛ wɔtɔ ekum kwan so ntintan a sianka wɔn ɛ
sɛ wose hwɛ na yɛnnim yei a deɛ ɔkari akoma no nhunu mu na deɛ ɔkora wo kra no nnim anaa na ɔbɛtua onipa ka sɛdeɛ ne nneyɛɛ teɛ
di ɛwoɔ me ba na ɛyɛ ne ɛwoɔkyɛm a ɛyɛ wo dodom dɛ
saa na bu nyansa ma wo kra sɛ wohunu a ɛso akatua bɛba daakye na wɔrentwa w anidasoɔ no ntwene
ɔbɔnefoɔ ntɛ ɔteneneeni fie na nsɛe ne homebea
na mprɛnson na ɔteneneeni hwe ase na ɔsɔreɛ na abɔnefoɔ deɛ amanehunu hwe wɔn ase
wo tamfo hwe ase a mma w ani nnnye na ɔwatiri a mma w akoma nnni ahurisie
na awurade anhunu na anyɛ n ani so bɔne na wannane n abufuo amfiri ne so
nha wo ho nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ho na mma w ani mmmere abɔnefoɔ
na akyire asefoɔ nni hɔ mma ɔbɔne abɔnefoɔ kanea bɛdum
me ba suro awurade ne ɔhene mfa wo ho mmɔ atuatefoɔ ho
na mpofirim na amaneɛ firi wɔn hɔ bɛba na ɔsɛeɛ a ɛbɛfiri wɔn baanu hɔ no hwan na ɔnim
yeinom nso yɛ anyansafoɔ dea atemmuo mu animhwɛ nyɛ
deɛ ɔse ɔbɔnefoɔ sɛ wotene no aman bɛdome no na amanaman bɛkyiri no
na wɔn a wɔtwe aso no bɛdi yie na wɔn so na nhyira pa bɛba
deɛ ɔma mmuaeɛ pa no te sɛ deɛ ɔfe ano
siesie w adwuma wɔ baabi na toto wo biribiara w asase so na ɛno akyiri no woakyekyere wo fie
nni wo yɔnko ho adanse hunu na mfa w ano nnaadaa
nka sɛ sɛ ɔyɛɛ me no saa ara na mɛyɛ no mmɛtua no deɛ wayɛ no so ka
mesianee ɔbarima kwadwofoɔ afuo ne onipa a ɔnni tire bobeturo ho
na hwɛ na ne nyinaa afu nsansono na ahyehyewonsa akata ani na ɛho aboɔ fasuo abubu agu
ɛnna mehwɛeɛ na medwenee ho yie mehunui na mefaa mu nyansa
nna kakra nkotɔ kakra nsa a mɛpono mada kakra
ɛnna wo hia nam so bɛba sɛ odwotwafoɔ ne w ahokyere sɛ ɛkyɛmkurani
yei nso ne salomo mmebusɛm bi a yudahene hesekia nnipa fa twerɛeɛ
nyankopɔn animuonyam ne asɛm so kata na ahemfo animuonyam ne asɛm mu hwehwɛ
ɔsoro ware a ɛwareɛ ne asase mu dɔ a ɛdɔ ne ahemfo akoma mu nni hwehwɛbea
yi fi dwetɛ mu na agudeɛ firi odwumfoɔ nsam aba
yi ɔbɔnefoɔ firi ɔhene anim na n ahennwa bɛtim tenenee mu
nhyehyɛ wo ho ɔhene anim na nkɔgyina nnipa akɛseɛ gyinabea
na ɛyɛ sɛ wɔka kyerɛ wo sɛ bra soro ha sene sɛ wɔbɛbrɛ wo aseɛ ɔberempɔn a w ani ahu no no anim
mfiri hatuhatu nkɔko na ɛbɛwie akyire yi no wobɛyɛ dɛn sɛ wo yɔnko de wo ato aniwuo mu
asɛm a wo ne wo yɔnko wɔ no wo ne no nni na nyi obi ahuntasɛm adi
na deɛ ɔbɛteɛ no annidi wo atɛm na wo nsopa anka hɔ
asɛm a wɔka a ɛfata te sɛ sika aduaba wɔ dwetɛ nkɛntɛn mu
sɛdeɛ sika asomuadeɛ ne sika amapa ahyehyɛdeɛ teɛ no saa na onimkafoɔ nyansafoɔ teɛ wɔ aso a ɛte asɛm soɔ
sɛdeɛ sukyerɛmma dwoɔ teɛ twaberɛ mu no saa na ɔbɔfoɔ nokwafoɔ teɛ ma wɔn a wɔsomaa no na ɔdwodwo ne wuranom kra
deɛ ɔde akyɛdeɛ a ɔmmaeɛ hoahoa ne ho no te sɛ mununkum ne mframa a osuo nni mu
abodwokyɛre dane ɔtemmufoɔ ti na tɛkyerɛmabereɛ bu dompe mu
wohunu ɛwoɔ a di deɛ ɛso woɔ na amfono wo na woamfe angu
mma wo nan nnyɛ wo yɔnko fie ntiantia na wo ho anyɛ no mfone na wantane wo
asabaa ne nkrantɛ ne agyan nnamnnam ne onipa a ɔdi ne yɔnko ho adansekurumu
ɔkɔnkɔnsani so anidasoɔ hiada mu te sɛ ɛse a abuo ne nan a afirikyie
deɛ ɔto dwom kyerɛ ɔwerɛhoni no te sɛ deɛ ɔpa ntoma awɔberɛ mu anaa nsa kekakeka a wɔde gu dɔw soɔ
sɛ ɛkɔm de wo tamfo a ma no aduane nni na sukɔm de no a ma no nsuo nnom
na wobɛso nsramma agu n atifi na awurade bɛhyɛ wo ananmu
atifi fam mframa de osuo ba saa ara nso na ntwirie tɛkyerɛma de abufunimu ba
ɛdan atifi kokoam tena yɛ sene sɛ wo ne ɔbaa tɔkwapɛfoɔ bɛtena ɛdan mu
sɛdeɛ nsuonwunu yɛ ɔkra a atɔ piti no sɛ asɛmpa a ɛfiri akyirikyiri asase soɔ yɛ ne no
sɛdeɛ nsuo aniwa a wɔatiatia mu ne abura a wɔasɛeɛ no teɛ no saa na ɔteneneeni a ɔtɔ ɔbɔnefoɔ anim ntintan teɛ
ɛwoɔdie ntrasoɔ nyɛ enti animuonyam a nnipa pɛ ma wɔn ho nyɛ animuonyam
onipa a ɔntumi nhyɛ ne ho so no te sɛ kuro a abubuo a afasuo nni ho
sɛ ahuhuberɛ mu sukyerɛmma ne twaberɛ mu nsuo teɛ no sɛ animuonyam mfata ɔkwasea ne no
sɛdeɛ apatuprɛ kyini na asomfenakatakyi tuo no saa ara na nnuabɔ hunu remma mu
pɔnkɔabaa fata ɔpɔnkɔ nnareka fata afunumu ɛnna abaa nso fata ɔkwasea akyire
mmua ɔkwasea n agyimisɛm so na wo nso woanyɛ sɛ ɔno
bua ɔkwasea wɔ n agyimisɛm so na wanyɛ n ani so onyansafoɔ
deɛ ɔde asɛm soma ɔkwasea no twitwa ɔno ara ne nan na ɔnom mmusuo
sɛdeɛ apakye nan sensɛne hɔ no sɛdeɛ nkwaseafoɔ anomu abebusɛm teɛ ne no
sɛdeɛ abohene boaa teɛ aboɔkuo soɔ no sɛ deɛ ɔhyɛ ɔkwasea animuonyam teɛ ne no
sɛdeɛ nkasɛɛ poma teɛ wɔ nsaboni nsam no sɛ nkwaseafoɔ anomu abebusɛm teɛ ne no
deɛ ɔbɔ ɔkwasea ne anantefoɔ paa no te sɛ agyantoni a ɔpira nnipa nyinaa
sɛdeɛ ɔkraman sane kɔ ne feɛ ho no sɛ ɔkwasea ti n agyimisɛm mu ne no
wohunu onipa a ɔyɛ ɔno ara n ani so nyansafoɔ a anidasoɔ wɔ hɔ ma ɔkwasea sene no
ɔkwadwofoɔ se ɛserɛ mu sɛe wɔ ɔkwan mu gyata wɔ mmɔntene so
sɛdeɛ ɛpono dane ne ho ne mpontɛre soɔ no saa ara na ɔkwadwofoɔ nso yɛ wɔ ne kɛtɛ soɔ
ɔkwadwofoɔ de ne nsa bɔ ayowa mu ɛyɛ n ani ha sɛ ɔde bɛhyɛ n anomu
ɔkwadwofoɔ yɛ n ani so nyansafoɔ sene nnipa baason a wɔkyerɛ adeɛ a ɛsɛ
deɛ ɔretwam na ɔde ne ho fra asɛm a ɛmfa ne ho mu te sɛ deɛ ɔsɔ ɔkraman aso mu
sɛdeɛ ɔbɔdamfoɔ a ɔto nnyansramma agyan ne owuo teɛ no
sɛ onipa a ɔgyegye ne yɔnko na ɔka sɛ agorɔ na meredie teɛ ne no
nnyina sa a ogya dum na sɛ asomsɛmkani nni hɔ a tɔkwa to twa
sɛdeɛ gyabidie ma nsramma na nnyina ma ogya no saa ara na ɔbarima tɔkwapɛfoɔ ma ɔko ano sɔ
asomsɛmkani nsɛm te sɛ mfremfremadeɛ na ɛsiane kɔ yam mpia mu
ano fremfrem ne amumuyɛ akoma te sɛ dwetɛ fi a wɔde adura kuruwago ho
deɛ ɔtane obie no de n ano kyerɛ asɛm bi na ne mu deɛ ɔsiesie nkontompo
sɛ ɔka adɔkɔdɔkɔsɛm a nnye no nni na akyiwadeɛ nson wɔ n akomam
nitan de nnaadaa kata ne ho nanso asafo mu wɔbɛyi ne bɔne adi
deɛ ɔtu amena bɛhwe ɛno ara mu na deɛ ɔmuni ɔboɔ no ɛbɛsane aba ne so
tɛkyerɛma torofoɔ tane wɔn a apira wɔn na ano a ɛdɛfɛdɛfɛ de ɔsɛeɛ ba
mfa ɔkyena nhoahoa wo ho na wonnim deɛ ɛda no de bɛba
ma obi nyi wo ayɛ na ɛnyɛ w ano ɔhɔhoɔ na ɛnyɛ w anofafa
ɔboɔ yɛ duru na anwea yɛ dompee nanso ogyimifoɔ abufuo yɛ duru sene ne mmienu nyinaa
anibereɛ yɛ atirimuɔden na abufuo yɛ ahometedeɛ na hwan na ɔbɛtumi agyina ninkuntwe anim
animka petee yɛ sene ɔdɔ a ahunta
ɔdɔfoɔ pira yɛ nokorɛ na ɔtamfoɔ mfeano yɛ nsisie
ɔkra a wameeɛ tia ɛwokyɛm so na ɔkra a ɛkɔm de no deɛ deɛ ɛyɛ nwono biara yɛ no dɛ
sɛdeɛ anomaa a ɔfiri ne pirebuo mu kyini teɛ no saa na onipa a ɔfiri ne tenaberɛ kɔkyini teɛ ne no
ngo ne aduhwam ma akomatɔyam saa ara na onipa adamfo atirimsɛmdie dɛ nso yɛ
nnya w adamfo ne w agya adamfo na w amanehunu da nhyɛne wo nua fie wo fipamfoɔ a ɔbɛn yɛ sene onua a ɔwɔ akyirie
me ba yɛ onyansafoɔ na ma m akoma ntɔ me yam na manya asɛm mabua deɛ ɔbɔ me ahohora
onitefoɔ hunu bɔne a ɛbɛba na ɔde ne ho hunta nanso adwenemharefoɔ de ne ho hyɛ mu na wɔnya asotwe
deɛ ɔgyina ɔhɔhoɔ akyire no fa ne ntoma na deɛ ɔdi ɔbaa sansani agyinamu no gye no awowa
deɛ ɔtua nhema de nne kɛseɛ hyira ne yɔnko no wɔbɛbu no nnuabɔ ama no
asusoberɛ mu nsuo a ɛsosɔ daa ne ɔbaa tɔkwapɛfoɔ na ɛsɛ
deɛ ɔse ɔresianka no te sɛ deɛ ɔresianka mframa anaa ne nifa kuta ngo
dadeɛ se dadeɛ ano na onipa se ne yɔnko anim
deɛ ɔhwɛ borɔdɔma dua no di n aba na deɛ ɔsom ne wura no wɔbɛhyɛ no animuonyam
sɛdeɛ nsuo mu anim kyerɛ anim no saa ara na onipa akoma kyerɛ onipa akoma
asamando ne ɔsɛeɛ mmee da na onipa aniwa nso mmee da
kyɛmferɛ wɔ hɔ ma dwetɛ na fononoo wɔ hɔ ma sika na ɔbarima deɛ sɛ n ayeyie teɛ na wɔde hu no
sɛ wode wɔmma si ogyimifoɔ waduro mu fra ayuo mu mpo a n agyimisɛm remfiri ne ho ara da
hunu na hunu sɛdeɛ wo nnwan ho teɛ na fa w akoma to mmoa akuakuo no so
na adeɛ a woakora ntena hɔ daa na abotire kɔduru awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa so anaa
ɛserɛ kɔ na wira mono yi adi na wɔboaboa mmepɔ so nhahamma ano
nnwanten ma wo ntoma na mpapo yɛ asase tiri adeɛ
na mmirekyie nufosuo no dɔɔso ma w aduane wo fiefoɔ aduane ne wo mmabaa akɔnhomabɔdeɛ
abɔnefoɔ dwane berɛ a obi mpamo wɔn na teneneefoɔ deɛ wɔyɛ nnam sɛ gyataburuwa
asase mmarato na ɛma ɛso ahemfo dɔɔso na nnipa nhunumufoɔ ne nimdefoɔ na ɛma ɔhene kyɛreɛ
ohiani a ɔhyɛ ohiani soɔ te sɛ osuo a ɛpra adeɛ korɔ a ɛmma aduane mma
wɔn a wɔgya mmara no yi ɔbɔnefoɔ ayɛ na wɔn a wɔdi mmara soɔ no ne wɔn di aperepereɛ
nnipa bɔne nhunu atemmuo mu na wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ awurade akyiri kwan no hunu ade nyinaa mu
ohiani a ɔnam ne pɛyɛ mu yɛ sene deɛ ɔkyea akwan mmienu mu na wanya ne ho
deɛ ɔbu mmara no yɛ ɔba nyansafoɔ na deɛ ɔne ahohwifoɔ bɔ no hyɛ n agya aniwuo
deɛ ɔde mfɛntom ne apempensie dɔre n adeɛ no ɔboaboa ano ma deɛ ɔbɛhunu mmɔborɔfoɔ mmɔborɔ
deɛ ɔyi n aso firi mmara tie ho no ne mpaebɔ mpo yɛ akyiwadeɛ
deɛ ɔgyegye teefoɔ kɔ bɔne kwan soɔ no ɔbɛhwe ɔno ara amena mu na pɛyɛfoɔ bɛdi adepa
onipa defoɔ yɛ n ani so nyansafoɔ na mmɔborɔni nhunumufoɔ hwehwɛ ne mu
teneneefoɔ di ahurisie a ɛyɛ fɛ pii na abɔnefoɔ deɛ wɔsɔre a nnipa hunta
deɛ ɔkata ne mmarato soɔ no ɔrenyɛ prɔmprɔm na deɛ ɔka na ɔgyaeɛ no wɔbɛhu no mmɔbɔ
nhyira ne onipa a ɔfɛre adeɛ daa daa na deɛ ɔhyɛ n akoma den bɛtɔ bɔne mu
ɔbɔnefoɔ a ɔdi ɔman mmɔborɔfoɔ soɔ te sɛ gyata a ɔbobom ne sisire a n ani abereɛ
ɔhene a ɔnni nhunumu na ne nhyɛsoɔ so na deɛ ɔtane amimdie ma ne nna kyɛ
onipa a obi mogya ho so da ne soɔ no ɔbɛdwane akɔduru amena mu mma wɔnnsianka no
deɛ ɔnam pɛyɛ mu no bɛnya nkwa na deɛ ɔkyea akwan mmienu mu no bɛhwe baako mu
deɛ ɔdɔ n asase no aduane bɛmee no na deɛ ɔdi ade hunu akyire no ohia bɛmee no
onipa nokwafoɔ nhyira bɛdɔɔso na deɛ ɔrepɛ ntɛm anya ne ho renyɛ tɔtorɔtɔɔ
animhwɛ nyɛ nso aduane afono ma so mpo na onipa bɛdi asɛmmɔne
oniberefoɔ pere ahonya ho na ɔnhunu sɛ ɔhia bɛba ne so
deɛ ɔka obi anim no akyire yi ɔbɛnya animuonyam asene deɛ ɔde ne tɛkyerɛma dɛfɛdɛfɛ
deɛ ɔfom n agya ne ne na adeɛ fa na ɔka sɛ ɛnyɛ mmarato no yɛ ɔdesɛefoɔ adamfo
deɛ n akɔnnɔ so hwanyan ntɔkwa na deɛ ɔde ne ho to awurade soɔ no deɛ wɔbɛdɔre sradeɛ
deɛ ne ho da n akoma soɔ no yɛ ɔkwasea na deɛ ɔnam nyansa mu no bɛnya adwaneyɛ
deɛ ɔma ohiani no ɛrenhia no na deɛ ɔyi n ani no bɛnya nnuabɔ pii
abɔnefoɔ sɔre a nnipa hunta na wɔyera a na teneneefoɔ redɔɔso
onipa a wɔka n anim na ɔsene ne kɔn no wɔbɛbu no mpofirim a ano nni aduro
ateneneefoɔ di tumi a ɔman ani gye na ɔbɔnefoɔ di so a ɔman si apini
onipa a ɔdɔ nyansa ma n agya ani gye na deɛ ɔne nnwamamfoɔ bɔ bɛsɛe n adeɛ
ɔhene de atemmuo ma asase gyina na akyɛdepɛfoɔ bɔ no
onipa a ɔdɛfɛdɛfɛ ne yɔnko no ɔsum n anammɔn fidie
onipa bɔne mmarato mu wɔ fidie na ɔteneneeni bɛto ahurisie dwom na n ani agye
ɔteneneeni hunu mmɔborɔfoɔ asɛm di ɔbɔnefoɔ nhunu saa nimdeɛ no
fɛdifoɔ sɔ kuro mu gya na anyansafoɔ sianka abufuo
ɔba nyansafoɔ ne ogyimifoɔ di apereɛ a ɔyɛ hoo oo ɔsere oo home nni mu
mogyapɛfoɔ tane pɛyɛfoɔ na teefoɔ hwehwɛ ne kra agye no
ɔkwasea yi ne honhom nyinaa adi na onyansafoɔ dwodwo no ma no ka akyi
ɔpanin a ɔtie atorosɛm no n asomfo nyinaa yɛ abɔnefoɔ
adekoro bi da nso wɔ ohiani ne opooboni ntɛm deɛ ɔte wɔn baanu nyinaa ani ne awurade
ɔhene a ɔbu nokwatɛn ma mmɔborɔfoɔ no n ahennwa bɛtim daa
abaa ne animka ma nyansa na abɔfra a wɔato no sraha gu ne na anim ase
abɔnefoɔ dɔɔso a mmarato dɔɔso nanso ateneneefoɔ bɛhunu wɔn ahweaseɛ
tenetene wo ba na wama woahome na wama wo kra anika
anisoadehunu nni hɔ a ɔman yɛ bisibasaa nanso deɛ ɔbu mmara no nhyira ne no
ɛnyɛ nsɛm na wɔde tea akoa ɛfiri sɛ ɔte aseɛ mpo a ɔremmu
wohunu onipa a ɔpere ne nsɛm ho a anidasoɔ wɔ hɔ ma ɔkwasea sene no
deɛ ɔkorɔkorɔ n akoa firi ne mmɔfraase no akyire yi no ɔbɛyɛ sɛ ɔba
obufufafoɔ hwanyan ntɔkwa na ɔbobɔnefoɔ mmarato dɔɔso
onipa ahantan bɛbrɛ no ase na honhom mu ahobrɛaseɛni nsa bɛka animuonyam
deɛ ɔne owifoɔ kyɛ adeɛ no tane ne kra ɔte duabɔ no nso ɔnka
onipa ho suro sum fidie na deɛ ɔde ne ho to awurade soɔ no ho deɛ ɔbɛyɛ sɔnn
nnipa pii hwehwɛ ɔman sodifoɔ anim animuonyam nanso awurade na obiara atemmuo firi no
ateneneefoɔ akyiwadeɛ ne busufoɔ na ɔbɔnefoɔ nso akyiwadeɛ ne deɛ ne kwan yɛ tee
yake ba agur nsɛm anisoadehunu ɔbarima no ka kyerɛ itiel itiel ne ukal sɛ
na meyɛ mmoasɛm kyɛne onipa obiara na nhunumu a onipa wɔ no na menni bi
na mensuaa nyansa na menni ɔkronkronni no ho nimdeɛ
hwan na waforo akɔ soro na wasiane hwan na ɔkura mframa wɔ ne nsam hwan na ɔbɔ nsuo boaa ntoma mu hwan na ɔde asase ano nyinaa sisi hɔ sɛ wonim a ne din de sɛn na ne ba din de sɛn
nyankopɔn asɛm nyinaa ho te ɔyɛ ɛkyɛm ma wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to ne soɔ
mfa biribi nka ne nsɛm ho na wanka w anim na wɔanhu wo sɛ ɔtorofoɔ
nnoɔma mmienu na mesrɛ no wo hɔ nkame me ansa na mawu
yi adehuhuo ne atorosɛm firi me ho kɔ akyirikyiri mma me ohia anaa ahonyadeɛ ma mennya m aduane a ɛhia me no menni
na mammee mampa wo manka sɛ hwan ne awurade nanso manni hia manwia adeɛ mamfom me nyankopɔn din
nni akoa ho nsekuro nkyerɛ ne wura na wammɔ wo dua na woanni fɔ

﻿ dawid ba ɔsɛnkafoɔ ɔhene a ɔwɔ yerusalem no nsɛm nie

me ɔsɛnkafoɔ madi israel so hene yerusalem
mede m akoma mama sɛ mede nyansa bɛbisa na mahwehwɛ nnoɔma a wɔyɛ no ɔsoro ase nyinaa mu ɔhaw bɔne a onyankopɔn de ato adasamma soɔ sɛ wɔmmfa mu no

na mede m akoma nyinaa hwehwɛɛ sɛ mɛhunu nyansa na mahunu adammɔ ne nkwaseasɛm nanso mahunu sɛ yei nso yɛ dadwene hunu
na nyansa dodoɔ mu wɔ ɔhaw dodoɔ na deɛ ɔtia nimdeɛ no ti awerɛhoɔ

mekaa wɔ ɔsereɛ ho sɛ ɛyɛ adammɔ na mekaa wɔ anigyeɛ ho sɛ ɛdeɛn na wɔnya firii mu
